['', 'At least 3+ or more years of      software/data engineering experience ', 'Building out data integrations      into a single cloud database for data vendors ', 'Take ownership of project and      initiatives right away ', 'Automate ingestion and      validation tools to help with efficiency ', '\xa0', 'required', 'This company is working on a fast-paced transformation to expand their cloud data integration, management, and analytics application; the global team’s main responsibility is building out the future of financial data management and analysis. \xa0This role will be working very closely with clients and engineering team on building tools and integrations that gathering, cleaning, normalizing, and optimizing data from the various sources and vendors. ', ' Responsibilities include: ', 'Competitive Compensation \xa0 ', '  Experience integrating equity or other fixed income datasets from at least one of the following data vendors is required: Refinitiv, S&P Compustat, MSCI Indices, FactSet, IDC, ICE, IHS Markit, or EJV     At least 3+ or more years of      software/data engineering experience  Programming/scripting      experience with Python, R, or others  Excellent organization and      communication skills  Extensive technical skills      using SQL or similar  Must have experience working      with data structures and queries for financial datasets  ', ' Experience integrating equity or other fixed income datasets from at least one of the following data vendors is required: Refinitiv, S&P Compustat, MSCI Indices, FactSet, IDC, ICE, IHS Markit, or EJV     ', 'Designing new data structures      and analytic capabilities with the engineering team ', 'Ability to collaborate with      leadership and make an impact immediately ', 'Skills needed: ', 'Excellent organization and      communication skills ', 'Must have experience working      with data structures and queries for financial datasets ']

TouchPal is a public company located in the center of Silicon Valley, with hundreds of millions of daily active users. It is developing a new initiative to promote web novels to millions of readers through content acquisition, aggregation, discovery, and presentation on various distributions channels. Our top novels are read by millions of readers and are growing fast in quantity and quality.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Background', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related field', '4.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help drive the future roadmap of the data platform for the Global Growth platform, for next-generation data architecture to meet our needs of business growth.', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with Data Scientists and Software Engineers by providing knowledge of data modeling, and insights into the overall computing needs of the systems.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with open-source data platform services, like Spark, Flink, Airflow, Hive, Luigi, Marquez', 'The Global Growth Platform team is a newly created initiative team. ['', 'Experience:', 'Who we are:', 'We absorb and standardize hundreds of millions of unstructured public employment records to create the\xa0world’s first universal HR database. This allows us to understand the workforce dynamics of any company. Our customers include investors, corporate strategists,\xa0HR teams, and governments.', 'This role is fully remote now and in the future*', 'What we are looking for:', 'We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer who has proven expertise in designing complex data processes, pipelines, and data infrastructure. We prefer candidates\xa0who can think creatively about different ways to approach a problem.', 'We are working on some of the most challenging and cutting-edge problems using Data Science. There is no shortage of rich data or interesting problems to work\xa0on. You will work with experienced data scientists with advanced domain expertise. Our startup is small and growing, with enormous potential for growth.', 'Why you should work with us:', '2+ years of full-time work experience in a data engineering capacity.', 'Skills: Cloud Computing, Distributed Computing & Parallelization, SQL, Python, Bash. Knowledge of NLP, representation learning, and data visualization is a plus.']

', 'In the Market Regulation Surveillance Patterns technology team, an expert in this role is vested with responsibilities arising from Our Clients mission to protect the integrity of US Securities Capital markets. Our Client has a portfolio of ‘surveillance patterns’ that look for manipulative and non-compliant behavior in the database of all transactions that occur in the stock market. The database itself consists of tens of billions of records per day. Engineers work with these large volumes of data using state-of-the-art and industry standard technologies, all of which are wholly operated in a cloud computing environment. ['', "· Research technologies for possible placement/adoption into UH's back-end system.", '· Experience developing with Talend highly preferred but not required.', '· Proven ability to design and write web services/API code, micro services using API Frameworks (Rest, Json).', '· 4+ years’ experience developing enterprise data services using ETL and API technologies.', '· Ability to research and utilize SaaS based APIs to effectively integrate enterprise data into vendor systems.', '· Ability to communicate ideas clearly and effectively in both technical and user-friendly language.', 'Knowledge, Skills and Abilities', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Upward Health is an in-home multidisciplinary provider that partners with health plans and other risk-bearing entities to address the unique needs of high-risk, high-need patients. Using a unique, holistic, and community-based approach, Upward Health facilitates and delivers care that improves outcomes and the quality of life for every patient. We offer excellent benefits and an incredible employee-first culture.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'At Upward Health, we are a technology enabled primary care provider. We use technology to raise the level of service we provide to our patients. The Data Integration Engineer will be responsible to develop ETLs and APIs to connect and move data using Talend and Azure to various cloud-based front-end (SaaS) and back-end Data (ODS) & Reporting (DW) systems. The candidate will play a critical role in the UH integration strategy by linking multiple user- and customer-facing systems to the UH suite of health care and analytics systems including EHR (AthenaHealth), Care Management (Salesforce), and the Data warehouse. Candidate will design, develop, implement, and integrate information systems and software applications to meet functional and technical requirements for internal staff members. He/she designs and codes API software applications, configures and tests applications, adheres to industry best practices, standardizes quality assurance procedures for software integrations. Candidate oversees testing, develops fixes, maintains, supports, and upgrades existing application code.', '· Coding ability using Visual Studio and C# a plus.', '· Evaluate proposals to identify potential problem areas and make appropriate recommendations.', '· Proven ability to develop services according to healthcare industry security standards.', '· Ensure development projects meet business requirements and goals, fulfill end-user requirements, and identify and resolve systems issues.', '· 2+ years’ experience developing enterprise services using Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus and other Azure integration and data services.', '· Proven ability to design & develop using Azure Data Factory Pipeline to load structured/unstructured data to Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) Gen2, operational data stores (ODS), and Data Warehouse (DW) technologies.', '· Proven experience in systems architecture, development, implementation, integration, optimization, and sustainment of software solutions.', '· Create a variety of models and diagrams (such as flowcharts) that instruct other developers/programmers how integrations and data flows function.', '· Bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer-related degree.', '· Ability to analyze, design, build, query, troubleshoot and maintain enterprise data services.', 'Please note, we are currently working remotely due to the COVID-19 Crisis, however this position will be required to be located in the Suffolk County, Long Island office when it is safe to do so. We look forward to hearing from you!', 'Education and Experience', '· Knowledge of other Azure Data services a plus.', '· Lead the development of system architectures that define the interaction between systems to include the use of platforms and tools and definition of standards shared between systems.', '· Design each integration in accordance with architecture and security policies, procedures, and quality assurance best practices.', '· Document integrations, applications and system components as a reference for future maintenance and upgrades.', "This job description is a general outline of duties performed and is not to be misconstrued as encompassing all duties performed within the position. All individuals (including current employees) selected for a position will undergo a background check appropriate for the position's responsibilities.", '· Work with other technical resources to develop data services at enterprise standards in accordance with UH’s goals and objectives.', '· Support and help design and implement the integration architecture that will be used in interconnecting Upward Health’s (UH) technical ecosystem and enterprise architecture.', '· Proven ability to design & develop services using Azure Functions and Azure Service Bus to build a scalable, pub/sub enterprise platform.', '· Analyze functional users’ needs and then design, develop, integrate, and test software and integrations to meet those needs.', '· Strong requirements gathering, project, and process management experience.', '· Proven ability to design and develop ETL services using SSIS, Talend or other ETL technologies.']

['', 'Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0', '\ufeffNomi Health is offering a highly competitive compensation package with an attractive base salary as well as a significant equity stake into the company at an early stage.', "Nomi Health is led by Mark Newman (Founder/CEO) , Josh Walker (Co-Founder, COO) and Boe Hartman (Co-Founder, CTO). Mark, previously Founder/CEO of HireVue where he scaled the company from 0 to $40m ARR with a successful exit of over $500M. Josh, comes with 18+ years of experience in healthcare as COO at Imagine Health, Upwell and OptumInsight where he has first-hand experience in international and domestic healthcare markets leading and expanding business growth. Boe has served in multiple senior positions across global banking for over 25 years.\xa0Most recently, at Goldman Sachs as a Partner, where he led the firm’s launch of it’s digital consumer bank; Marcus By Goldman Sachs and the firm's entry into the consumer credit card market.", 'Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.', 'Outstanding problem solver.', 'The company is in stealth mode right now and has raised over $10M in seed funding which will be used to hire and develop the product, technology and go-to-market team.\xa0', 'Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.', 'Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.', 'Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.', 'Requirements', 'Since we are early in our journey and we will be soon dealing with a lot of data, this person will set the stage for future work of data scientists and data engineers.\xa0', 'Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi Health', 'Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'Mapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi HealthDevelop and implement data models to guide business decisionsMapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood.Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).Leveraging existing [core] data assets.Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'Leveraging existing [core] data assets.', 'WHO ARE WE?\xa0', 'We are looking for a Data Science Engineer who can help pave the way for more work in the data field and start by analyzing our current needs and use data to generate value with Nomi Health’s end goal in mind. From this goal, you will design the architecture and the analytics pipelines while taking into account appropriate time frames, and costs.', 'Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)', 'Develop and implement data models to guide business decisions', 'Chief Technology Officer', 'Health, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Commuter benefits with Great Pay, plus Equity.', 'Nomi Health is the modern payment system for employee healthcare. We sidestep the middlemen, and connect employers providers and families directly at scale to cut healthcare costs by 30% across America. We will do this by eliminating high cost “out of network” charges, making the process all digital with easy access to real data and understandable actions.\xa0', 'As a Data Science Engineer you will provide technical and domain subject knowledge to the company and future customers. You should be able to know how to examine new data systems requirements and implement migration models. You will also spend a good deal of time problem solving, analyzing architecture and assessing architect models, reviewing data migrations, selecting platforms and on-boarding of data management solutions that meet the technical and operational needs of the business.\xa0You must be hands-on with tools and code.', 'OK, HOW ABOUT A FEW SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES?', 'WHICH LEADER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT?', 'WHY IS THIS ROLE CRITICAL?', 'Benefits', 'Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.', 'Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.", 'Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.', 'Data Science Engineer requirements are:', 'WHAT IS A DAY IN THE LIFE?', 'Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).', 'Good written and verbal communication skills.', 'A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.Must have AWS or Azure experience. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.Outstanding problem solver.Good written and verbal communication skills.", 'Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.']

['Administer SaaS / cloud-based solutions like OpenShift or Kubernetes that deploy and orchestrate containerized applications. ', 'Strong interpersonal skills including verbal and written communication skills. ', '\xa0 ', 'By harnessing the power of hybrid cloud data services, customers gain the freedom of choice to securely manage and move data – anywhere, on any cloud. Only NetApp can help organizations deliver data-rich customer experiences when they rapidly test and deploy new applications that easily use data and services regardless of where they reside or in what form. ', 'A basic understanding of public cloud vendors such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud or others. ', 'So, get ready to tap into the data visionary within, and join us as we accelerate digital transformation and empower our customers to change the world with data! ', '\xa0', 'If you ask a NetApp employee why they work here, the answer is inevitably the same: the people. At NetApp, our culture is at the heart of what we do. We place importance in trust, integrity, teamwork, and caring above all else. NetApp is a place where people are empowered to make a difference. Empowered to innovate. Empowered to collaborate. Empowered to help ourselves and others be data-driven and change the world. We take care of each other, our customers, our partners, and our communities simply because it’s the right thing to do. ', ' DoD TS/SCI security clearance required  You are generally curious and highly motivated with a passion for ensuring scalable and highly available solutions.  Strong interpersonal skills including verbal and written communication skills.  You are great at solving problems, sorting meaningful information from noise, and taking action.  Familiarity with operating systems such as Linux, CentOS, Ubuntu and Windows.  A basic understanding of at least one scripting language similar to Bash, Python, or Pearl, Ruby.  A basic understanding of public cloud vendors such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud or others.  A Bachelor of Science Degree is preferred.  ', 'Document findings and solutions you create using Atlassian Confluence as well as well-documented automation. ', 'Administer NetApp remote and cloud-based storage solutions.  Assist with capacity planning to ensure continuous performance expectations are met. ', 'Job Summary ', 'You are great at solving problems, sorting meaningful information from noise, and taking action. ', 'A basic understanding of at least one scripting language similar to Bash, Python, or Pearl, Ruby. ', 'Duties and Responsibilities ', 'Are you data-driven?  We at NetApp believe in the transformative power of data – to expand customer touchpoints, to foster greater innovation, and to optimize operations.  We are designed for simplicity, optimized to protect, created to embrace future opportunity, and open to enrich choice.  We are the data authority for hybrid cloud, and we are helping our customers realize the full potential of their data. ', 'At NetApp, we have an amazing opportunity to transform industries with cutting-edge data services. We are developing a broad portfolio of solutions that harness the power of data.  NetApp public/private cloud offerings, high performance & highly scalable storage products are stretching what’s possible for our customers & partners.  These solutions change how data is stored, consumed & interpreted unleashing innovation.  Join our team & push the boundaries of what’s possible. ', 'Secure our environment from security threats deploying patches and least-privilege configurations. ', 'Site Reliability Engineer/TS/SCI Clearance Full Scope Poly ', 'We’ve built a Data Fabric for a data-driven world – to simplify and integrate data management across the resources that are best for the business.  With the Data Fabric, our customers can harness the power of cloud data services, build cloud infrastructures, and modernize storage through data management. ', 'We work hard but also recognize the importance of work-life balance for our employees because what’s important to them is important to us!  Recently we implemented Family First, which encourages employees to take paid time off to bond with a new child (through birth or adoption) or to care for a family member with a serious health condition.  Our volunteer time off program is best in class, offering employees 40 hours of paid time off per year to donate their time with their favorite organizations.  We provide comprehensive medical, dental, wellness and vision plans for you and your family.  We offer educational assistance, legal services, and access to discounts and fitness centers. We also offer financial savings programs to help you plan for your future. \xa0 ', 'Familiarity with operating systems such as Linux, CentOS, Ubuntu and Windows. ', 'Join us and see what empowerment can do. ', 'You are generally curious and highly motivated with a passion for ensuring scalable and highly available solutions. ', 'Key Characteristics ', 'DoD TS/SCI security clearance required ', 'Education ', "As a Site Reliability Engineer, you’ll work to maintain cloud services performing at levels both promised and expected by our external customer base.  You'll work in a highly collaborative environment deploying, monitoring, and maintaining systems hosting our IaaS model.  This role is an office-based position in the Washington D.C or RTP, NC areas.  This position includes on-call work due to the critical nature of the services we support. ", 'Typically requires a minimum 5 years of related experience with a bachelor’s degree; or 3 years and a Master’s degree; or a PhD without experience; or equivalent work experience. ', "Ensure adequate monitoring is in place and enhance or adjust where needed, using tools like Observium, ElasticSearch, Prometheus in addition to proprietary NetApp monitoring solutions and home-grown scripts / automation.  You'll continuously measure the availability, latency and overall system health. ", 'Automate repetitive and error prone tasks and processes, using tools like Docker, GitLab, Ansible, Python, Bash and other scripting languages. ', 'Respond to incidents and drive change preventing issues from re-occurring. You will also look for opportunities to automate the recovery for certain incidents that may be difficult to prevent. \xa0 You will use Atlassian Jira to track issues to resolution based on their priority. ', 'A Bachelor of Science Degree is preferred. ', " Administer NetApp remote and cloud-based storage solutions.  Assist with capacity planning to ensure continuous performance expectations are met.  Automate repetitive and error prone tasks and processes, using tools like Docker, GitLab, Ansible, Python, Bash and other scripting languages.  Administer SaaS / cloud-based solutions like OpenShift or Kubernetes that deploy and orchestrate containerized applications.  Ensure adequate monitoring is in place and enhance or adjust where needed, using tools like Observium, ElasticSearch, Prometheus in addition to proprietary NetApp monitoring solutions and home-grown scripts / automation.  You'll continuously measure the availability, latency and overall system health.  Secure our environment from security threats deploying patches and least-privilege configurations.  Respond to incidents and drive change preventing issues from re-occurring. You will also look for opportunities to automate the recovery for certain incidents that may be difficult to prevent. \xa0 You will use Atlassian Jira to track issues to resolution based on their priority.  Design and implement tools for automated deployment and monitoring of multiple environments.  Document findings and solutions you create using Atlassian Confluence as well as well-documented automation.  ", 'Design and implement tools for automated deployment and monitoring of multiple environments. ']

', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Unlimited room for growth and development', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create opportunities for continuous learning and professional development', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure)', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for mentoring colleagues', 'What you’ll do:', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with SQL, R, Python, Java, SPSS, Tableau or other business intelligence tools', 'As a Lead Data Engineer, you’ll support the scaling of our data science infrastructure and capability through mentoring and growing engineers by providing resources and establishing best practices. Our mission is to deliver prescriptions to patients at prices they can afford - regardless of income, lifestyle, language or diagnosis. ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive compensation and benefits', 'What you’ll need: ']

['', "We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, data storage, security, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to EVAPCO’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to tackle new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.", 'EVAPCO is a rapidly growing company and the Software Development Team here at EVAPCO headquarters in Taneytown supports all 22 locations spanning 10 different countries. EVAPCO’s software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how thousands of users across the globe select, specify, quote, order and manage EVAPCO equipment. Our software needs to show that EVAPCO is a technology leader and make it easy for our sales representatives and customers to specify and order and maintain our equipment.', '• Entity Framework, Unity, Prism, MVVM, SignalR', '• Write server-side code for web-based applications, client-side code for thick-client / server-client applications, create robust high-volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.', '• 5+ years of experience with ASP.NET / MVC or WPF', '• SQL Server BI, data warehousing', '• SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)', '• Interest and ability to learn other coding languages as needed.', '• Specialize in UI development with AJAX and similar technologies, client application development, embedded systems and mobile apps, developer tools (Visual Studio, TFS, SQL Server, Hyper-V), internationalization.', 'Responsibilities', '• 5+ years of experience with SQL Server, TSQL, Linq', '• BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.', '• Works closely with Product Development Engineers to develop algorithms and implement into product selection software.', '• Build our platforms / systems using your strong background in distributed systems', '• SharePoint 2013', 'Qualifications', '• 5+ years of experience with C# or Java', '• WCF, Web API']

job_title: Software Engineer, Cloud Engineering (South San Francisco or Mountain View, CA)
job_text: ['', 'A growth mindset and willingness to pick up new technologies and domain knowledge to be productive in role.', ' Create and deliver solutions that address the needs of developers working on GCP, Azure, AWS and Alibaba Cloud. Create cloud agnostic microservices infrastructure focused on improving developer velocity, scalability and testability, at scale. Drive improvements in product development velocity with metrics. ', 'Drive improvements in product development velocity with metrics.', 'Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Prior experience with cloud deployment technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform or other cloud providers.', 'Description', 'Experience with micro-services, devsecops, continuous integration, release management processes.', 'Create cloud agnostic microservices infrastructure focused on improving developer velocity, scalability and testability, at scale.', ' Prior experience with cloud deployment technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform or other cloud providers. Experience with micro-services, devsecops, continuous integration, release management processes. A growth mindset and willingness to pick up new technologies and domain knowledge to be productive in role.', 'Responsibilities', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience in software engineering.', '3+ years experience with Go, Java, C++, or a similar general-purpose object-oriented programming language.', ' BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience in software engineering. 3+ years experience with Go, Java, C++, or a similar general-purpose object-oriented programming language. ', 'Create and deliver solutions that address the needs of developers working on GCP, Azure, AWS and Alibaba Cloud.']

['·        Ability to influence strategy, negotiate trade-offs, and sell a compelling vision to stakeholders and business sponsors.', '·        Prior experience managing product teams.', '·        Communicate value, negotiate trade-offs, and manage risks with senior management, stakeholders, and other product teams.', '·        Some travel required (up to 5% of the time)', '·        Coordinate Program/Product Increment planning across the portfolio, determining if sprint planning is necessary across the portfolio/solution train', '·        Provide Freddie Mac customers the ability to request to do business with Freddie Mac and perform annual certifications, create and manage their employee access to Freddie Mac tools, provide direct feedback to Freddie Mac, and execute seller/servicer terms of business.  These capabilities will also allow Freddie Mac to manage our counterparty risks, to track customer feedback and provide insights to other product teams, and to manage the deal and contract management process for Freddie Mac. These capabilities are expressed through several tools, such as UCount, Salesforce, Freddie Mac Access Manager, and the Deal and Contract management platform.  These capabilities are critical to providing customers self service capabilities while also allowing Freddie Mac superb client management capabilities.', '·        Engage with CX and Strategy teams to brainstorm and prototype new concepts to prove value to the customer, and/or Freddie Mac, prior to adding work to any product backlogs', '·        Facilitate definition of product vision and roadmap in conjunction with business sponsors and senior management.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We will ensure that individuals with differing abilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', '·        Strong analytical and problem-solving thought processes.', '·        Proficient in the creation and presentation of business cases to senior management.', '·        Understanding of mortgage or loan initiation and servicing a plus', '·        Experience delivering large, complex change management projects that involve interfacing with multiple teams, especially projects involving changes to business applications and technology.', '·        Seek and use data and feedback to enhance customer outcomes.', 'The Portfolio Product Owner will be part of the Strategic Delivery division within the Single-Family line of business, Freddie Mac’s largest line of business. Specifically, this role will guide the product management of customer facing products in the client management area. ', '·        Work with Solution Train Engineer and Solution Chief Development Lead to identify and prioritize technical enabler work for the portfolio', 'Today, Freddie Mac makes home possible for one in four home borrowers and is one of the largest sources of financing for multifamily housing. Join our smart, creative and dedicated team and you’ll do important work for the housing finance system and make a difference in the lives of others.', '·        Manage a Client Management Product Portfolio with an annual budget that ranges from $15M - $25M based on management investment allocation. ', '·        Partner with Chief Product Owners, Product Owners, business sponsors, and key stakeholders on program level trade-offs', '·        Lead Program sync meeting of Chief Product Owners, Product owners and business sponsors to ensure continuous alignment of product scope across the program', '·        Regularly meet with customers and customer facing business partners to probe for value and seek feedback on ideas and prototypes for new features', '·        Understanding of DevOps concepts.', 'Job Description', 'Lead a team of chief product owners tasked with driving a vision for their products and guiding their teams to execute against the prioritized product backlog.', '·        Understand the business strategy and synchronize roadmaps and priorities across the related Agile release trains to ensure cohesive value to both the customer and Freddie Mac.', '·        Work with other Portfolio and Offering teams to coordinate any dependencies and/or go to market activities across portfolios', '·        Demonstrated ability to understand customer needs and deliver related value.', '·        High level of comfort operating in the gray, and flexibility to navigate competing priorities', 'Do you have passion for understanding customer needs and leveraging technology to deliver value?  Do you thrive in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment?  Do you enjoy working with a team of varying skillsets to collectively discover new opportunities to delight customers? If so, a role on the Single-Family Product Development team could be a fit for you.', '·        Experience working in the Agile methodology', '·        Challenger mindset and passion to challenge the status quo to find new solutions and drive outside the box', '·        Ensure program/product teams have necessary access and visibility into customer needs and feedback regarding their products', '·        Comfort and experience interacting in person with customers.', 'Current Freddie Mac employees please apply through the internal career site.', '·        Proven change agent, comfortable leveraging data and customer insights to challenge the status quo', '·        Ability to influence strategy, negotiate trade-offs, and sell a compelling vision to stakeholders and business sponsors', '·        Enable the success of the product/program teams by removing barriers and obstacles the teams may face', 'Notice to External Search Firms: Freddie Mac partners with BountyJobs for contingency search business through outside firms. Resumes received outside the BountyJobs system will be considered unsolicited and Freddie Mac will not be obligated to pay a placement fee. If interested in learning more, please visit www.BountyJobs.com and register with our referral code: MAC.', '·        Understanding the needs of customers and their operational processes to identify, design and define solutions that can be effectively implemented to deliver value. Leverage data & analytics to identify and communicate the value of proposed ideas and approach for implementing. Interact with customers and internal customer-facing staff to obtain feedback on solutions and design to validate and refine value, or pivot to something new.', '·        Ensure all change management practices from a data, process, and risks/controls are fully understood and executed by the product teams', '·        High level of comfort operating in the gray, and flexibility to navigate competing priorities.', 'Keys to Success In This Role', '·        Strong knowledge of client management concepts, industry trends and customer needs', '·        Build trust and strong partnerships through my own and my team’s actions.', '·        Set and execute upon a clear vision, strategy and/or goals.', '·        Work with business sponsors and key stakeholders to define and set the vision for a Portfolio of agile product teams.  As the Solution Train Owner for the Portfolio, they must understand market/customer needs as well as strategic organizational goals to ensure that the portfolio of product teams are optimizing the flow of work to deliver the most value for Freddie Mac and our customers in the most efficient fashion.', '·        Work with Chief Product Owners, Product Owners, and business sponsors to develop and maintain product team constructs, adjusting capacity across the portfolio based on customer needs and business priorities', '·        Foster the collaboration of cross-organizational teams to establish, develop, implement and rollout new and enhanced capabilities.', '·        15+ years of related experience with demonstrated experience in product management and 8+ years of management experience', 'The Strategic Delivery division within the Single-Family line of business, Freddie Mac’s largest line of business. Our team and this role specifically, will guide the product management of customer facing products in the client management area. ', '·        Certifications in Prosci or similar people change management methodology, human centered design approach highly desired.', '·        Develop and communicate the product vision and roadmap for a collection of related Agile release trains operating in the same value stream, in partnership with business sponsors and senior management.', '·        Top notch written and verbal communication skills, able to effectively present to senior management and expertly facilitate meetings.', 'Qualifications:', 'At Freddie Mac, you will do important work to build a better housing finance system and you’ll be part of a team helping to make homeownership and rental housing more accessible and affordable across the nation. ']

['', 'leading Hedge Fund', 'Compensation is industry leading', 'live and breathe data', 'From your side, our client will be looking for engineers that live and breathe data. A strong interest in the financial markets is a must-have too! I would be interested to know if you trade in your spare time.', 'In recent years, data has become an integral cog of the investment machine. We are excited to be working with a leading Hedge Fund that has regularly made large investments of time and money into their core data team. This opportunity is to be a senior team member working on the best data platforms the industry has to offer.', 'Python expert ', 'If you can program in one or more languages that is great, although being a Python expert would put you at the top of the list! You must also have the ability to lead projects end-to-end, from design to execution and implementation. This is not a job for beginners!', ' lead projects end-to-end', ' the best data platforms the industry has to offer.', 'Compensation is industry leading. Happy to discuss more following your application.', 'If you pass the challenging interview process, you will be working closely with some of the Hedge Funds highest performing trading teams as an Independent Contributor. It will be your responsibility to drive the evolution of their data strategy by challenging the status quo and identifying opportunities to enhance existing work.', 'senior team member', 'your responsibility to drive the evolution of their data strategy', 'This is not a job for beginners!', 'worked with data to accurately model and analyze complex systems', 'strong interest in the financial markets', 'highest performing trading teams']

This might include writing a script to import user feedback into Notion. ", " Thoughtful problem-solving: For you, problem-solving starts with a clear and accurate understanding of the context. You can decompose tricky problems and work towards a clean solution, by yourself or with teammates. You're comfortable asking for help when you get stuck. Shipping quality user interfaces: You can work with others to build and maintain quality user interfaces for a big audience, using Web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a modern UI framework like React. If you've experienced the technical challenges of rapid growth, that's a plus. Familiarity with the backend: You understand how parts of a system fit together—from the user interface to the data model. Experienced candidates should be familiar with relational database systems like Postgres or MySQL. Pragmatic and business-oriented: You care about the business impact of what you're building, and you prioritize projects accordingly. You may be opinionated, but you're not ideological and can learn new technologies as you go. Empathetic communication: You communicate nuanced ideas clearly, whether you're explaining technical decisions in writing or brainstorming in real time. In disagreements, you engage thoughtfully with other perspectives and compromise when needed. Team player: You understand when work is better, together. You enjoy collaborating cross-functionally to accomplish shared goals, and you care about learning, growing, and helping others to do the same. ", 'Bonus Points', 'Empathetic communication:', "Pragmatic and business-oriented: You care about the business impact of what you're building, and you prioritize projects accordingly. Because your goals and needs are constantly evolving, we offer visibility, leeway and support to help you grow and progress in your career. This approach builds notably on our comprehensive competency framework, our personal development, training and career management programs, and our University innovative and business-focused learning curriculums.\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services. Practical knowledge of statistical techniques/methods.\xa0Knowledge of calibration standards and methods.', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0Per defined test protocols and plans, lead the execution of testing and evaluation activities', '6.\xa0\xa0\xa0Prepare formal Test Reports and Technical Reports documenting the results of testing performed.', 'Background Experience ', '4.\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate and oversee the activities of support personnel assigned to testing activities.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate with the NPD Lab supervisor to ensure the necessary NPD lab space, equipment, disposables and any other test requirements are made available for the performance of the planned testing.\xa0\xa0Identify and justify new test equipment as needed to execute required testing needs.', ' \xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good analytical and problem solving skills.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa00-3 years of experience.', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate with engineers and marketers to define and develop test methods, fixtures, test protocols and test plans to achieve the defined testing objective(s).', 'Job Summary:', 'Position Requirements:\xa0To succeed in the Test & Evaluation Engineer 1 position, candidates should possess the following Knowledge, Skills and Abilities (KSAs):', ' Knowledge, Skills and Abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good communication skills; both verbal and written.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Basic computer knowledge; use of MS Office Suite.', 'Position Requirements:\xa0', 'Job Details:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor level or higher degree in an engineering discipline from an accredited university or college.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Entry level position', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to develop robust test methods.\xa0', '5.\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform necessary engineering and statistical analysis of data collected from testing activities.', '7.\xa0\xa0\xa0Performs other job related duties as assigned.', 'The Test & Evaluation Engineer 1 is responsible for providing engineering support for planning and execution of NPD test and evaluation activities.\xa0Testing activities may include new product concept testing, competitive benchmarking, marketing claim substantiation, formal design verification testing (including accelerated and real time aging), usability testing, and root cause analyses.\xa0The Test & Evaluation Engineer 1 may serve as an extended project team member and will typically coordinate with marketers, development engineers, process engineers, manufacturing and quality engineers.\xa0']

["We're a small team tackling the absolutely massive mortgage market. We're bringing modern, elegant software to a field that still relies on fax machines and manila envelopes. We bring security, efficiency and joy to a paper-based pillar of the US economy.", '', 'The type of problems we focus on involve workflow, product design, and data. Monolith vs microservice is an ongoing debate. We are working to find a good authentication pattern that allows for people to work across companies in multiple roles (which is trickier than you might think!). Domain Driven Design is our guiding light.', '\xa0', "Here is where you come in. Upon completing your BS/BA Computer Science, you joined the industry ready to contribute to a growing business. Now it's time to dive into the startup world and apply your talents to solve real world problems. Over the past 3+ years you have experience with object-oriented programming with at least one of these Ruby, Go, Python, Scala, Java etc working in a production environment. More recently you have been focused on backend development, building APIs, services & working with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc). You have a bias for testing and quality is at the center of your work. Cross functional collaboration is important to you as you are eager to solve a range of problems across the org. Today our team is working in Ruby on Rails, React, Postgres, AWS, Docker, & Kubernetes to name a few but things change quickly so be comfortable learning new tools. We take a pragmatic approach to programming language experience and believe languages can be learned so don't get too hung up if you have not worked with our tools. Hopefully learning new tools & new languages is something you are eager to do.", 'As a Software Engineer you will play a central role in building a quality digital closing platform that our partners can trust and use. We build high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical business systems that enable our users to streamline workflows. You will design, build, and maintain APIs, services, and distributed systems. In addition to contributing to core services, you will contribute to debugging production issues across services, participate in code reviews and arch specs. Your day to day interactions span product and engineering teams to release at a high velocity in all phases of the SDLC. We have a small team so your contributions will have huge impact.', 'Snapdocs’ culture is one that strongly values diversity and drive. We want to work with people of different backgrounds and different paths in life, and we trust our team members to make smart decisions. We value independent work as well as collaboration. Snapdocs provides a range of excellent benefits ranging from the standard stuff: matching 401(k), free lunches, and 21 days PTO to the not so standard—like a 10 year exercise window on your options.', 'Snapdocs is an early-stage, rapidly growing company backed by investors like Sequoia, F-Prime Capital, SV Angel, and YCombinator looking for an empathetic Software Engineer to build the next generation of our products. Are you interested in growing your skills while bringing an industry into the future? Then we have a role for you.', "We trust our team members to make smart decisions. This means we value both independent work as well as collaboration. We're becoming ubiquitous in one segment of the market and now we're looking to hire another core engineer to help us scale our platform."]

['', 'Online media is in a state of flux. Twitter, Facebook, Gab, blogs and so-called fake news are all developments that have radically altered the landscape of news and information online.\xa0The Media Cloud project (http://mediacloud.org/) was created to track and understand this online media ecosystem. Come help us build data-centric tools for academic researchers and non-profits that let them investigate and track how speech moves across the internet.', 'college degree or other domain-specific accreditation, preferably in computer science or data science related field;', 'experience working with text-based data system (ie. NLP);', 'experience writing, maintaining, and optimizing SQL queries against databases;', 'Our Team', 'work with senior engineers to establish a technical vision for the project;', "work on our server architecture, which collects and processes and allows researchers to analyze these stories via an API; you will approximately spend half your time planning, designing, building and the other half, maintaining and running the project's data pipeline;", 'demonstrated ability to iterate quickly through prototypes;', 'experience writing web crawlers or API scrapers;', 'experience working with PostgreSQL and Solr / Lucene in Ubuntu environments;', 'RESPONSIBILITIES: ', 'Paid coding challenge (1 week to complete);', 'some experience with Linux;', 'experience working in a modern dev / systems environment including git and docker.', 'write code that can scale systems to handle ever-expanding data requirements.', 'Team interviews (2 hour);', 'ability to work productively in a virtual environment with remote team members all over the world;', 'experience implementing and maintaining a production ETL pipeline;', 'Interview process', 'experience implementing and maintaining a production ETL pipeline;experience scaling platforms to handle large data sets;experience writing web crawlers or API scrapers;experience writing, maintaining, and optimizing SQL queries against databases;experience working with PostgreSQL and Solr / Lucene in Ubuntu environments;experience working with text-based data system (ie. NLP);experience working in a modern dev / systems environment including git and docker.', 'experience scaling platforms to handle large data sets;', 'Much of our substantive work focuses on issues of online hate-speech, race, democracy, and health. We strongly encourage women, people of color, and people of any sexual identity to apply.', 'demonstrated ability to design, build, test, and deploy robust code;', 'We are a diverse and welcoming community of researchers and technologists who love to engage with hard questions about online media by using a combination of social, computer, and data sciences. You will work with all members of our small team, from senior faculty to junior developers, and thrive in an academic atmosphere that encourages experimentation, constant questioning, and validation at all levels of our platform.', "work on our server architecture, which collects and processes and allows researchers to analyze these stories via an API; you will approximately spend half your time planning, designing, building and the other half, maintaining and running the project's data pipeline;work with senior engineers to establish a technical vision for the project;contribute to and follow a technical roadmap to meet research needs and to complete grant deliverables;collaborate with other developers, designers, and system administrators in implementing technical roadmap;accurately communicate project status internally and externally to our community of users;maintain, upgrade and build systems within an existing (rather large) codebase (https://github.com/berkmancenter/mediacloud) to collect, archive, and analyze content from online media;write code that can scale systems to handle ever-expanding data requirements.", 'We strive to make the interview process smooth and painless for both parties. Should you choose to submit your application for this position, you can expect the following:', ' ', 'accurately communicate project status internally and externally to our community of users;', 'programming fluency — Python required;', 'contribute to and follow a technical roadmap to meet research needs and to complete grant deliverables;', 'collaborate with other developers, designers, and system administrators in implementing technical roadmap;', 'maintain, upgrade and build systems within an existing (rather large) codebase (https://github.com/berkmancenter/mediacloud) to collect, archive, and analyze content from online media;', 'college degree or other domain-specific accreditation, preferably in computer science or data science related field;at least two years experience working as a software engineer on big data systems;programming fluency — Python required;some experience with Linux;demonstrated ability to design, build, test, and deploy robust code;demonstrated ability to iterate quickly through prototypes;demonstrated ability to use data to validate architectural decisions;ability to work productively in a virtual environment with remote team members all over the world;interest in working on issues related to hate-speech, democracy, gender, race, or health.', 'demonstrated ability to use data to validate architectural decisions;', 'About Media Cloud', 'The Media Cloud project is looking for a software engineer to focus on our data pipeline. We are an open source project conducting primary research about the media ecosystem as well as helping others to do their own research about it on over 1.5 billion news stories, adding more than 700,000 new stories daily. Pay is competitive, and while the initial contract will be for 4-6 months, we anticipate this role extending long-term.', 'Phone screen (30 mins);', 'Our entire team is remote, with team members working all around the world, and we welcome remote workers.', 'Please email resume and cover letter to jobs@mediacloud.org.', 'Technical interview (1 hour);', 'Media Cloud is a joint project between UMass-Amherst, Northeastern University, and the Berkman Klein Center for Internet & Society at Harvard University. This position is with Media Cloud’s nonprofit arm, the Media Ecosystems Analysis Group (https://www.mediaecosystems.org/), and you will work closely with members of the team from all centers.', 'interest in working on issues related to hate-speech, democracy, gender, race, or health.', 'at least two years experience working as a software engineer on big data systems;', 'To Apply', 'HELPFUL SKILLS:', 'Phone screen (30 mins);Technical interview (1 hour);Paid coding challenge (1 week to complete);Team interviews (2 hour);Final decision.', 'MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: ', 'Our upcoming technical roadmap includes ingesting new platforms into our data pipeline, analyzing images from news stories, and incorporating new sources of audience/readership data, as well as ongoing updates to improve the scalability, performance, and reliability of our existing pipeline.', 'Final decision.', 'Position Overview']

The ENGEL group has been thriving for decades. This is because as a family-run company, we rely on long-standing relationships and aim to live up to our own exacting standards of expertise and experience in all fields of plastics processing. We see ourselves as a driving, innovative force that has continually set new standards in a dynamic and diverse industry. Our competitive edge has come from generating added value for customers worldwide.ENGEL attaches great importance to flexibility, innovation and self-responsibility of all of its employees and business units. Today, the ENGEL Group offers a full range of technology modules for plastics processing as a single source supplier: Injection molding machines for thermoplastics and elastomers, and automation. In 2016/2017 ENGEL’s turnover totaled approximately 1.36 billion euros worldwide, with 5,900 employees across nine production plants in Europe, North America and Asia (China and Korea), and subsidiaries and representatives in more than 85 countries. job_text: ['', '5+ years of experience in software engineering with relevant front-end technologies like Advanced JavaScript and MVC frameworksExperience with running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, with experience with container-based technologies like Docker and Cloud Foundry a plus.In-depth knowledge and technical expertise with ReactJS, NodeJS, and NPMExtensive experience and proficiency with cross-browser, cross-platform development including Mobile WebExpertise in designing and delivering with performance, security, and accessibility in mind. Expertise in designing and integrating with service-based architectures.Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and SplunkKnowledge of i18N (internationalization) and A11y (accessibility) best practices a plus', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'Knowledge of i18N (internationalization) and A11y (accessibility) best practices a plus', 'In-depth knowledge and technical expertise with ReactJS, NodeJS, and NPM', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.', 'ABOUT GAP', 'Employee stock purchase plan.*', 'Our past is full of iconic moments — but our future is going to spark many more. Our brands — Gap, Banana Republic, Old Navy, Athleta, Janie & Jack, and INTERMIX— have dressed people from all walks of life and all kinds of families, all over the world, for every occasion for more than 50 years.', '5+ years of experience in software engineering with relevant front-end technologies like Advanced JavaScript and MVC frameworks', 'Work collaboratively with technical and product/design team members to develop and maintain UX product features following Agile development principles', 'Work collaboratively with technical and product/design team members to develop and maintain UX product features following Agile development principlesCreate robust solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performanceEngage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodologyEngage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilitiesDevelop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'Gap Inc. is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to providing a workplace free from harassment and discrimination. We are committed to recruiting, hiring, training and promoting qualified people of all backgrounds, and make all employment decisions without regard to any protected status. We have received numerous awards for our long-held commitment to equality and will continue to foster a diverse and inclusive environment of belonging. This year, we’ve been named as one of the\xa0Best Places to Work by the Humans Rights Campaign\xa0for the fourteenth consecutive year and have been included in the\xa02019 Bloomberg Gender-Equality Index\xa0for the second year in a row.', '\ufeff*For eligible employees', 'Engage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodology', 'Engage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilities', 'Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk', 'Experience with running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, with experience with container-based technologies like Docker and Cloud Foundry a plus.', 'We are looking for imaginative individuals experienced with cutting-edge, front-end technologies to deliver compelling experiences at scale. Join us and flex your imagination with designing and developing industry-leading commerce features that are reliable, scalable, and create a great customer experience!', 'Develop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*', 'Extensive experience and proficiency with cross-browser, cross-platform development including Mobile Web', "But we're more than the clothes that we make. We know that business can and should be a force for good, and it's why we work hard to create a product that makes people feel good inside and out. It's why we're committed to giving back to the communities where we live and work. If you're one of the super-talented who thrives on change, aren't afraid to take risks and love to make a difference, grow with us.\xa0", "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'WHO YOU ARE', 'Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*', 'Create robust solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performance', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*Employee stock purchase plan.*Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*', 'See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'Expertise in designing and delivering with performance, security, and accessibility in mind. Expertise in designing and integrating with service-based architectures.', 'At Gap Inc., we are passionate about creating and delivering quality software by utilizing Agile and DevOps best practices. We are creating solutions using Automation, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration & Delivery, Pair Programming, and story-based iterative development. In this role, you will collaborate cross-functionally with Product Management and Design to build and improve multiple features across the product discovery and purchase shopping experience.', 'BENEFITS AT GAP INC.', 'Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*']

['Previous experience working in financial services or      low latency environments in addition to experience from FAANG or similar Silicon      Valley firms ', 'Linux Engineer | Greenfield Hedge Fund Opportunity Compensation: $300,000 - $450,000 Total (depending on experience level)  My client is a leading quantitative hedge fund that specializes across electronic trading, fixed income, and portfolio management. After years of working within a Windows infrastructure, senior leadership has made the determination to pivot towards a large-scale Linux compute environment. They are aggressively building their core infrastructure team and are looking for Linux Engineers to join their growing team. job_text: ['', 'Deep understanding of statistical modeling techniques and advanced data analytics', 'Experience in predictive modeling, data science, or machine learning', 'What We Do:', '\xa0', 'Experience in predictive modeling, data science, or machine learningExperience applying software engineering techniques in solution developmentExperience in cybersecurity and privacy is a plusDemonstrated ability to learn new concepts and grow into new areas of workExperience supporting test and evaluation for large-scale government research programs is a plus', 'Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:', 'BS in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with eight (8) years of experience or equivalent combination of training or experience; or MS in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with five (5) years of experience; or PhD in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with two (2) years of experience.Willingness to complete modest travel to various locations to support the SEI’s overall mission.You will be subject to a background check and will need to obtain and maintain a U.S. Department of Defense security clearance.', 'Carnegie Mellon University is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Disability/Veteran.', 'BS in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with eight (8) years of experience or equivalent combination of training or experience; or MS in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with five (5) years of experience; or PhD in data science, machine learning, computer science, statistics, or related highly-quantitative discipline with two (2) years of experience.', 'You will be subject to a background check and will need to obtain and maintain a U.S. Department of Defense security clearance.', 'Willingness to complete modest travel to various locations to support the SEI’s overall mission.', 'Experience supporting test and evaluation for large-scale government research programs is a plus', 'Proficient with at least one mathematical/statistical programming package (e.g., R, python numpy/scipy/pandas, MATLAB, etc.)', 'Innovative and inquisitive with ability to imagine novel analytical solutions to problems', 'Experience in cybersecurity and privacy is a plus', 'Experience applying software engineering techniques in solution development', 'Deep understanding of statistical modeling techniques and advanced data analyticsProficient with at least one mathematical/statistical programming package (e.g., R, python numpy/scipy/pandas, MATLAB, etc.)Expertise in one or more of the following: machine learning techniques (e.g., K-means, SVM, neural networks), quantum computing, deep fake videos, cryptography, data visualization, natural language processingInnovative and inquisitive with ability to imagine novel analytical solutions to problemsThrives in a multi-disciplinary environmentStrong communication skills', "Data Scientists at the SEI use advanced analytics, data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning to help our government and industry clients research and solve cyber security challenges. In this role, you will work with our customers to identify areas where advanced statistical techniques can help tackle problems, plan and develop prototype solutions, and build out final products. You'll get a chance to work with elite cyber security professionals and university faculty to build new technologies that will influence national cyber security strategy for decades to come. You will co-author research proposals, execute studies, and present findings to DoD sponsors and at academic conferences.", 'Demonstrated ability to learn new concepts and grow into new areas of work', 'Please visit\xa0“Why Carnegie Mellon”\xa0to learn more about becoming part of an institution inspiring innovations that change the world.', 'Our team works on a wide range of projects. Some of our current work includes developing metrics and experimental designs for large-scale cyber security research programs, researching human-in-the-loop machine learning, and building classifiers to identify security vulnerabilities in code. Additionally, we have burgeoning work in deep fake video creation and detection, quantum computing, and natural language processing. We have access to a wide variety of cyber-related data, including malware samples, netflow data, cyber security training runs and tests, incident tickets, and more. If you are a data science or statistics expert with an interest in cyber security, we want to hear from you!', 'Thrives in a multi-disciplinary environment', 'Desired Experience:', 'Expertise in one or more of the following: machine learning techniques (e.g., K-means, SVM, neural networks), quantum computing, deep fake videos, cryptography, data visualization, natural language processing', 'More Information', 'Requirements:', 'Strong communication skills', 'A listing of employee benefits is available at:\xa0www.cmu.edu/jobs/benefits-at-a-glance/.']

Programming knowledge of handheld devices is a plus Familiarity with statistical and data science environments a plus (e.g. R / Python)', ' Serves as software engineer on project teams that provide information technology services for departmental, research and clinical engineering tasks, projects, and information systems and networks. Under the direction of the Supervisor for Software Engineering and/or Platform Sr. Leadership, develops project software and tests, installs, documents and maintains device, system and network hardware and software. Develops software-based devices, systems and networks.', ' Serves as software engineer on project teams that provide information technology services for departmental, research and clinical engineering tasks, projects, and information systems and networks. Under the direction of the Supervisor for Software Engineering and/or Platform Sr. Leadership, develops project software and tests, installs, documents and maintains device, system and network hardware and software. Develops software-based devices, systems and networks. Under direction, modifies and supports software-based devices, systems and networks. Assists team leadership in determination of needs of department, development of candidate solutions that address the needs, and selection of a target solution. Communicates with clients to assure correct understanding and achievement of goals. Specifies and orders necessary hardware and software to ensure timely completion of projects. Generates complete documentation of projects, including instructional materials, system models and implementation drawings, and documented code. Assists in the development of departmental software training programs. Trains end-users of devices or systems. Performs other functions assigned by Department leadership. Work closely with our software engineers, Enterprise Data Wearhouse, Information Systems, and Bio-Medical Engineers. Manage dependencies to ensure risks are mitigated and issues are communicated. Create test cases in accordance with specifications.', ' Office applications and development environment, particularly Microsoft Office and VBA']

['', 'Hi all,', 'Our client is a progressive Tech Company here in LA, who are looking to bring someone on soon. ['', 'Have experience building and owning full-stack applications end-to-end. ', 'Have a strong CS background you draw on to choose the right algorithms, systems approaches, and patterns to solve problems, without reinventing the wheel. ', "You'll work with the rest of the product team to triage and resolve production issues. You’ll develop & implement tests for ensuring the quality, performance, & scalability of our application. ", 'You’ll participate in the strategic development of methods, techniques, and evaluation criteria for projects and programs. ', 'You’ll improve engineering standards, tooling, and processes. ', 'Be biased towards action and shipping. Once you’ve sketched out an idea, you find the fastest path to a prototype to prove the concept. ', 'You’ll help recruit, manage, and mentor contract and/or volunteer engineers and deeply review code. ', 'What will lead to success', "You'll work directly with Raheem’s Founder, it's Head of Product, designers, and others to invent, implement, and improve features for our growing audience of people who have experienced police violence. ", 'Your first project will be to build technology that decentralizes the reporting process for all of the roughly 18,000 police departments in the United States. ', "You'll work with the rest of the product team to triage and resolve production issues. ", 'You’ll develop & implement tests for ensuring the quality, performance, & scalability of our application. ', 'Be able to hit the ground running. We generally look for 4+ years of full-time professional experience or the equivalent. ', 'Solving hard problems, together. ', 'What you’ll be doingRaheem is at an exciting juncture and we’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to take our leading social and racial justice tools to the next level. ', 'Contribute to a positive culture that enables us to find joy in the work of fixing painful problems. ', ' ', 'Software engineering excellence. ', 'Be comfortable leading technical architecture discussions and helping drive technical decisions. ', 'What will lead to success ', 'You’ll own technical strategy for broad or complex requirements with insightful and forward-looking approaches that solve large open-ended problems. ', "You'll brainstorm with cross-functional team members to conceptualize and build new features. ", 'Ask hard questions and challenge assumptions to ensure that we’re solving the right problems. ', 'Be committed to ending state-sanctioned violence against Black and Brown people, trans people, women, queer people, people with disabilities, people living without houses, and all others who have the right to live and love freely. ', 'Engage with the problem space, taking the time to listen and learn with curiosity.', 'Take ownership of the technical side of Raheem by proactively looking for opportunities to improve and extend the product and infrastructure. ', 'Be creative: you’ll come up with new ideas based on your broad understanding of technological possibilities and the domain knowledge you’ll learn. ', 'What you’ll be doing', 'You’ll actively own features or systems and define their long-term health, while also improving the health of surrounding systems. ', 'Within your first month, you will build a deep understanding of Raheem’s current initiatives and technology infrastructure (React, TypeScript, and Firebase along with services for indexing/search, content management, and geocoding), and have contributed code to the repository. ', 'Caring. ', 'Come up with novel solutions, working well with technologists and non-technologists alike. ']
