['', '\xa0Prepare plans for all ETL (Extract/Transformation/Load) procedures and architectures.', '\xa0Monitor and tune data loads and queries.', '\xa0Creating, designing and developing data models for scalable, multi-terabyte data marts.\xa0Administer all requirements and translate functional product requirements into technical designs.\xa0Prepare plans for all ETL (Extract/Transformation/Load) procedures and architectures.\xa0Implement DDL and DML code to operationalize designs following SDLC guidelines.\xa0Validate results and create business reports.\xa0Monitor and tune data loads and queries.\xa0Assist with capturing and documenting data flow and other pertinent technical information about database design and/or systems.', 'Required Skills', 'Bachelor’s Degree and 7+ years of experience or equivalent combination of related experience.Expert level in Structured Query Language (SQL).Strong experience working with traditional relational databases like Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server and distributed databases like MemSQL.Strong working knowledge and understanding of database principles, concepts, technologies and tools, including OLTP and OLAP models. Deep experience architecting, developing and implementing Data Mart and Data Warehouse solutions.Data modeling experience for relational, dimensional and big data solutions.Strong experience with designing and building highly scalable Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) processes and concepts. Familiarity with multiple ETL applications is a plus.\xa0Effective written and verbal communication and presentation skills.Detail orientated with the ability to work with minimum/no supervision.', '\xa0Assist with capturing and documenting data flow and other pertinent technical information about database design and/or systems.', 'Experience working with health care data.', 'Bachelor’s Degree and 7+ years of experience or equivalent combination of related experience.', '\xa0Implement DDL and DML code to operationalize designs following SDLC guidelines.', 'POSITION SUMMARY: ', '\xa0Creating, designing and developing data models for scalable, multi-terabyte data marts.', 'Expert level in Structured Query Language (SQL).', 'Travel is not required for this position.', 'POSITION DESCRIPTION', 'Detail orientated with the ability to work with minimum/no supervision.', 'The Data Mart Developer has extensive knowledge of data structures, data modeling, SQL skills, analyzing and reporting techniques. On a day-to-day basis, the Data Mart Developer handles the delivery of data and information to the organization’s various data marts.\xa0We need an experienced person who understands database designs and ETL processes and can assist with creating a data landscape for Sentry that is modern, scalable, maintainable and high-performing.\xa0\xa0', 'Effective written and verbal communication and presentation skills.', '\xa0Validate results and create business reports.', 'Strong experience with designing and building highly scalable Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) processes and concepts. Familiarity with multiple ETL applications is a plus.\xa0', 'Deep experience architecting, developing and implementing Data Mart and Data Warehouse solutions.', 'QUALIFICATIONS/REQUIREMENTS:', '\xa0Administer all requirements and translate functional product requirements into technical designs.', '.', 'TRAVEL', 'Strong working knowledge and understanding of database principles, concepts, technologies and tools, including OLTP and OLAP models. ', 'Data modeling experience for relational, dimensional and big data solutions.', 'Desired Skills', 'Strong experience working with traditional relational databases like Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server and distributed databases like MemSQL.']

['', 'We are a rapidly growing team of software engineers with project managers, user experience designers, graphic designers, and an office manager. Our current clients include Starbucks, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, the State of Delaware, outstanding non-profit clients, the Cities of Boston and Springfield, MA, and many others. Our primary offices are in scenic Brattleboro, Vermont and we have distributed staff living and working around the country.', 'We are adding to our team of developers designing and building applications in Ruby on Rails. You will be working in small teams with our clients, project managers, UI/Interaction designers and front-end developers.', 'Build and manage background jobs to efficiently process large datasets in a variety of formats and protocols', 'Long-term relationships with smart, engaged clients', 'Develops high quality software that minimizes defects and maintenance costs', 'Build intuitive UIs to apply consistent, well-validated updates', 'A typical day might include...', 'Provide estimates, dependencies, and timing feedback in collaboration with the PM to manage schedule and budget', 'Provide or support non-automated workflow acceptance and user testing.', 'Gathers project requirements and translating them into software specificationsTakes overall responsibility for the success of the project and client relationshipDevelops high quality software that minimizes defects and maintenance costsCreates and maintains momentum on a project in order to meet client goalsActively participates in management of project scope, schedule, and budget', 'APIs and protocols both new and old. e.g. Oauth2, Stripe, SAP', 'We offer a competitive salary, 100% health insurance coverage, 5 weeks paid time off, and retirement benefits.', 'Creative team who value a workplace where you can learn and laugh', 'Our projects offer challenges in developing complex scalable algorithms and well-designed responsive user interfaces. We regularly evolve our approach to software development as new best practices emerge. Together, we’ve created a collaborative atmosphere in our company—shaping together the kind of work and lifestyle we want and fostering career paths through mentorship. This has resulted in exceptionally long-term relationships with both our clients and our staff.', 'Deploy in a variety of environments. e.g. Bare-metal, AWS EC2, Docker', 'What makes an engineer ‘senior’ at Green River:', 'Actively participates in management of project scope, schedule, and budget', 'Design and maintain automated test and code quality assessments providing appropriate coverage based on risk. e.g. TravisCI minitest, rspec, Capybara, simplecov, bundleaudit', 'Generate statistically relevant test/demo datasets: e.g. factorybot', 'As the population rises, the climate changes, and critical resource thresholds are reached and exceeded, it’s becoming increasingly important for information systems to help us obtain and interpret data about people and organizations, in terms of both economic benefits and human and ecological health. This vision of the future is what drives us at Green River.', 'Design, build, and document public-facing APIs', 'Anticipate and handle unexpected inputs, race conditions, transient network errors and rate limits', 'Senior Software Engineer, committed to public health, school improvement, and environmental protection', 'Note: Please combine your cover letter and resume into one file and upload them when you apply for this job. A cover letter is necessary to be considered for this position.', 'Build intuitive search and document stores: e.g. ElasticSearch, Redis', 'Creates and maintains momentum on a project in order to meet client goals', 'Takes overall responsibility for the success of the project and client relationship', 'Lead and/or be led in small teams of developers with pull requests, code review, and staging/production deployments', 'Lead and/or be led in small teams of developers with pull requests, code review, and staging/production deploymentsProvide estimates, dependencies, and timing feedback in collaboration with the PM to manage schedule and budgetDesign for and work securely with confidential data subject to HIPAA, GDPR and other regulations. e.g. encryption, audit and change logs\xa0Translate business models into designs for primary data stores, e.g: PostgreSQL, S3Build intuitive UIs to apply consistent, well-validated updatesLearn quickly to interact with various document formats, SHP, HL7, X12 EDI, undocumented client provided dataBuild and manage background jobs to efficiently process large datasets in a variety of formats and protocolsDesign and maintain automated test and code quality assessments providing appropriate coverage based on risk. e.g. TravisCI minitest, rspec, Capybara, simplecov, bundleauditProvide or support non-automated workflow acceptance and user testing.APIs and protocols both new and old. e.g. Oauth2, Stripe, SAPAnticipate and handle unexpected inputs, race conditions, transient network errors and rate limitsDeploy in a variety of environments. e.g. Bare-metal, AWS EC2, DockerBuild intuitive search and document stores: e.g. ElasticSearch, RedisGenerate statistically relevant test/demo datasets: e.g. factorybotDesign, build, and document public-facing APIs', 'Green River is an Equal Opportunity Employer. In accordance with our beliefs and Title VII of the Civil Rights Act, Green River will not discriminate against job candidates, employees, or clients based on race, creed, color, ethnic origin, nationality, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, or disability.', 'Gathers project requirements and translating them into software specifications', 'Design for and work securely with confidential data subject to HIPAA, GDPR and other regulations. e.g. encryption, audit and change logs\xa0', 'Translate business models into designs for primary data stores, e.g: PostgreSQL, S3', 'Creative team who value a workplace where you can learn and laughLong-term relationships with smart, engaged clients', 'We are transparent with our clients—we seek candidates who can take this on wholeheartedly, and like the rest of us, care deeply about our clients’ success. Success in this position requires knowledge about the process for developing web applications, and enthusiasm about learning programming skills. We look for team members who believe in working to make the world a better place, yet bring a grounded professionalism appropriate to our clients and the scale of our projects.', 'Incorporated in 2000, Green River is a custom web application development firm with a strong engineering focus, dedicated to social equity and environmental protection. We think of the internet as a societal nervous system—a growing global network of awareness and intelligence that we must put to good use. Helping to transform the market requires software skills, analytical experience, business sophistication, and a genuine commitment to ethics and social responsibility.', 'Learn quickly to interact with various document formats, SHP, HL7, X12 EDI, undocumented client provided data', 'Some things people love about working at Green River:']

job_text: ['', 'Experience with AI, NLP, ML', 'At least 4 years of full-time Software Engineering experience after getting your undergraduate degree', 'The ideal candidate is curious, driven, absolutely loves solving complex problems, is a pleasure to be around and work with, and has an intense bias towards making stuff happen.', 'Experience deploying applications on AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, etc', 'This is a rare opportunity to join a startup as one of the first 20 employees and shape the product, strategy, and culture alongside the Founder and core team.', 'Role Description', "We value a scrappy, resourceful, problem-solving attitude towards work. We're a small team trying to accomplish big things and help millions of people in the process. We spend a lot of hours together and are all mission-aligned to push the company forward every day. We also have frequent happy hours to blow off some steam!", 'Experience with relational databases and SQL', 'At least 2 years of Machine Learning experience', '🏃\u200d♂️ work in a fast-paced environment where an idea on Monday can become a live feature in the hands of users by Friday', 'Cushion is looking for a stellar Machine Learning Engineer to join us during this exciting phase of the company!', '✋ have serious ownership - of the work that you do as well as your stake in the company', 'We’re growing, generating revenue, and announced our $2.8M Seed round on TechCrunch in 2019. In addition, we have been recognized by SXSW, Bloomberg, American Banker, Inc magazine, and more.', 'As an engineer at Cushion, you will', "Based on our experience building teams at multiple companies, including Twitter, we're looking for candidates with the following background:", '✋ have serious ownership - of the work that you do as well as your stake in the company🏃\u200d♂️ work in a fast-paced environment where an idea on Monday can become a live feature in the hands of users by Friday👩\u200d💻 work on high-impact initiatives that will affect tens of thousands of customers (hopefully millions as we grow!)🚀 be a major contributor in building and scaling a company', "A college degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Math, or PhysicsAt least 4 years of full-time Software Engineering experience after getting your undergraduate degreeAt least 2 years of Machine Learning experienceA track record of deploying ML models into production yourselfExperience with AI, NLP, MLExperience with PythonExperience with relational databases and SQLExperience deploying applications on AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, etcBonus: Prior startup experienceBonus: Master's Degree or higher in Machine Learning", 'Our first service is a bot that negotiates with banks, on behalf of our customers, to get back money wasted on bank fees & credit card interest — a $200 Billion problem in the U.S. each year with no other digital solution until now.', "What we're looking for", 'A track record of deploying ML models into production yourself', "The core of what we're building at Cushion is a system that can perform intelligent financial actions on behalf of a consumer, better than they can.", '\ufeffCompany Culture', 'At Cushion, our goal is to democratize access to financial help, not just financial advice - enabling consumers to waste less money, save more, and live financially healthier lives.', '🚀 be a major contributor in building and scaling a company', 'We are on the hunt to find a humble hard-working ML Engineer who is an outstanding engineer first and foremost (e.g. can build and deploy a web app from scratch if need be). This person must be able to not only extract insights from data and build ML models but is also able to deploy their models into production without the help of other engineers.', 'Bonus: Prior startup experience', "Bonus: Master's Degree or higher in Machine Learning", 'About Cushion AI, Inc.', 'Experience with Python', "Who we're looking for", '👩\u200d💻 work on high-impact initiatives that will affect tens of thousands of customers (hopefully millions as we grow!)', 'A college degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Math, or Physics']

['', 'Be A Founder of the Next Big Tech Platforms', 'If you know how to build front-end and back-end of progressive web apps and have an interest in creating your own apps with the support of a remote-cast of technical and business partners then this role may be for you. Interest in blockchain is not a prerequisite.', 'EQUITY-COMPENSATION ONLY', 'HACKERS AND HUSTLERS TO THE FRONT OF THE LINE', 'Data-credits (aka Wallys) are required for ad-buys, promotions, and special in-app purchases and the ecosystem is designed to meet requirements for a scalable currency in the long run: 1) wide distribution 2) stable market-oriented pricing.', 'The Tree of Wally key differentiator is data-credits which can be earned and spent across our new application ecosystem. Data-credits are distributed to users in daily income streams underwritten based on your nation of residence and data sharing permissions by ToW.', 'The Tree of Wally Foundation (ToW) is incubating several tech startups in social media, music, video, short-form text, news, gambling, gaming, dating (and more!) that will utilize proprietary functionality that will set Your Next Big App apart from the current market leaders.', 'EQUITY-COMPENSATION ONLY. HACKERS AND HUSTLERS TO THE FRONT OF THE LINE.']

['', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Education and Previous Positions:', 'About Us:', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work']

['', 'You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the \'why\' behind what you are doing. You understand engineering fundamentals.At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don\'t work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. You are a broadly skilled engineer , accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers. You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. You work with confidence and without ego.Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. You value, seek out, and foster diversity.We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', "You understand engineering fundamentals.At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. ['', 'Our work is guided by a dedication to safety – in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society. As a subsidiary of Toyota, TRI is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership, experience, and ideas from industry-leading companies. Over half of our technical team carries PhD degrees. We’re continually searching for the world’s best talent ‒ people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with us! ', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will contribute to state-of-the-art machine learning infrastructure and relevant software (e.g. distributed training, continuous model integration, data management, and evaluation at unparalleled scale). You will implement cutting-edge deep learning models accelerating model training time, improving performance, and tackling open problems together with research scientists. Last but not least, you will deploy your algorithms and models in our self-driving test vehicles and beyond. Responsibilities and required qualifications are as follows: ', "Our Machine Learning (ML) team is looking for world-class research scientists and engineers to turn Toyota's data advantage into an AI advantage. As the #1 car maker in the world with 100 million cars on the road today, we can learn from massive amounts of data to realize safe automated driving on a global scale. Our team's mission is to use all the data to identify and solve open research problems on the critical path to automated driving. We are working on some of the hardest challenges in the area of perception (e.g., scene understanding, 3D vision, tracking), prediction (e.g., handling uncertainty, predicting human behavior, trajectory forecasting), planning (e.g., understanding and reacting to human intent, multi-agent modeling), and general machine learning (e.g., self-supervised learning, imitation learning, active learning, multi-task learning, domain adaptation, robustness to the heavy tail of edge cases, efficient deep learning, large scale distributed training). We invent new Deep Learning algorithms that can leverage massive amounts of data (labeled or not), experimentally showing state-of-the-art performance (both in internal benchmarks and public ones, publishing at top Machine Learning and Computer Vision conferences and collaborating with our university partners). We work closely with other teams at TRI to transfer and ship our most successful algorithms and models towards world-scale long-term autonomy. ", 'Produce high quality tested code that enables large scale research and can be transferred to physical robots deployed in the real world. ', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Math, Physics or related field. Proficient in Python and Unix is a minimum. Additional knowledge of C++ / CUDA is a plus, experience with AWS as well. Good software engineering skills, grounded in principled best practices. Clear grasp on basic Linear Algebra, Optimization, Statistics, and Algorithms. Deep Learning and Computer Vision expertise not required - but recommended. Familiarity with PyTorch or other deep learning frameworks is a bonus. You are passionate about ML, both large scale engineering and research challenges, especially in the space of Automated Driving. You are a reliable team-player. You like to think big and go deeper. You care about openness and delivering with integrity.", 'Responsibilities:', 'Deep Learning and Computer Vision expertise not required - but recommended. Familiarity with PyTorch or other deep learning frameworks is a bonus. ', 'We strive to build a company that helps our people thrive, achieve work-life balance, and bring their best selves to work. At TRI, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds ‒ a fun environment with forward-thinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals. Come work with TRI if you’re interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars, enabling the elderly to age in place, or designing alternative fuel sources. Start your impossible with us. ', 'Build machine learning models using deep learning techniques for computer vision tasks such as semantic segmentation, object detection, video understanding, etc. ', '- Bring advanced mobility technology to market faster. ', 'You are passionate about ML, both large scale engineering and research challenges, especially in the space of Automated Driving. ', 'Work in a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with other teams across the company. ', '- Discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller, lighter, less expensive and more powerful. ', 'Proficient in Python and Unix is a minimum. Additional knowledge of C++ / CUDA is a plus, experience with AWS as well. ', 'You are a reliable team-player. You like to think big and go deeper. You care about openness and delivering with integrity.', 'Clear grasp on basic Linear Algebra, Optimization, Statistics, and Algorithms. ', 'Present results in verbal and written communications, including potentially at top international conferences. ', '- Develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence, access, and mobility. ', 'At Toyota Research Institute (TRI), we’re working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move, engage, and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions, injuries, and fatalities. Join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence, automated driving, robotics, and materials science. We’re dedicated to building a world of “mobility for all” where everyone, regardless of age or ability, can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life. Through innovations in AI, we’ll help… ', 'Responsibilities: ', ' ', 'lifications:', '- Develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash, regardless of the actions of the driver. ', 'Build machine learning models using deep learning techniques for computer vision tasks such as semantic segmentation, object detection, video understanding, etc. Address large scale challenges in the machine learning development cycle, especially around distributed training in the cloud and data engineering. Manipulate high-volume, high-dimensionality, structured data from driving logs for training and testing deep networks. Produce high quality tested code that enables large scale research and can be transferred to physical robots deployed in the real world. Stay up to date on the state-of-the-art in Deep Learning ideas and software, in collaboration with our Research Scientists. Work in a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with other teams across the company. Present results in verbal and written communications, including potentially at top international conferences. ', 'Address large scale challenges in the machine learning development cycle, especially around distributed training in the cloud and data engineering. ', 'Stay up to date on the state-of-the-art in Deep Learning ideas and software, in collaboration with our Research Scientists. ', 'Manipulate high-volume, high-dimensionality, structured data from driving logs for training and testing deep networks. ', '- Develop human-centered AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making to increase the quality of decisions (e.g. mitigate cognitive biases) and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. ', 'Good software engineering skills, grounded in principled best practices. ', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Math, Physics or related field. "]

Exciting opportunities, great benefits, creative team members, and the chance to learn from leading industry experts. We’re small but growing and are on the fast-track solving complex issues in exciting industries including Autonomous Vehicles, Smart Cities, IoT, MedTech, Defense and Exploration.', 'In casual conversations, do your readiest metaphors come from programming constructs?\xa0Do you correctly diagnose bugs over the phone while still in bed? you are able to pick up other languages quickly (e.g. Python)Are familiar with distributed data stores, such as HBase, Elasticsearch, and S3, as well as relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQLHave familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes\xa0as a plus Have familiarity with Dataflow, Spark, or other similar concepts as a plusHave knowledge of AWS or GCP as a strong plusHave a solid understanding of design patternsHave a solid understanding of various methods and tradeoffs for handling concurrencyHave strong familiarity with databases, data modeling, profiling, and performance optimizationHave the ability to balance shipping new products and features with addressing technical debt and investments in architecture and infrastructureHave experience with agile development processes and modern software development practices', 'Ensure your team delivers high output and mentor other engineers', 'Expanse is expanding rapidly and we’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform team.\xa0At Expanse, we believe that making the internet a safer place for our customers matters. The Expanse Platform team increases product velocity by partnering with teams to design, implement, deploy, and maintain software that furthers our platform vision and addresses common concerns that do not fall within the normal remit of any other team at Expanse. We do this by gathering requirements from teams across Expanse for common services, new data platform capabilities, and anything else that addresses global pain points. We work with stakeholders to prioritize, and partner with other Expanse teams to deliver.', 'Represent your team in architectural planning meetings and other interactions with peer engineering groups', '100% coverage of employee healthcare benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)', 'Company Overview', "As a Senior Engineer on our Platform team, you will build out a tier of services designed to provide standard capabilities to feature teams. Your work will reduce the effort required to build new products and features in the Expanse product line by providing a well-tested layer of shared services and libraries, as well as introducing common patterns and practices. You will draw upon your experience to rapidly investigate and prototype new functionality built upon cutting-edge technology, then switch to implementation mode to deliver products built upon your findings. Your customers are your peer engineers in other teams at Expanse and you’ll work with them to understand pain points in our existing system, create designs to address these challenge areas, and integrate your new capabilities with their products. You will represent your team in architecture roadmap planning sessions, interfacing regularly with other senior engineers, architects, and product managers. You will be a technical implementor within the team,\xa0developing\xa0shared platform capabilities end-to-end and maintaining them in production. keep current CloudReady hardware compatibility up-to-date as well as expand it to new devices\xa0Help shape CloudReady’s future through the definition, implementation and delivery of new features and We are seeking hands on K2/.NET Engineers and open to candidates of all levels from Jr. level up to Senior Engineers.  Must have experience with both K2 and .NET, and eligible for Public Trust Clearance (Green Card Holder or Citizen).', '(Have multiple positions so are also seeking Senior level developers)', '-Government consulting', '-3-5+ years of development or software engineering experience']

['', 'Wisk Aero provides\xa0equal employment opportunities\xa0(EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Wisk Aero abides by applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'BS in CS, AE, ME, EE, or equivalent2-5 years of relevant experienceExperience in front-end development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, REST, RPC, Websockets, SVG, or Canvas)Familiarity with C development, and comfort reading C code', 'BS in CS, AE, ME, EE, or equivalent', 'Familiarity with C development, and comfort reading C code', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience in front-end development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, REST, RPC, Websockets, SVG, or Canvas)', 'Understanding of physics-based engineering analysis and/or experience in aviation', 'Work with Flight Test, Certified Ground Control Software, Aerodynamics, and Controls teams, to name a few, to determine the future direction of this critical tool', 'Wisk Aero is an E-Verify employer.', 'Take ownership of an existing code base, and guide its continuing evolution to meet changing customer needsWork with Flight Test, Certified Ground Control Software, Aerodynamics, and Controls teams, to name a few, to determine the future direction of this critical toolMaintain and optimize existing solutions and codebases', 'Maintain and optimize existing solutions and codebases', '2-5 years of relevant experience', 'At Wisk, we believe that less time getting there means more time being there for the moments that truly matter.\xa0We are an urban air-mobility company dedicated to delivering safe everyday flight for everyone. Our self-flying air taxi, Cora, will make it possible to skip the traffic and get to where you’re going, faster. Join us to craft a better world by opening access to the sky.', 'We are located in Mountain View just a couple of hundred feet from Shoreline Lake and its surrounding walking/jogging trails. We offer a comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision and life insurance (company pays 100% of employee premium), alternative work schedule (9/80), flexible time off, 10 company holidays, a 401(k) plan with 50% company matching (no vesting period), commuter assistance, and education assistance. And on top of all that, we also offer a variety of perks such as free catered lunches, flight lessons, gym membership subsidies, snacks, drinks, fruits, employee referral bonus, charitable giving match, IP bonus program, happy hours and many more.', 'Understanding of physics-based engineering analysis and/or experience in aviationBuild custom integration between tools such as JIRA, Bitbucket, Bamboo, Polarion, Configuration Management, Puppet etc.', 'Requirements:', 'Desired:', 'Take ownership of an existing code base, and guide its continuing evolution to meet changing customer needs', 'Build custom integration between tools such as JIRA, Bitbucket, Bamboo, Polarion, Configuration Management, Puppet etc.', 'We are seeking a Full-stack Software Engineer to join our Ground Control Software team. You will maintain and develop a Javascript-based front end and mostly-C back end used today in flight testing our fleet of eVTOL aircraft.']

['', '\xa0full-time Lead Engineer/CTO opportunity', 'Check out a video of kids interacting with NoRILLA and teachers/administrators talking about their experiences:\xa0https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LorLd_6lALE', 'Golden Award\xa0', 'patented mixed-reality educational system', 'Reimagine Education', "We have recently received an NSF (Advancing Informal STEM Learning) grant in collaboration with Science and Children's Museums around the country to expand our Intelligent Science Stations/Exhibits. We are looking for a developer with strong technical skills, as a\xa0part-time RA position\xa0and/or longer-term\xa0full-time Lead Engineer/CTO opportunity\xa0for the right fit. Responsibilities will include taking the project further by developing new modules/games, computer vision algorithms and AI enhancements on the platform and deployment of upcoming installations. The project has both software and hardware components. Familiarity\xa0with computer vision,\xa0Processing/Java, game/interface development and/or\xa0robotics\xa0is a\xa0plus.", 'Mister Rogers Scholarship', 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'Looking for a Lead Software Engineer/RA for an exciting start up based on research in Human Computer Interaction at Carnegie Mellon University', 'IKEA\xa0', '\xa0part-time RA position', "Please contact\xa0nesra.yannier@gmail.com\xa0with your resume if you are interested to join our team and help make a difference in children's lives.", "improves children's learning by 5 times", "NoRILLA\xa0is a spinoff based on research in Human Computer Interaction at Carnegie Mellon University. We are developing a new\xa0patented mixed-reality educational system\xa0bridging physical and virtual worlds to improve children's STEM learning and enjoyment in a collaborative way. It uses depth camera sensing and\xa0computer vision\xa0to detect physical objects and provide personalized immediate feedback to children as they experiment and make discoveries in their physical environment.", 'National Science Foundation (NSF)', "Sprout's EdTech Refinery\xa0", 'computer vision', 'For more information:\xa0www.norilla.com', "multiple school districts, Children's Museum of Pittsburgh", "NoRILLA has been used at\xa0multiple school districts, Children's Museum of Pittsburgh,\xa0Carnegie Science Center\xa0and informal play spaces like\xa0IKEA\xa0and\xa0Bright Horizons. Research with over 200 children has shown that it\xa0improves children's learning by 5 times\xa0compared to equivalent tablet or computer games. It has been awarded\xa0Mister Rogers Scholarship,\xa0Sprout's EdTech Refinery\xa0grant,\xa0National Science Foundation (NSF)\xa0grants and\xa0Innovation Fellowship\xa0through the Center for Innovation and Entrepreneurship at CMU to turn our research into a start up to benefit society. It also recently received a\xa0Golden Award\xa0in\xa0Cultivating Curiosity\xa0at\xa0Reimagine Education.", 'Bright Horizons', 'Carnegie Science Center', 'Innovation Fellowship']

['', 'Develop web applications using Java, Objective-C, or C++.\xa0', 'Contact Email', 'Phone', 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Write mobile applications, create robust high-volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.\xa0', 'BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.\xa03-4 years of relevant work experience.\xa0Programming experience in Java, Objective-C, or C++.Experience in mobile application development. Preferred qualifications:\xa0Significant programming experience in either Java, Objective-C, or C++.\xa0Deep technical knowledge of mobile application development (either Android or iOS).\xa0Knowledge of UI frameworks (either Android, iOS, XML), MVP application design, and complex, reactive touch-based UI.', 'BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.\xa0', 'Significant programming experience in either Java, Objective-C, or C++.\xa0', 'About the job:', "software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information on a massive scale and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project key to the companies needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward. With your technical expertise, you manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions. Software Engineers have a penchant for solving complex and interesting problems. Pushing the boundaries of current mobile platforms, you will perform technological feats under constrained environments and will be presented with exciting challenges in native or mobile application development. Our Software Engineers in Mobile Applications work on many projects that carry varying responsibilities. You will build company products (Advertising, Android, Google+, Chrome, Earth, Gmail, Maps, Search, Wallet, or other exciting projects) for either Android or iOS. If you are an Android Developer, you will develop applications primarily in Java and using the Android SDK. You might design and develop open-source Android applications that are part of the Android Open Source Project or closed-source Google applications that are the interface to Google services on Android. If you are an iOS Developer, you will develop applications and SDKs primarily in Objective-C and using the iOS SDK. Our company is and always will be an engineering company. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on millions, if not billions, of users. At our company, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on massive scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications, and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, Social to Local, Our engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another.", 'Deep technical knowledge of mobile application development (either Android or iOS).\xa0', 'Contact Email: Nirav.Jethva@G2recruitment.com', 'Phone: 346-396-4077', '\xa0About the job:', '3-4 years of relevant work experience.\xa0', 'Knowledge of UI frameworks (either Android, iOS, XML), MVP application design, and complex, reactive touch-based UI.', '\xa0Responsibilities\xa0', 'Experience in mobile application development. Preferred qualifications:\xa0', 'Programming experience in Java, Objective-C, or C++.', 'Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.', 'Write mobile applications, create robust high-volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.\xa0Develop web applications using Java, Objective-C, or C++.\xa0']

", 'The role is highly visible in both technology and business and supports the key objectives of the executive management group to manage, maintain and leverage our data assets more effectively. ['', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', 'Here’s what you get:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.']

Create and implement software solutions to turn experimental research methods into a production-ready code base.  Lead the redesign and refactor of existing code to improve efficiency, operability, and performance while maintaining high-quality results.  Perform assessments of existing code base, to provide actionable recommendations for improvements.  Optimize code efficiency and parallelize across a massive computing cluster to enable researchers to quickly produce results.  Enforce and assure the quality of IHME software products through continuous integration, automated unit testing, code versioning, and code coverage tools. Strategic planning and supervision   Supervise and/or mentor other engineers.  Gather requirements.  Explore new technologies and make recommendations as to their adoption.  Provide input to timelines to deliver both iterative milestones and completed products. Research command   Exhibit command of the analytic components and methodologies of the research, and how they relate to key production tools, machinery, data, and diagnostics.  Exhibit command of the dimensions and uses of health data in IHME analytic pipelines.  Continually seek new knowledge and collaborate with researchers and faculty to gain a better understanding of analytical components and research methodology. General   Communicate clearly and effectively while contributing as a productive member of the team and the Institute as a whole.  Work closely with other team members to help them with relevant tasks, show them how to learn new skills, and help resolve problems across projects.  Participate in internal trainings. As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. DESIRED   Python most preferred  Experience with application containerization using tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, and Rancher.  Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing and regression. job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Our Perks', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', '===', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Required Qualifications', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', '.', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ']

['', 'Meeting-light culture', '\xa0', 'You want to be part of a team of the most talented, forward-thinking engineers in the industry', 'Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, HSA, Commuter, Life and Disability Benefits\xa0', 'Proficient in a major programming language', 'Experience in build, development, or release systems (e.g. Git, Jenkins, Chef, Docker)', 'Build tools and systems that make developers efficient and push high-quality codeDesign scalable and robust systems, and make decisions that will keep pace with the rapid growth of RipplingBuild relationships\xa0with developers across all of our teams to understand their needs and satisfy them with projects you develop', 'Strong CS knowledge', 'Experience in cloud infrastructure (Kubernetes, AWS ECS/EKS)', 'Rippling is the first way for businesses to manage their HR & IT — from payroll and benefits, to employee computers and apps — all in one, modern system.\xa0', 'About Rippling', 'Benefits:\xa0', 'Onsite meals', 'Rippling is an equal opportunity employer.', 'Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, HSA, Commuter, Life and Disability Benefits\xa0Uncapped PTOMeeting-light cultureOnsite mealsCompetitive compensation (salary, equity)', 'Rippling is headquartered in San Francisco and has raised over $200M from top-tier investors, including Founders Fund, Greenoaks Capital, Coatue Management, Kleiner Perkins, and YCombinator.', 'About The Role', 'Uncapped PTO', 'Competitive compensation (salary, equity)', 'In just 90-seconds, a company can set up (or disable) an employee’s payroll, health insurance, work computer, and third-party apps, like Gmail, Microsoft Office, and Slack. It’s the only platform that truly unifies every employee system, and automates all of the administrative work.\xa0', "What You'll Do:\xa0", 'Design scalable and robust systems, and make decisions that will keep pace with the rapid growth of Rippling', 'We’re looking for great software developers to join us in our journey and join the Developer Productivity team. We care a lot about laying the right infrastructure.\xa0Your work is the foundation on which all code is written, tested, and brought into production. We want to work with exceptional software engineers, who get bored at large companies.\xa0', 'Build tools and systems that make developers efficient and push high-quality code', 'Build relationships\xa0with developers across all of our teams to understand their needs and satisfy them with projects you develop', '3+ years of professional work experience', '3+ years of professional work experienceStrong CS knowledgeProficient in a major programming languageExperience in cloud infrastructure (Kubernetes, AWS ECS/EKS)Experience in build, development, or release systems (e.g. Git, Jenkins, Chef, Docker)You want to be part of a team of the most talented, forward-thinking engineers in the industry', 'Qualifications:']

job_title: Data Dev Ops Senior Cloud Engineer
job_text: ['', 'DevOps: 6 years (Required)', ' Please try out our core product before you apply. We’d like you to understand our products and have some understanding of our customers. Please include a cover letter. Make sure to discuss why you are interested in learning more about IMVU. Job applications without cover letters will not be considered. ', 'Develop tools and procedures to monitor and automate system tasks on servers and clusters in Cloud', 'Strong experience with environment and deployment automation, infrastructure-as-service, infrastructure-as-code, deployment pipeline specification, and development using Terraform.', 'Knowledge and Experience with CI/CD pipeline tools like Bamboo, Jenkins, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes. Experience in the automated unit, integration, and end-end testing. ', 'Requirements', 'http://', '4+ years’ experience in designing, building and managing large scale application infrastructure in AWS.', 'Expert Knowledge and Experience with CI/CD pipeline tools like Bamboo, Jenkins, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes. Experience in the automated unit, integration, and end-end testing. ', 'Ability to build systems that balance scalability, availability, and latency while solving different problems', 'Ansible: 3 years (Preferred)', 'Experience with Free-to-play/social games', 'Experience in AWS technologies such as EC2, Cloud formation, EMR Cluster, AWS S3, Splunk, and AWS Analytics. ', 'Worked in agile project management and flexible when managing multiple and changing priorities.', 'You Are GREAT At Doing This', 'Participate in 24X7 on-call rotation investigating and responding to issues', 'Big data related AWS technologies like EMR, HIVE, Spark, ETL, AWS Glue, Presto, Hadoop, Athena, RedShift', 'Please try out our core product before you apply. We’d like you to understand our products and have some understanding of our customers.', 'How To Apply', 'Please include a cover letter. Make sure to discuss why you are interested in learning more about IMVU. Job applications without cover letters will not be considered.', ' Ansible: 3 years (Preferred) DevOps: 6 years (Required) 6+ years as a software or systems engineer, with a minimum of 4+ years in release automation implementation. 4+ years’ experience in designing, building and managing large scale application infrastructure in AWS. Strong experience with environment and deployment automation, infrastructure-as-service, infrastructure-as-code, deployment pipeline specification, and development using Terraform. Experience managing applications in Amazon web services and familiarity with all of their core, compute, networking, storage, security, compliance, serverless, and analytics offerings including AWS VPC networking, and IAM roles, etc. Expert Knowledge and Experience with CI/CD pipeline tools like Bamboo, Jenkins, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes. Experience in the automated unit, integration, and end-end testing.  Support database environments including replication, log shipping, performance tuning, and backups Define, develop, and maintain monitoring and reporting infrastructure  accountability for the end-to-end availability, efficiency, reliability, and security of our Big Data infrastructure in both AWS and datacenter. Experience building custom tools that automate day-to-day operational tasks on the new AWS platform. Knowledgeable and accountable for setting the standards of our production environment. self-driven and passionate about solving complex problems while maintaining a learning mindset when engaging with the team on ideas and solutions. Worked in agile project management and flexible when managing multiple and changing priorities. Participate in 24X7 on-call rotation investigating and responding to issues ', 'Develop and manage applications in Amazon web services ', 'self-driven and passionate about solving complex problems while maintaining a learning mindset when engaging with the team on ideas and solutions.', 'The role -', 'AWS certified: Architect/DevOps/Big Data', 'Define, develop, and maintain monitoring and reporting infrastructure ', 'Knowledgeable and accountable for setting the standards of our production environment.', ' Develop tools and procedures to monitor and automate system tasks on servers and clusters in Cloud Develop and manage applications in Amazon web services  Knowledge and Experience with CI/CD pipeline tools like Bamboo, Jenkins, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes. Experience in the automated unit, integration, and end-end testing.  Experience in AWS technologies such as EC2, Cloud formation, EMR Cluster, AWS S3, Splunk, and AWS Analytics.  Ability to build systems that balance scalability, availability, and latency while solving different problems Familiarity with asynchronous messaging systems (e.g. Kafka, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ) ', 'Bonus Points', 'Support database environments including replication, log shipping, performance tuning, and backups', 'accountability for the end-to-end availability, efficiency, reliability, and security of our Big Data infrastructure in both AWS and datacenter.', 'Experience managing applications in Amazon web services and familiarity with all of their core, compute, networking, storage, security, compliance, serverless, and analytics offerings including AWS VPC networking, and IAM roles, etc.', '6+ years as a software or systems engineer, with a minimum of 4+ years in release automation implementation.', 'Experience with Qubole, Airflow, and Hortonworks highly desired', 'Senior Dev Ops Senior Cloud Engineer', 'Experience building custom tools that automate day-to-day operational tasks on the new AWS platform.', ' Experience with Free-to-play/social games Big data related AWS technologies like EMR, HIVE, Spark, ETL, AWS Glue, Presto, Hadoop, Athena, RedShift AWS certified: Architect/DevOps/Big Data Experience with Qubole, Airflow, and Hortonworks highly desired ', 'About Us', 'Familiarity with asynchronous messaging systems (e.g. Kafka, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ)']

['Pre-production', 'Required Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:', 'Customer-focused, results-driven, “can-do” attitude.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Excellent problem-solving skills.Strong attention to detail.Strong computer skills (MS Word; Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Internet).', 'Systems Engineering degree or certification.', '\xa0', 'Bachelor’s Degree in relevant engineering discipline (e.g. Electrical, Mechanical, Software, Biomedical, or Systems); or equivalent combination of education and experience.4+ years of relevant engineering experience, including product definition and systems design.Familiarity with Medical Device Directive (MDD), ISO 13485, FDA design controls or similar regulatory environment.Experience working with directly with customers to identify problems/needs and translate them into requirementsExperience developing and documenting product requirements for medical devices.Experience leading and/or participating in risk analysis and mitigation activities.', 'Prototyping/testing', 'Familiarity with Medical Device Directive (MDD), ISO 13485, FDA design controls or similar regulatory environment.', 'The Systems Engineer will use a systems approach to provide definition to product development projects, identify and specify critical interfaces, and ensure end products are suitable to meet the needs of their users. Through interaction with users, internal and external stakeholders, and subject matter experts, the Systems Engineer will define critical stakeholder requirements and ensure the requirements are met throughout the product development process. Depending on the level of complexity of a project, they may lead or participate in systems-level design activities, as well as have primary responsibility for user-focused risk analyses and mitigation plans.', 'Experience leading cross-functional projects.Experience interacting with medical device users and exposure to clinical usage of medical devices.Experience with Medical Device Directive (MDD), ISO 13485, FDA design controls or similar regulatory environment.Systems Engineering degree or certification.', 'Experience interacting with medical device users and exposure to clinical usage of medical devices.', 'Define, document, review, and communicate system-level requirements based on stakeholder needs analysis, ensuring the design of the device meets the needs of its users throughout its life cycle.', 'Responsible for recording and sharing technical knowledge gained with colleagues.', 'Ability\xa0to travel up to 20% of the time via car or plane.', 'Responsibilities\xa0', 'Education/Experience', 'Strong attention to detail.', 'Post-Release Monitoring & Maintenance', 'Experience leading cross-functional projects.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Sit/stand/walk for 8 hours per day.Ability\xa0to travel up to 20% of the time via car or plane.', 'Physical Requirements:', 'Experience working with directly with customers to identify problems/needs and translate them into requirements', 'Experience leading and/or participating in risk analysis and mitigation activities.', 'Experience with Medical Device Directive (MDD), ISO 13485, FDA design controls or similar regulatory environment.', 'Stakeholder Interviews', 'Strong computer skills (MS Word; Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Internet).', 'Requirements Management', 'Responsibilities\xa0include the following. Other duties may be assigned.\xa0To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily.\xa0Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.\xa0These positions can either be performed on location in the Plymouth (Minneapolis) office, or remotely with occasional travel to the home office. This is a 12-month contract position.', 'Work with customers and end-users to provide continuous validation throughout the systems lifecycle.', 'Manual creation', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Using a systems approach, lead cross-functional efforts to capture holistic definitions of medical device systems and interfaces.Work\xa0with customers and end-users to understand their needs, use-cases, operating environment and processes. ['', "We are a venture funded, seed-stage startup based in Austin, TX who are building the first smart shower system for hotels to save water, energy, and money on their monthly utility bills. ['', '•\tExperience with UI workflows and computer-aided workflows in particular', '•\tExpertise in the design of very large adaptive data structures and familiarity with mapping and localization', '•\tBS/MS or PhD in Robotics, Computer Science, or a related field', 'Company Overview', 'Job Summary ', "Those are a few of the characteristics that make our team members at IAM ROBOTICS the best around.\xa0We work hard, we are persistent, and we have fun. We are changing the supply chain industry by creating the world's first autonomous service robots. Join our innovative team that is being noticed: ROBOTICS BUSINESS REVIEW (RBR) named IAM Robotics a Global Top 50 Robotics Company 4 years in a row.", 'Benefits and Perks', 'We are seeking a software engineer to improve upon our mapping and localization software that enables our autonomous fleet of robots to intelligently navigate warehouse environments. A software engineer in this position will be expected to work in an Agile software development environment to design, develop, and test such software. This will require a software engineer that is experienced with using measurements from sensors such as inertial measurement units, LiDAR, cameras, odometry, and radar to generate a map of the environment that can then be used by our autonomous robots to localize themselves in.', '•\tDevelop algorithms that automatically create maps as well as aid human operators in creating maps', '•\tDefine our mapping architecture and approach', 'Qualifications and Skills ', '•\t401K', 'Responsibilities and Duties ', '•\tExcellent C++ programming and software design skills', 'Are you passionate about your work, strive for extraordinary results, enjoy contributing to the success of a team, and live to solve complex problems? IAM Robotics is different from the rest. We are different in how we treat our clients, different in how we work with each other, and different in the results we achieve. At IAM Robotics, we have fundamental behaviors that we call the IAM Way. It outlines the culture we exude and what we look for in each candidate. A few of those behaviors are being an active listener, exhibiting soft skills, owning your work, and having the ability to be principled yet lighthearted!', '•\tExperience with linear algebra and 3D geometry', '•\tHealth, medical, dental, and vision', '•\tExperience building and deploying ML pipelines', '•\tUnlimited PTO', 'Begin your journey with IAM ROBOTICS by applying today.', '•\tShort- and long-term disability', '•\tExperience in machine learning and computer vision', '•\tExperience with 3D graphics', '•\tLife insurance', '•\tExperience with perception sensors including LIDAR and cameras', '•\tDevelop ML algorithms that detect physical features in the world', '•\tDevelop data structures that enable efficient queries about static parts of the driving environment']

['', 'HighPoint is searching for a Systems Engineer Level II, to provide expertise and knowledge in program design, coding, testing, debugging and documentation with technical knowledge of all phases of applications systems analysis and programming. The Systems Engineer Level II will analyze designs and prepare functional specifications for information systems solutions which address business requirements for the Government client. This support will translate Business Requirements into systems functional specifications and active participant in system design specifications. ', 'This requirement is in the task order stage of the process and each candidate considered will be fully screened by our recruiter and technical team lead and if chosen to proceed in consideration, provisioned a Contingent Offer Letter. job_title: Software Engineer Lead- Azure Cloud Services
job_text: ['', 'Hands-on experience with Service-Oriented, Network-centric architectures, designs and applications', 'Hands-on Development, Deployment and Sustainment of Microsoft Azure cloud-first applications using Service Fabric, CosmosDB, IoTHub, Service Bus', 'Proficiency in TCP/IP based applications where networking architecture and core infrastructure technologies are critical. For example, applications that have security, crypto, key and certificate authentication & authorization, certificate management and rotation, SAML or other security protocols and technologies is a plus', 'Experience as a member of teams that support 24x7 production environments', 'Proven experience building, sustaining and optimizing large-scale distributed enterprise systems at web scale, services-oriented front-end and back-end design', ' Proven experience building, sustaining and optimizing large-scale distributed enterprise systems at web scale, services-oriented front-end and back-end design Hands-on Development, Deployment and Sustainment of Microsoft Azure cloud-first applications using Service Fabric, CosmosDB, IoTHub, Service Bus Hands-on experience with Service-Oriented, Network-centric architectures, designs and applications Experience in designing, analyzing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems Proven experience with message-oriented applications in a high-transaction online commerce business applications or equivalent high Transaction-Per-Second technical requirement environment Proven experience with Microsoft .NET Framework and C# programming language Experience with other commercial programming languages and framework environments such as C, C++, Python or Go are a plus Demonstrated ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks Proven ability to translate insights into business recommendations  Deep knowledge in application development and supporting production environments and teams Experience with other cloud platforms such as Amazon AWS or Google App Engine are a plus Experience implementing and managing high capacity, redundant, and mission critical environments  Comfortable with development and support of database-centric applications is a plus Experience in server operations, system administration, network configuration and systems engineering  Proficiency in TCP/IP based applications where networking architecture and core infrastructure technologies are critical. For example, applications that have security, crypto, key and certificate authentication & authorization, certificate management and rotation, SAML or other security protocols and technologies is a plus Experience as a member of teams that support 24x7 production environments ', 'Web API', 'Highly Proficient with the following Microsoft Azure Platform Resources Azure IoT Hub Azure Service Bus Azure CosmosDB Azure Service Fabric Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Azure App Services  ', 'Azure IoT Hub', " Experience coding using Agile and DevOps engineering practices Ability to provide expertise and leadership in translating complex business requirements to functional, non-functional and technical designs, adopts designs that prioritize user experience and extensibility to mobile application use, and addresses quality issues by asking questions and stating assumptions to mitigate gaps in developer understanding. Expertise in established design patterns, contributes to new design patterns for platform, and ability to negotiate and communicate designs by facilitating and socializing ideas through technical specification documentation. ', ' Hands-on experience working with various databases (DynamoDB, MySQL, ElasticSearch) and data pipeline technologies. ', ' Experience with a microservice architectures is a huge plus. ', ' We believe in empowering our people to be successful. ', ' Design & deliver thoughtfully crafted REST APIs to drive the interactions between our client applications and backend services. ', 'What Sets Us Apart', ' Experience with continuous integration and delivery tools. ', ' Collaborate and mentor other engineers while providing thoughtful guidance using code, design, and architecture reviews. ', ' Design and implement highly reliable financial transaction systems that integrate deeply with money movement technologies (think card rails, ACH, RTP, etc). ', ' Debug production issues across our services infrastructure and multiple levels of our stack. ', ' Leverage a broad skill set and help us implement and learn new technologies quickly. ', ' Provide and receive design and implementation evaluations and improve per iteration. ', 'About Earnin', ' Design & implement features robust enough for our exploding scale. ', '  Design & implement features robust enough for our exploding scale.   Drive the implementation of new features - break down complex problems into its bare essentials, translate this complexity into elegant design, and create high quality, maintainable code.   Create and maintain test automation to enable continuous integration and development velocity.   Design and implement highly reliable financial transaction systems that integrate deeply with money movement technologies (think card rails, ACH, RTP, etc).   Design & deliver thoughtfully crafted REST APIs to drive the interactions between our client applications and backend services.   Collaborate and mentor other engineers while providing thoughtful guidance using code, design, and architecture reviews.   Work cross-functionally with other teams (data science, design, product, marketing, analytics).   Leverage a broad skill set and help us implement and learn new technologies quickly.   Provide and receive design and implementation evaluations and improve per iteration.   Debug production issues across our services infrastructure and multiple levels of our stack.   Think about distributed systems & services and care passionately about producing high-quality code.   Generate ideas and write experiment idea documents for regular presentations to the team during our weekly experiment idea review sessions   Assist with opportunity sizing and experiment readouts  ', 'About The Team']
