['', 'What to Expect in Our Hiring Process:', '2+ years of experience writing scripts to automate manual processes.', 'We offer a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, stock options, unlimited PTO, 401K,\xa0Tuition Reimbursements, and much more!\xa0', 'Phone conversation with Talent Acquisition to learn more about your experience and career objectives and talk about SecurityScorecard', 'Technical video interview with our Principal Site Reliability Engineer', 'Improve operational efficiency by creating automation to increase self-service capabilities and reduce manual interactions with the Infrastructure Services Team.', 'Additional Information:', 'About SecurityScorecard:', 'Strong troubleshooting and analytical skills.', 'Video interview with the hiring manager', 'Demonstrable experience with any programming or scripting languages, such as Bash, Perl, Python, PHP, or PowerShell.', 'SecurityScorecard embraces diversity. We believe that our team is strengthened through hiring and retaining employees with diverse backgrounds, skillsets, ideas, and perspectives. We make hiring decisions based upon merit and do not discriminate based on race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status.', 'Design, build and maintain systems and processes for internal use.', 'Identify opportunities for automation or improvement of existing service processes.', "You have a Bachelor's degree in computer science, equivalent STEM field, or equivalent work experience.", 'Experience working with a remote and distributed team.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Improve operational efficiency by creating automation to increase self-service capabilities and reduce manual interactions with the Infrastructure Services Team.Identify opportunities for automation or improvement of existing service processes.Design, build and maintain systems and processes for internal use.Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve internal services to maintain stability and optimal performance.', 'What you will do:', 'SecurityScorecard is an industry-leading cybersecurity company backed by Google, Sequoia, and Riverwood. Our mission is to make the world a safer place. We measure your and your vendors\' cyber-health by assigning a security rating of "A" through "F" based on outside-in, non-intrusive data. Headquartered in NYC with over 200+ employees globally, raised over $110M USD, used by 1,000+ enterprise customers, and rating 1.5 million companies.', 'Benefits:', 'Benefits', 'We have created a new category of enterprise software, and our culture has helped us be recognized as one of the 10 hottest SaaS startups in NY for two years in a row.', 'Who you are:', 'As an Engineer on the Infrastructure Services team, you will help us build, improve, and maintain internal tools that are used to manage the SecurityScorecard SaaS products.', 'Passion for identifying problems and quickly shifting to solutions.', "SecurityScorecard's SaaS-based platform enables enterprises to rate and understand the security risk of companies instantly, non-intrusively, and from an outside-in perspective.\xa0Our Comprehensive security ratings, advanced data analytics, and actionable insights discover Third-Party Vulnerabilities & Security Gaps In Real-Time. Nearly 1,000 customers use our platform for self-monitoring, vendor risk management, cyber insurance, board reporting, and M&A. We have created a new category of enterprise software, and our culture has helped us be recognized as one of the 10 hottest SaaS startups in NY for two years in a row. Our investors include both Sequoia and Google Ventures. We are scaling quickly but are ever mindful of our people and products as we grow.", "You have a Bachelor's degree in computer science, equivalent STEM field, or equivalent work experience.Demonstrable experience with any programming or scripting languages, such as Bash, Perl, Python, PHP, or PowerShell.2+ years of experience writing scripts to automate manual processes.An aptitude for solving problems through the use of technology.Passion for identifying problems and quickly shifting to solutions.Strong troubleshooting and analytical skills.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Experience working with a remote and distributed team.Available to work in timezone UTC -3 to -8.", 'An aptitude for solving problems through the use of technology.', 'Available to work in timezone UTC -3 to -8.', 'Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve internal services to maintain stability and optimal performance.', 'Phone conversation with Talent Acquisition to learn more about your experience and career objectives and talk about SecurityScorecardVideo interview with the hiring managerTechnical video interview with our Principal Site Reliability EngineerTechnical video interview with our Infrastructure Services EngineerVideo interview with SVP', 'Technical video interview with our Infrastructure Services Engineer', 'Video interview with SVP']

['Commitment Level:', 'We are seeking a QA Automation Engineer on a contract basis who will be responsible for setting up environment, deploy new products, manage infrastructure, automate processes and suggest solutions to problems. ', 'Opportunity:', 'Hours & Location:M-F, 40 hours/week. This position is located onsite at our Customer’s Sunnyvale, CA location. ', ' ', 'Job Summary:The candidate will work with the team to help set up and maintain tools and test frameworks. You will help with leading strategies for performance, scalability, longevity, and resiliency testing. You will be part of a world-class product engineering team that’s paving the path for new ways for enterprises to consume ever-increasing cloud services. This team is responsible for building highly scalable, globally distributed, real-time interconnection platform, and are looking for a senior test automation engineer. ', 'Must Haves:• 5+ years of relevant experience with a variety of different testing techniques such as UI Testing, Automated Testing (API & UI), Test Driven Development Strategies and others• 1+ years hands-on professional software development experience• Experience with SDLC including unit tests, code management and build tools (Maven, SBT), code management tools (Github) and deployment tools (Jenkins)• Strong experience in developing automation using libraries like Selenium WebDriver, Apache HTTPClient, Karate• Knowledge of Unix, SQL, Java, JavaScript, Python, HTML, JSON, TestNG, Maven and source control Git/bit bucket desired• Real-world experience with continuous integration and delivery using public cloud such as AWS, Azure or GCP and container technologies such as Docker is required• Hands-on experience with Agile-scrum methodology and Test-driven development• Hands-on skillset with RESTful API development and/or testing is desired• Knowledge of advanced networking technologies and services including MPLS, VPLS/VPWS, Ethernet, IP/VPN routing protocols and architectures, IP security/SSL, IP multicast, IPv6, and wired/wireless LAN infrastructures is a strong plus but not required.• A sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s successEducation:• BS in computer science or equivalent ', 'Now for the Perks!Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program.', "Our Customer is one of the leading global interconnection platforms and the world’s largest data center provider. They connect the world's leading businesses to their customers, employees and partners inside the world's most connected data centers in 52 markets across five continents. Their mission is to protect, connect and power the digital economy. ", '**Must be able to provide I9 verification as this role is W2 only** ', 'What You’ll Do:• Responsible for setting up test environment and automation jobs.• Setup test tools to validate environment, application and solutions throughout the delivery lifecycle.• Manual testing, UI feature test automation and API integration test automation• Manage continuous integration and continuous delivery pipeline to deliver maximum efficiency.• Responsible to write clean, testable, readable and maintainable Java code that performs automation efficiently.• Responsible for troubleshooting, issue diagnosis and propose appropriate regression tests to prevent re-occurrence of issues.• Provide technical guidance for team members and coworkers on development and operations.Communicate and highlight any potential risks ', 'Company Industry:\xa0 TechnologyOpportunity: The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a\xa0QA Automation EngineerCommitment Level:\xa040 hours per week, 90% remote, contract through December 2020 ', 'Company Industry:']

['', 'What We Offer', 'More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.', 'Experience working with complex web applications and backend service', 'You are a very hands-on coder and lead by example to demonstrate what software craftsmanship is all about.', 'Experience with architectural patterns, API design and building large-scale applications', "Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, and restricted stock grants", 'Total closed home sales as of 2018: $85 billion+Lead Real Estate Agents: 1,300+Homes bought and sold with Redfin as of 2018: 170,000+Monthly website/mobile traffic: 27 million+ unique visitorMetro area served: 85+ marketsStates served: 42 plus Washington, D.C.', 'Redfin is revolutionizing the $75 billion real estate industry. We use data, beautiful software, and innovative design to put customers first at every step in the home-buying and selling process. Get ready to dive headfirst into our award-winning website and mobile apps, solving complex business problems in a highly visible, customer-centric way. If you value doing great work in a collaborative environment, join our team!', "When you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.", 'Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, and restricted stock grants', "You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.", 'Lead complex multi-person technical projects from initial design to national launch, identifying pitfalls and coaching colleagues along the way', 'Lead Real Estate Agents: 1,300+', 'States served: 42 plus Washington, D.C.', 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'Total closed home sales as of 2018: $85 billion+', 'The Search Experience team takes an incredibly complicated home search process and brings it online into an addictive, empowering, and delightful map-based experience. The map is the core of Redfin’s search experience: our users love it and tell us time and time again that it helps them in their home searching journey. The team owns user experience that shows data about hundreds of homes in a performant way, and creates search APIs that are used by all of Redfin Engineering. We want to go further—drive user growth via word of mouth, SEO, and SEM; improve performance; find ways to differentiate and personalize our home search experience in ways no other real estate site can, and much more.', "You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.", 'The ability to handle ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and empathize with customers', 'Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.', 'As Senior Software Engineer for the Search Experience Team, you will get to use your judgment and guide the team on when to reuse existing Redfin technologies and when to champion the adoption of new ones. You’ll need to balance advocacy for our ambitious long-term technical vision with delivering results amidst our ever-evolving business needs.\xa0', 'Metro area served: 85+ markets', "Lead complex multi-person technical projects from initial design to national launch, identifying pitfalls and coaching colleagues along the wayYou are a very hands-on coder and lead by example to demonstrate what software craftsmanship is all about.Better those around you by driving team efficiency improvements, mentoring teammates to strengthen individual skills and share your learning for building simple and effective user interfaces and API’sWhen you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.", '5+ years of industry experience in the area of full-stack development and technical leadExperience working with Java, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Relational Database and SQLExperience working with complex web applications and backend serviceExperience working on web and backend service performanceExperience with architectural patterns, API design and building large-scale applicationsThe ability to handle ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and empathize with customers', 'Experience working with Java, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Relational Database and SQL', 'Homes bought and sold with Redfin as of 2018: 170,000+', 'Redfin facts:', 'Skills & Experience\xa0', '5+ years of industry experience in the area of full-stack development and technical lead', 'Monthly website/mobile traffic: 27 million+ unique visitor', 'Better those around you by driving team efficiency improvements, mentoring teammates to strengthen individual skills and share your learning for building simple and effective user interfaces and API’s', 'The Role', 'Experience working on web and backend service performance']

['Docker', 'Fully self-sufficient in software development concepts and methods, coding, and debugging', ' Detailed knowledge of the Python programming language Object Oriented Design and Programming Linux Operating System / Command Line Interface Bash ScriptingWeb Technologies: Angular, CSS Windows Operating System Testing Methodologies ', 'Enjoys working with users to educate and provide guidance in helping them to achieve their goals and to improve their productivity', 'Linux Operating System / Command Line Interface', 'Windows Operating System', ' Senior Software Engineer ', 'The Ideal Candidate Will Have The Following Attributes', 'Executes independently to develop mock-ups or requirement prototypes for features of moderate to high complexity. Can effectively articulate these to relevant stakeholders', 'Detailed knowledge of the Python programming language', 'Testing Methodologies', 'Job Description', 'Web Technologies: Angular, CSS', 'Senior Software Engineer (Python)', 'Object Oriented Design and Programming', 'Bash Scripting', 'Demonstrates flexible adaptability in working with still maturing, generation-dependent software development and testing methods', 'Description', 'Proactively engages with users to identify and deliver against new automation opportunities', "Senior Software Engineer (Python)158978San Jose, CA, United StatesSep 8, 2020 DescriptionJob DescriptionAt Xilinx, we are leading the industry transformation to build an adaptable, intelligent world. ARE YOU bold, collaborative, and creative? At Xilinx, we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to revolutionize the world of technology. We believe that by embracing diverse ideas, pushing boundaries, and working together as ONEXILINX, anything is possible.Our culture of innovation began with the invention of the Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA), and with the 2018 introduction of our Adaptive Compute Acceleration Platform (ACAP), has made a quantum leap in capability, solidifying our role as the adaptable platform supplier of choice. From the start, we have always believed in providing inventors with products and platforms that are infinitely adaptable. From self-driving cars, to world-record genome processing, to AI and big data, to the world's first 5G networks, we empower the world's builders and visionaries whose ideas solve every day problems and enhance people's lives.If you are PASSIONATE, ADAPTABLE, and INNOVATIVE, Xilinx is the right place for you! At Xilinx we care deeply about creating meaningful development experiences while building a strong sense of belonging and connection. We foster an environment of empowered learning, wellness, community engagement, and recognition, so you can focus on work that matters - world class technology that improves the way we live and work. We are ONEXILINX. Senior Software Engineer We are looking for an experienced software engineer that shares our enthusiasm for providing test infrastructure that enables reliable software and hardware testing. ['3 years of experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, or, AngularJS ', 'Experience through full life cycle of at least 2 large scale commercial application development project ', 'Experience in cloud computing environments, such as AWS ', '', '\xa0 ', 'At least 5 years doing object oriented software development ', 'AWS certified ', 'Preference for experience with secure government information systems, Human Capital Management systems, and/or ERP systems ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES: ', 'The Monster Government Solutions Product Development team is a mature software development shop that builds, creates, and supports multiple products for our clients in solving their Human Capital Management needs. ['', 'IDEAL CANDIDATE', "Genesis10 is seeking a Senior Software Engineer for a permanent position with our e-commerce\xa0client.Summary:We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with deep experience developing knowledge graphs for specific purposes, e-commerce experience a big plus. In this role, you will be the technical leader delivering the centerpiece of a huge-scale system that pulls order out of uncertainty across one of the largest data sets on the planet.Our catalog team faces challenges no one else has tackled -- we start with data of extraordinarily wide-ranging quality. When in your career will you have the chance to define such an ambitious project and bring it to Production? Join the team in architecting data and knowledge management that enables millions of people to make or supplement their income. Where else can you have that kind of impact on people's lives?We use programming and machine learning at immense scale to define products, and to establish a myriad of relationships among them (competing, accessory, variation, etc.) and between them and the rest of the world (price guidance, item signed by ), to make selling and buying on client's websiteincreasingly vibrant.The Structured Data R&D team uses a wide variety of tools across the stack, including state of the art machine learning technologies including our own proprietary high-performance vector space processing technology. We deploy in a number of frameworks including Docker and Kubernetes, OpenStack and public cloud, as well as highly optimized bare metal installations, and make extensive use of Hadoop and Spark. We also use a number of programming languages including Java, Python, Scala, Go, R, our creativity is not limited by language choice - we are free to choose the best solution to the problem.IDEAL CANDIDATESoftware Engineer with deep experience developing knowledge graphs for specific purposes, e-commerce experience a big plus BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or equivalent, with 5 or more years in software engineering.Proven expertise in building platforms that support virtualization, scale, security, availability, performance, and automation.Hands on experiences in building and optimizing Big Data pipelines and architectures with Spark.Responsibilities:", 'Genesis10 is seeking a Senior Software Engineer for a permanent position with our e-commerce\xa0client.', "Enlarge client's portfolio of capabilities through coherent APIs for internal users, sellers, and third parties.", 'Strong data analytic skills, experiences in ontology modeling and natural language processing are big pluses.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Proven background in modeling software systems and excellent programming skills.', 'Proven expertise in building platforms that support virtualization, scale, security, availability, performance, and automation. Experience with Docker and Kubernetes a plus.', 'About Genesis10:', "Research, assess, recommend, and develop technologies in the context of client's Marketplace product requirements. Build prototypes and convince business units of the benefits of the new technologies. Contribute to client's patent portfolio.", "If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, apply today!Genesis10 provides access to career opportunities with over 40 clients in the Twin Cities. As the #3 ranked firm for Business and IT consulting in Minnesota, we offer a variety of opportunities whether you are looking for contract, contract-to-hire, or permanent positions. Let's connect today!Benefits of Working with Genesis10:•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Medical and dental insurance available- including HSA•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Bi-weekly payroll•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Established consultant re-marketing program with our 50+ local clients!•\xa0\xa0 \xa0401k plan•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Downtown Minneapolis/St. Paul parking allowance•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Delivery Director for employee success and support•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Referral program with the opportunity to earn additional incomeAbout Genesis10:Genesis10 is a Professional Technology Services Firm providing Staffing, Workforce Optimization and Domestic Outsourcing Solutions. If you are a high performing business or IT professional with solid, referenced experience, we want to meet you. ['', 'You are involved in building and optimizing our own Bear Operating Systems, an infrastructure to control and monitor our globally deployed robots. You are building the remote monitoring, record-replay as well as resource scheduling. When it comes to distributed computing, you lead the way in your team and are the go-to expert in regards of system design and architecture. No matter if it is backend or frontend - you own the system full stack like no other. Furthermore, you enjoy driving optimization strategies and realizing ambiguous work streams. Your organization skills, go-getter personality and people-focussed mentality are the right tools to grow into a tech lead role.', 'Required Skills:\xa0\xa0Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova', 'Bear Robotics was started in 2017 to address the increased pressure faced by the food service industry around wages, labor supply, and cost efficiencies. Our company has developed a robot named Penny enabled by artificial intelligence and able to autonomously shuttle food from a kitchen out to tables and bring dishes back for cleaning. If you want to dive into deep-tech with an A+ team, Bear Robotics is a perfect place for you.', 'BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering\xa0', 'Strong knowledge and solid hands-on experience of full stack system\xa0', 'Your role & responsibilities:', 'Experience in Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova and/or Linux', 'Company Description:', 'Proven skills in distributed system design and architecture\xa0', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering\xa0Strong knowledge and solid hands-on experience of full stack system\xa0Proven skills in distributed system design and architecture\xa0Experience in Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova and/or Linux']

job_text: ['', 'Write robust code; demonstrate its robustness through automated tests.', 'Work as a member of a team, helping the team respond quickly and effectively to business needs.', ' Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Management or related field and five (5) years progressive, post-baccalaureate experience as a Software Engineer or in a related role. In lieu, of Bachelor’s degree and five (5) years of progressive, post-baccalaureate, will accept a Master’s degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Management or a related field and three (3) years of experience as a Software Engineer or in a related role. ', 'Our Customers:', 'Object-oriented programming experience, such as in Java/Spring, Scala or C#; and,', 'Massive Scale:', 'Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Management or related field and five (5) years progressive, post-baccalaureate experience as a Software Engineer or in a related role. In lieu, of Bachelor’s degree and five (5) years of progressive, post-baccalaureate, will accept a Master’s degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Management or a related field and three (3) years of experience as a Software Engineer or in a related role.', 'Help manage exabytes of data using the latest and greatest technologies such as Kafka, Kubernetes and Docker.', 'Requirements', 'Build the system that enables the analysis of machine data and provides framework for monitoring and troubleshooting of anomalous incidents at a greater speed and in greater volumes than ever before achieved.', 'Responsibilities', 'Design and implement extremely high-volume, highly available fault-tolerant, scalable backend systems that process and manage petabytes of customer data.', 'NoSQL/Elastic Search;', 'Experience With', 'SQL;', 'What we do:', ' Build the system that enables the analysis of machine data and provides framework for monitoring and troubleshooting of anomalous incidents at a greater speed and in greater volumes than ever before achieved. Work with emerging technologies including data analytics, cloud SaaS, machine learning, and nosql/graph databases. Solve difficult problems in data representation, data exploration, and data discovery. Design and implement extremely high-volume, highly available fault-tolerant, scalable backend systems that process and manage petabytes of customer data. Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and reliability of our backend systems. Write robust code; demonstrate its robustness through automated tests. Work as a member of a team, helping the team respond quickly and effectively to business needs. Push the envelope on deployment, management, and reliability of NoSQL databases. Help manage exabytes of data using the latest and greatest technologies such as Kafka, Kubernetes and Docker. ', 'Microservices architecture, REST APIs;', 'Message broker;', 'Solve difficult problems in data representation, data exploration, and data discovery.', 'Work with emerging technologies including data analytics, cloud SaaS, machine learning, and nosql/graph databases.', 'Funding and Growth', 'Multi-threaded programming and distributed systems;', 'Performance characteristics of commonly used data structures.', 'Mission:', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and reliability of our backend systems.', ' NoSQL/Elastic Search; SQL; Microservices architecture, REST APIs; Message broker; Multi-threaded programming and distributed systems; Object-oriented programming experience, such as in Java/Spring, Scala or C#; and, Performance characteristics of commonly used data structures.', 'Push the envelope on deployment, management, and reliability of NoSQL databases.']

['', 'About us', '\ufeffSupports and drives project management functions from a technical standpoint.\xa0', 'Prior experience in the development and implementation of WMS, WCS, or WES\xa0', 'Sr. Software Engineer', 'Applied Resource Group is seeking a Sr. Software Engineer for one of our growing Industrial Automation clients located near Cincinnati, OH.\xa0', 'Strong Analytical and problem solving skills', '\xa0', 'About Applied Resource Group Applied Resource Group, headquartered in Atlanta, GA, is a full service IT consulting and solutions organization specializing in Application Development, Enterprise Resource Planning, and IT Infrastructure. Our solutions include IT Consulting, Outsourcing, Recruiting, and Staffing. At Applied we understand that organizations are built upon the talented individuals that comprise them and we embrace the diverse candidates that contribute to our success. Our goal is to help you achieve that success by documenting your needs to help you achieve your career goals. Contact us today to speak with one of our talented Account Executives which serve as your recruiting contact to build one-on-one relationships, offering personalized attention and career guidance. As more of our lives are spent online, the time offline is truly rare. So, our goal is to make it easy to bring great people together, face-to-face.With more than 4.5 million successful events brought to life using our award-winning event management platform, we'd say we're well on our way. As we look to the future, we're focused on continuing to innovate and create the best technology to bring joy through the power of in-person connection. And that's where you come in!If you want a job where there’s more enthusiasm than there is red tape, where ideas are sought after and celebrated, and where hard work changes the course of human history, then Cvent and our newest product, Social Tables, may be the place for you!At Social Tables, Lead Software Engineers have a deep understanding of JavaScript fundamentals and architecture. They are also explicitly charged with vetting the technical rigor of our solutions, within their team. They are able to focus on both the breadth of our software, as well as the depth.What You Will Be Doing Responsible for upholding technical rigor on their team Serve as technical tie breaker for all technical decisions on the team Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineers on your team Work closely with our Principal Engineer to contribute to and develop our technology roadmap and architecture Work closely with the Engineering Manager, Product Manager, and Product Designer on breaking down problems into achievable chunks Write full-stack JavaScript Use Node.js on the server Restify for APIs, GraphQL for web apps LaunchDarkly for feature flagging React on the browser, and when we need more complex state management on the browser, use Redux Three.js/WebGL for our 3D visualizations Build browser assets with Webpack MySQL for database storage AWS for infrastructure, deploying services with ECS and Lambda Develop on local machines, not in the cloud What You Will Need For This Position Proven experience planning, building, and scaling high-quality SaaS products Ideally 4+ years in JavaScript and Node.js. Though, we will also welcome proven engineering leaders who are eager to immerse themselves in mastering JavaScript Passion for writing code that is scalable, maintainable, reusable, and well-tested Experience leading a team through mentoring and technical guidance Comfort debugging large applications and refactoring them to well-tested components and services Ability to represent the business when speaking to customers or community members Ability to identify and proactively communicate infrastructure, product features, and technology issues that cut across multiple products Cvent offers a fun, collegial work environment tailored to sharpening your technical skills and growing as a software professional. While we have evolved from startup to mid-sized company, our Technology Team has preserved an entrepreneurial and merit-driven culture where meaningful initiative and contribution are recognized and rewarded.Need more reasons to consider us? We offer competitive salary packages and an extensive benefits package for all full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision, semi-annual bonuses, 401K Match, gym membership discounts and other great perks!At Cvent we celebrate, support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics.Cvent maintains a drug-free workplace.", 'React on the browser, and when we need more complex state management on the browser, use Redux', 'Comfort debugging large applications and refactoring them to well-tested components and services', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineers on your team']

Applicants requiring a reasonable accommodation due to a disability at any stage of the employment application process should contact Human Resources at (515) 247.MYHR (6947) or at 1.866.524.MYHR (6947).', 'Who we are:', "At this time, we're not able to consider candidates needing sponsorship now or in the future or those needing work authorization for this role.\xa0\xa0(This includes students on F1-OPT, F1-CPT, J-1, etc.) However, we’d hope you continue to keep us in mind for future\xa0opportunities.\xa0", 'what', 'Provide mentorship and informal leadership to team members', "Associate's or Bachelor's degree with a preference in a science, technology, engineering, or math related field or equivalent work experience (6 years of experience equates to an Associate’s degree when defining “equivalent work experience”)", 'We help people build\xa0the kinds of lives they dream about—empowered by financial security and stability. We started in 1879 (yes, 1879) as an insurance company. Today, we’re a member of the\xa0FORTUNE 500® and a global investment management leader.', 'A career, not just a job.\xa0Principal is a place where you can learn and innovate. Do important work. Make an impact. And achieve your professional goals.', 'Doing what’s right has been a part of who we are for more than 140 years. We focus on taking care of not only our employees, customers and advisors, but also the people who live in the communities where we do business.', 'Willing to consider applicants at multiple job levels.\xa0', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to of age, race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy, national origin, citizenship status, disability, genetic characteristics, sexual orientation, marital status, domestic partner status, military status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by law.', "What you'll do:", 'Competitive pay, benefits, perks and more.\xa0We’ll reward you for the skills and experience you have.\xa0Find out more.', 'Competitive pay, benefits, perks and more.\xa0We’ll reward you for the skills and experience you have.\xa0Find out more.Respect for your unique perspective.\xa0Diversity, inclusion and empowerment are at the core of our culture.A career, not just a job.\xa0Principal is a place where you can learn and innovate. Do important work. Make an impact. And achieve your professional goals.The ability to have a great job\xa0and\xa0a great life.\xa0Sure, work is important. But so is your family. And your friends. And your community. That’s why we provide the flexibility needed to find the right balance between your job and the rest of your life.', "Associate's or Bachelor's degree with a preference in a science, technology, engineering, or math related field or equivalent work experience (6 years of experience equates to an Associate’s degree when defining “equivalent work experience”)6+ years of professional object oriented software development experience", 'U.S Insurance Solutions IT is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer to join their team that provides impactful service to our Life Insurance policy individual customers as well as business market clients. In this role, you will work to provide the best experience for those clients through innovative technology platforms. Additionally, you will partner with other IT teams in Life and across the enterprise to define and deliver new capabilities that ensure a quality customer experience.', 'How we hire:', 'Work Authorization/Sponsorship', 'As a member of the team you will share responsibilities in:', 'Work in an agile/lean and DevOps environment with a focus on product development', 'Once you apply, your application is\xa0reviewed by our talent team. Generally within a few weeks, the team makes interview selection decisions and communicates those via email.\xa0If selected, you’ll receive an email from Principal Talent Team to complete a pre-recorded interview on your own time.\xa0Be sure to check your email frequently and follow the steps shared to submit timely.', 'For positions with Principal Global Investors, you will be required to follow\xa0a Code of Ethics which covers a number of obligations related to personal and business conduct as well as personal trading activities for you and members of your household. These same requirements may also apply to other positions across the organization.', 'Additional preferred technical experience:', 'So that’s what we do. As far as who we are, well,\xa0we believe that\xa0how\xa0we do things is just as important as\xa0what\xa0we do.', 'Qualifications:']

['', 'Become a technical expert in logistics space and develop a deep understanding of the Flexport platform', 'Prior experience building EDI integrations is a huge plus.', 'Experience implementing Software Testing Life Cycles (STLC) and the attention to detail to create high quality test cases', 'A good understanding of and experience with integration standards and transports including SFTP, Soap/Rest APIs, AS2, XML, XSD, JSON and EDI.', ' Become a technical expert in logistics space and develop a deep understanding of the Flexport platform Participate in customer/partner calls, understanding their requirements and articulating Flexport’s platform and API capabilities. Develop an understanding of EDI standards being used by our enterprise partners for logistics data Build robust and scalable integration solutions which are repeatable and easily supportable. Utilize an integration platform such as Dell Boomi to build reliable data integrations between Flexport’s APIs and our partner systems, while providing visibility and transparency to both technical and non-technical cross functional teams. Work closely with Flexport’s Product and Engineering teams, proactively surfacing technical gaps between customer asks and Flexport’s current service and technical capabilities, and collaborate closely to address them. Partner with Sales and Operations to help answer customer questions and scope the technical effort required to build integration solutions. ', ' Demonstrated experience delivering solutions with enterprise integrations platforms such as Dell Boomi, Tibco, BEA, Mulesoft or similar Experience with integrating SaaS and on-prem ERP, Fulfillment, Order Management, or Warehouse Management systems Experience leading technical discussions with internal and external stakeholders, including customers’ technical teams and their system integrators. Prior experience building EDI integrations is a huge plus. ['', 'Qualifications', 'If you are interested in the mix of building a scalable Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) product and consulting for clients (no travel), this is the role for you.', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer to help accelerate our growth.', 'This is a challenging and varied technical role. Experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails is ideal, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps, and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.', 'Company Description', "Converge is conveniently located next to Georgia Tech's campus at Tech Square, but we are currently operating almost entirely as a remote team for the convenience and safety of our team.", 'This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service (SaaS) products.', 'We automate the collection and visualization of social media, digital, and offline marketing data, saving our clients time, increasing their accuracy and job satisfaction, and adding tremendous efficiency to the client reporting process.', 'If you want to the long-term upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the short-term upside of profit-sharing, this is the role for you.', 'If you want to work with a tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills, this is the role for you.', 'We are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to work on our Marketing Reporting Automation Platform and a variety of Products for an intriguing range of clients.', 'The developer in this role will contribute to both our SaaS product as well as client-facing Services projects.', 'Converge is a dynamic Marketing Reporting Automation Software Company in Atlanta, funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.', 'Converge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability, accuracy, and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every month.']

job_text: ['Atlanta;TX', 'Dallas;MO', 'Denver;MN -Minneapolis;UT', 'Salt Lake City;IA', 'Des MoinesCareer Category: Experienced ProfessionalFull/Part Time: Full-TimeRegular/Temporary: RegularDate Posted: 2020-09-03What you\'ll doAs an experienced Software Engineer in our Corporate Enterprise Documentsbusiness area, you\'ll help drive technology strategy direction both forour Corporate business and Enterprise Document areas within an AgileenvironmenIf you enjoy the balance of staying technical AND allowing you to actstrategically- this is the role for you!You\'ll have the opportunity to:Create and transition forms/documents into digital formats for Global usageand impact.Partner with 3rd party vendors to provide solutions to the business.Work with tools that use AI and machine learning to automate documentidentification and data extraction, to improve operational efficiency anddecrease customer response times.Be a key player in driving business outcomes using innovative technologyproducts as well as communicating business objectives to the technical teamthrough thought leadership.Demonstrate independence working in more than one software development layerof the solution. Participate in technical design of features.Work as part of dynamic team with culturally diverse members, that have abroad range of both technical skillsets and business knowledge, ondevelopment of solutions.Access a wide array of platforms and services for use in applicationdevelopment that provide flexibility and scalability of design.Participate in a business culture that has a focus our key businessobjectives, but also supports our community through various initiatives.What you\'ll get from usCompetitive pay, benefits, perks and more. We\'ll reward you for theskills and experience you have.Respect for your unique perspective. Diversity, inclusion and empowermentare at the core of our culture.A career, not just a job. Principal is a place where you can learn andinnovate. Do important work. Make an impact. And achieve your professionalgoals.The ability to have a great job and a great life. Sure, work is important.But so is your family. And your friends. And your community. That\'s why weprovide the flexibility needed to find the right balance between your job andthe rest of your life.QualificationsAssociate\'s or Bachelor\'s degree with a preference in a science,technology, engineering, or math related field or equivalent workexperience (6 years of experience equates to an Associate\'s degree whendefining "equivalent work experience")3years of professional object oriented software development experience(Java, JavaScript, Python, etc.)Experience working within the cloud environment (AWS, Azure, etc).Additional preferred technical experience:API integrations (Rest, SOAP, Salesforce, etc.)WebSphere or Liberty Server knowledgeUnderstanding of and or experience with the Agile Scrum methodology.Proficiency with both BA and QA practices as part of software development.Familiarity with DevOps practices, such as Continuous Integration,Automation, and Monitoring.Job LevelWilling to consider applicants at multiple job levels.LocationWilling to consider remote candidates.How we hireOnce you apply, your application is reviewed by our talent team. Generallywithin a few weeks, the team makes interview selection decisions andcommunicates those via email.If selected, you\'ll receive an email fromPrincipal Talent Team to complete a pre-recorded interview on your own time.Be sure to check your email frequently and follow the steps shared to submittiLearn more about our and find answers to frequently asked questions.Additional InformationWork Authorization/SponsorshipAt this time, we\'re not able to consider candidates that need any type ofimmigration sponsorship now or in the future or those needing workauthorization for this role. (This includes, but is not limited tostudents on F1-OPT, F1-CPT, J-1, etc.)Principal', 'Kansas City;CO']

job_title: Senior DevOps Engineer (Data Science for Cancer Treatment)
job_text: ['', 'Tools like Docker, Kubernetes and Terraform', 'Strong foundation in DevOps and Cloud Infrastructure (AWS environment)', 'Security knowledge', 'This Opportunity Offers:', 'Startup experience', '401k Matching', 'Equity', 'Python scripting', 'As the second DevOps hire, you’ll design reliable and secure infrastructure that can scale to the needs of a rapidly growing business.', 'Flexibility on working from home / remote once “things return to normal”', 'An innovator in data science for healthcare is looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to design and build the infrastructure that supports their growing, enterprise tech platform.', "Apply now with your resume and we'll set up a time to discuss!", 'Competitive Salary ($160k - $180k+ DOE)', 'Desired Skills and Experience:', 'Founded in 2017 by an experienced team (CEO led last HealthTech company to successful exit) and backed by $32M in funding from top VCs, they’re partnering with some of the largest healthcare payers and employers in the country to bring more accuracy to millions of radiology exams, significantly reducing the chances of cancer misdiagnoses.', 'Tech stack includes: AWS, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Jenkins, etc.', 'Top Health/Vision/Dental/Life Benefits', 'Deep knowledge of Linux/Unix systems', 'Competitive Salary ($160k - $180k+ DOE)EquityTop Health/Vision/Dental/Life Benefits401k MatchingGreat perks like a stipend towards your “home office” setupFlexibility on working from home / remote once “things return to normal”', 'Strong foundation in DevOps and Cloud Infrastructure (AWS environment)Deep knowledge of Linux/Unix systemsPython scriptingTools like Docker, Kubernetes and TerraformSecurity knowledgeStartup experience', 'Great perks like a stipend towards your “home office” setup']

['', 'Experience with Embedded BLE Devices is a plus.\xa0', 'Who we are:\xa0', 'Live your life.\xa0\xa0Relax with 20 days of paid time off and celebrate 10 paid holidays in your first year. Save for your future with a company-sponsored 401(k) plan.\xa0Look forward to saving money on tickets to the San Diego Zoo, movies, restaurants, and so much more with our exclusive employee discount program.\xa0', 'We’ve got you covered.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Read more about our company & culture here:\xa0https://www.tandemdiabetes.com/careers/life-at-tandem\xa0and see what our customers are saying here:\xa0#tsliminthewild\xa0', 'Invest in your career.\xa0\xa0Tandem offers all employees access to training and development programs and courses to help keep your career and skillset updated, not outdated.\xa0', 'Invest in your career.\xa0\xa0', '5 years+ experience in the field of embedded software application development, preferably for medical devices, including detailed design, design testing, testing documentation, and prototype fabrication, including experience with conceptual design to market release.\xa0', 'Our team aims to improve the lives of our users by developing and supporting next generation Automated Insulin Delivery (AID) software used in clinical trials. We are also responsible for integrating new Tandem pumps and features with existing AID software.', 'Stay well with us.\xa0\xa0', 'What’s in it for you?', 'What’s in it for you?\xa0', 'Designed, assembled and supported from our San Diego, CA headquarters, we are the makers of the only color, touch-screen insulin pump that is capable of remote feature updates and compatibility with continuous glucose monitoring.\xa0', 'We’ve got you covered.\xa0\xa0We offer a robust benefits package to support your health and your family.\xa0From medical, dental, and vision, to flexible spending accounts for both health and dependent care – Tandem’s got you covered!\xa0', 'Experience with Python is a plus', 'Here at Tandem, Diabetes is all we do and we are dedicated to making the lives of people with diabetes better and better through relentless innovation.\xa0“In Tandem” means together, and we strive to embody that in every aspect of our business.\xa0We believe that working in tandem, not in isolation, is the best way to continually exceed expectations.\xa0', 'What you need for this position:\xa0', "An ideal candidate is able to work independently with minimal supervision, as well as be a team player that can lead and mentor junior engineers. If you're a strong software engineer with BLE experience and have a passion for helping improve the lives of others, we may have the job for you.\xa0", 'Experience with JavaScript is a plus.\xa0', 'Live your life.\xa0\xa0', 'Who we are:', 'Celebrate in Tandem.\xa0\xa0', 'Stay well with us.\xa0\xa0Enjoy the outdoors during your workday by biking, running, or walking on one of our nearby trails. Or, break a quick sweat at our onsite gym, or check out our offsite gym, which boasts luxurious amenities including specialty fitness classes and state-of-the-art equipment.\xa0', 'What you’ll be doing:\xa0', 'We’ve been named one of the fastest growing insulin pump companies in the U.S! Why? Tandem has created the simple-to-use t:slim X2 Insulin Pump, which is the smallest pump available, the only pump capable of remote feature updates, and the first CGM-enabled pump approved to let users make treatment decisions without pricking their finger. Tandem engineers take an innovative, user-centric approach to the design and development of products for people with diabetes. Join our software team and work with cutting edge technology to truly make an impact.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in the “C” programming language.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Computer Sciences or related field or equivalent combination of education and years of applicable experience.\xa0', '5 years+ experience in the field of embedded software application development, preferably for medical devices, including detailed design, design testing, testing documentation, and prototype fabrication, including experience with conceptual design to market release.\xa0Experience with Embedded BLE Devices is a plus.\xa0Experience in the “C” programming language.\xa0Experience with JavaScript is a plus.\xa0Experience with Python is a plusAdept at seeing change as an opportunity to improve business performance and campaigning for it when necessary.Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Computer Sciences or related field or equivalent combination of education and years of applicable experience.\xa0', 'What you’ll be doing:\xa0\xa0', 'What you need for this position:\xa0\xa0', 'Adept at seeing change as an opportunity to improve business performance and campaigning for it when necessary.', 'Celebrate in Tandem.\xa0\xa0Join in monthly employee get-togethers, tacos for Cinco de Mayo, corned beef for St. Patrick’s Day, costume-contest for Halloween, and the annual JDRF walk.\xa0']

We strive to empower our teams to tackle the world’s largest problems for good and for profit. services', 'As an Infrastructure Engineer, you will be responsible for maintaining and improving the infrastructure on our geospatial analysis platform, proactively and reactively resolving any technical issues from data ingestion to machine learning model deployment.', 'Work closely and collaboratively with software engineering to deploy and operate our cloud processing pipeline', 'We at Descartes Labs built a supercomputer in the cloud that currently ingests 10 Terabytes of near real-time geospatial data per day. Our micro-services based Platform is developed from the ground up, cloud-native, and we see a peak load of nearly a billion API calls a day. We aim to supercharge machine learning scientists to ask geospatial and temporal questions not previously possible, in order to better understand the changing physical world. We are looking for a backend infrastructure engineer with strong micro-services and Kubernetes experience to join our team!', 'You belong here! If your experience and interests match with some of the above, we want you to apply. Nobody is an expert on all or even parts of our stack. When you join our team you will deepen and widen your knowledge as your grow with us over the next few years.', 'Finally, candidates are invited to a virtual interview panel with ~5 members of the Engineering team', 'Understanding of best practices for large-scale always-available web services', 'We pride collaboration over ownership, iteration over perfection, principles over rules, and discussion over directivesWe’re using the world’s top technology to solve the world’s largest problems with a strong focus on sustainability, environment, and impact scienceWe look at Descartes Labs as a work environment where people are included, treat their colleagues with professional regard and respect, and thrive as a resultWe’re a highly collaborative company that constantly promotes success through teamworkWe strongly encourage and enjoy a flexible work environmentDescartes Labs offers a generous compensation package including a competitive salary; choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'The Company:', 'Descartes Labs offers a generous compensation package including a competitive salary; choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'Build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring, and operations', 'Our Interview Process:', 'Help test and optimize our API’s which encompass our geospatial analytics platform', 'We’re headquartered in Santa Fe, New Mexico and have offices in New York, San Francisco, and Minneapolis.']

['', 'You will work with a range of technologies: Those that have supported our clients for years, and those at the leading edge of the sports software industry. ', 'As the world’s leading sports data and technology company,\xa0Stats Perform\xa0powers sports. We are trusted by more than 1800 clients around the globe to enhance fan engagement and maximize team performance by analyzing sports data from more than 400,000 games a year with unrivaled speed and accuracy. We power sports on and off the field through data feeds, video analysis, sports content and research, player tracking and customizable digital solutions.', 'A minimum of 3 - 5 years in similar experience is required. Experience with API support/development is highly desirable.', 'Required:', 'Job Title: Strategic Tier 3 Support Developer', 'The Tier-3 engineering team diagnoses and solves technical issues at 3rd level of software support, escalates to other internal teams, and at times, collaborates with external providers.', 'Location: Southern USA (Remote)', 'In this exciting position, you will provide the highest level of technical support for video, data feeds and professional-team analysis software. We are looking for drivers of excellence: Highly skilled problem-solvers, who in addition to resolving issues, will lead through disseminating knowledge throughout our global organization, and sharing best practices.', 'Previous experience working with some, but not all, of these technologies: Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle PL/SQL, Microsoft. NET Framework, IIS 7, SCCM and Virtual servers, Windows & Linux environments, Java, Perl, Node, C#, PHP, JavaScript, AWS developer associate skills, Scripting: batch, VB, PowerShell. ', 'JOB DETAILS', 'Reports To (title): ', '\u200b', 'Tier-3 engineers work closely with other systems analysts, developers, sports subject matter experts and product owners to improve customer satisfaction.', 'Career Level: CL 3', 'The Tier-3 Team mentors Tier-2 and Tier-2 support teams, and updates technical documents for internal and public use.', 'The support provided by individual engineers requires broad technical knowledge and benefits from specializing in one or more technologies.', 'Location: Southern USA (Remote) ', 'Department: IT', 'Line Management Responsibility: No', 'HERE IS MORE ABOUT US:', 'Strong technical background in writing SQL queries is mandatory. ', 'We are looking for developers who find a creative outlet through problem-solving.\xa0Who are team members first. Who enjoy learning as much as teaching. Who embody the mission of serving clients.\xa0', 'Due to the nature of when sports take place, there may be times when the candidate will need to be available during after-hours.', 'The Tier-3 support team provides technical assistance and remote troubleshooting as part of a global 24/7/365 support organization.', '\ufeffPosition Summary – Tier-3 Software Support Developer', 'The Tier-3 team detects, investigates, recreates and resolves problems. The team tracks defects through internal systems, sets up test environments to reproduce issues, tests solutions and implements the solutions.']

['', 'With our deep expertise in cloud-enabled technologies and knowledge of the healthcare industry, we have built an innovative data integration and management platform that allows healthcare\xa0payers\xa0access to data that has been historically siloed and inaccessible. ['', 'This is an ideal opportunity for someone who has a passion for building leading-edge software and is driven to help build a successful SaaS product used by thousands of happy businesses. ['Collaborate with other Platform Bring-up Engineers across product teams to continually improve our firmware design, development, and deployment practices. ', 'Meraki is headquartered in the Mission Bay area of San Francisco, with beautiful views of the Oracle Ballpark and the Bay beyond. There are also locations in San Jose, Chicago, and Austin. All location offer a generous benefits package. ', 'As a Senior Embedded Engineer, you will focus on the following: ', 'When things don’t go quite as planned—a board doesn’t boot, an LED doesn’t light, a fan doesn’t spin—use a JTAG debugger or logic analyzer or work with the hardware team to debug the problem. ', 'Platform bring-up Engineers take the lead in building new Meraki products by integrating everything from bootloaders to web servers on prototype hardware. Our device firmware is built on Linux and open-source software. We work individually and in small teams to release several new products each year. ', 'Have experience reading schematics and data sheets. ', 'Develop, port, and debug Linux device drivers. ', 'Meraki Software Engineers breathe life into our cloud-managed networking devices, which range from switches, routers, and wireless access points to desktop phones and security cameras. We leverage real-time telemetry from thousands of deployed networks spanning the globe to continuously improve the performance and stability of our products. ', 'Know common bus protocols like I2C, SPI, and MDIO. ', 'Are comfortable using network protocol analyzers, logic analyzers, hardware debuggers, and source-level debuggers to troubleshoot problems at all layers of the stack. ', 'Upstreaming Linux patches. ', 'Own projects from block-diagram concepts, to prototype boards that don’t boot, all the way to shipping product. Collaborate with our Hardware Engineering team on component selection and high-level architecture for new Meraki products. Collaborate with our manufacturing partners to develop secure, reliable, and scalable manufacturing processes. Integrate vendor board support packages and software development kits with our firmware and build system. Develop, port, and debug Linux device drivers. When things don’t go quite as planned—a board doesn’t boot, an LED doesn’t light, a fan doesn’t spin—use a JTAG debugger or logic analyzer or work with the hardware team to debug the problem. Collaborate with other Platform Bring-up Engineers across product teams to continually improve our firmware design, development, and deployment practices. ', 'Have strong systems and networking foundational knowledge (systems architecture, memory hierarchy, storage subsystems, LANs, routing). ', 'Bonus points for:', 'You are an ideal candidate if you:', ' ', 'Experience with multi-threaded or parallel programming. ', 'BS/MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent experience ', 'Integrate vendor board support packages and software development kits with our firmware and build system. ', 'Have solid experience with ethernet switching chipsets (i.e. Broadcom, Marvell, etc.). ', 'At Cisco Meraki, we’re challenging the status quo with the power of diversity, inclusion, and collaboration. When we connect different perspectives, we can imagine new possibilities, inspire innovation, and release the full potential of our people. We’re building an employee experience that includes appreciation, belonging, growth, and purpose for everyone.', 'Collaborate with our manufacturing partners to develop secure, reliable, and scalable manufacturing processes. ', 'Cisco is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetic information, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected basis. Cisco will consider for employment, on a case by case basis, qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records. ', 'BS/MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent experience Have 5+ years advanced programming skills in C and/or C++ for operating system kernel & systems development. Have solid experience with ethernet switching chipsets (i.e. Broadcom, Marvell, etc.). Have strong systems and networking foundational knowledge (systems architecture, memory hierarchy, storage subsystems, LANs, routing). Have expert knowledge of embedded systems development concepts, including cross-platform development and build tools (GNU toolchain, OpenWRT, buildroot, Yocto), bootloaders (U-Boot, coreboot, UEFI), kernel configuration, device drivers, device trees. Know common bus protocols like I2C, SPI, and MDIO. Are comfortable using network protocol analyzers, logic analyzers, hardware debuggers, and source-level debuggers to troubleshoot problems at all layers of the stack. Have experience reading schematics and data sheets. ', 'Have expert knowledge of embedded systems development concepts, including cross-platform development and build tools (GNU toolchain, OpenWRT, buildroot, Yocto), bootloaders (U-Boot, coreboot, UEFI), kernel configuration, device drivers, device trees. ', 'Upstreaming Linux patches. Experience with multi-threaded or parallel programming. ', 'Collaborate with our Hardware Engineering team on component selection and high-level architecture for new Meraki products. ', 'Own projects from block-diagram concepts, to prototype boards that don’t boot, all the way to shipping product. ', 'As a Senior Embedded Engineer, you will focus on the following', 'Have 5+ years advanced programming skills in C and/or C++ for operating system kernel & systems development. ']

job_text: ['', 'Active Directory - Install, Configure, Backup and Restore, Troubleshoot LDAP requests, and AD Replication. ', 'Knowledge of database technologies. ', 'Windows Systems administration, troubleshooting, performance tuning, and monitoring. ', 'Job Title:  Senior Windows System Engineer   - Remote / Telecommute', 'Job Description: ', 'Windows Containers.', 'End-user support for server infrastructure and development environments. ', 'Additional skills: ', 'GitOps. ', 'Additional skills:', 'Job Description:', 'Proactive monitoring of systems and applications. ', 'Virtualization (VMware and/or KVM). ', 'CSI-IT-098@CYNETSYSTEMS.COM', 'SCCM, AD, DNS, DHCP. ', 'Leverage cost-effective third party solutions (open source or commercial) were financially beneficial to do so. ', 'Experience with performance monitoring, tuning, troubleshooting, etc. ', "Windows Systems administration, troubleshooting, performance tuning, and monitoring. Work closely with the business to understand requirements and to develop technical specifications and solutions. Take over the maintenance and administration of custom tools written by in-house development engineers. Active Directory - Install, Configure, Backup and Restore, Troubleshoot LDAP requests, and AD Replication. Define requirements for current and future tools development. Automate as many processes as possible, writing tools, scripts, etc. as necessary. Provide technical solutions that are sustainable, supportable, and scalable. Fully understand the current system's architecture and suggest new solutions. Leverage cost-effective third party solutions (open source or commercial) were financially beneficial to do so. End-user support for server infrastructure and development environments. Proactive monitoring of systems and applications. Participate in long-term strategies for IT and Engineering Operations. On-call as needed with participation in 24/7 support. ", 'Responsibilities: ', ' ', 'Define requirements for current and future tools development. ', 'Job Title:  Senior Windows System Engineer   - Remote / Telecommute ', 'Must have: ', 'Experience with web technologies and application servers. REST APIs. Virtualization Company experience. GitOps. Windows Containers.', 'On-call as needed with participation in 24/7 support. ', 'Strong Communication (Written and Verbal). ', 'Knowledge/experience with Networking as it relates to systems (TCP/IP, IP ROUTING, SSH/SFTP/SCP, DNS, NFS, CIFS, SSL, HTTP, SMTP, etc.). ', 'Job Location: San Jose, CA ', 'Virtualization Company experience. ', '5+ years’ experience working as a Windows Systems Admin/Engineer. ', 'Job Type: Contract ', '5+ years’ experience working as a Windows Systems Admin/Engineer. Virtualization (VMware and/or KVM). SCCM, AD, DNS, DHCP. Strong scripting and automation skills (Powershell). Knowledge of database technologies. Server-related technologies (e.g. RAID systems, backups, SAN, etc.). Security best practices as related to systems. Experience with performance monitoring, tuning, troubleshooting, etc. Knowledge/experience with Networking as it relates to systems (TCP/IP, IP ROUTING, SSH/SFTP/SCP, DNS, NFS, CIFS, SSL, HTTP, SMTP, etc.). Strong Communication (Written and Verbal). ', 'Take over the maintenance and administration of custom tools written by in-house development engineers. ', 'Server-related technologies (e.g. RAID systems, backups, SAN, etc.). ', 'Provide technical solutions that are sustainable, supportable, and scalable. ', 'Job Location: San Jose, CA', 'Experience with web technologies and application servers. ']

['', 'Medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employeesOpen vacation time (and people actually use it!)Weekly Happy HoursPet Friendly WorkplaceMonthly team dinnersFree LunchGym membership reimbursementFun company and team outings and trips because we play just as hard as we work!Education reimbursementEmployee referral bonuses to encourage the addition of great new people to the teamPlus, unlimited snacks and beverages in our kitchen!', 'Design and implement highly scalable backend systems and algorithms for high throughput, performance, reliability and latency.', 'Experience with GraphQL, WebSockets (highly preferred).', "Nice to have's:", 'Design and implement highly scalable backend systems and algorithms for high throughput, performance, reliability and latency.Work closely with rest of the team members to develop, test, deploy, and operate high quality software.Architect web/mobile applications for company products.Deliver technically challenging products.Create data models and designs using SQL, NoSQL & in-memory databases.Stay up to date on modern security design principles, threats & preventive implementations.Learn new company technologies and work effectively in a fast paced dynamic environment.', 'Experience with Django framework.Experience with GraphQL, WebSockets (highly preferred).Experience as a team lead or in a supervisory/management role of a team of web and database developers.Experience with Node.js or Angular.js (highly desired).Prior experience experience working for an enterprise SaaS company is a plus!', 'Have you ever found yourself or a loved one waiting hours in a hospital Emergency Room to get care? Do you wish your physicians were more accessible and easier to make appointments with? Our work saves lives and helps hospitals cut tens of millions of dollars in operational costs, while improving the quality of care they’re able to deliver.', 'Experience with Python Flask or Python Django.', 'Fun company and team outings and trips because we play just as hard as we work!', "Why You'll Love it Here:", 'Please note that all Qventus recruiting is conducted by Qventus employees, using Qventus email addresses. job_title: Sr. Software Engineer (C#.NET, Xamarin, React, PHP)
job_text: ['Qualifications:\xa0', '• Minimum 5 years of development experience in C# .NET for MS-Windows', ' • Minimum 5 years development experience in PHP', "We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help us deliver high-quality software products and features by leading, fostering, and individually contributing to a growing engineering team.  Responsibilities:\xa0  •   Oversee and drive the end-to-end architecture of the product • Design solutions that are enterprise scalable and maintainable • Understands business requirements and participates in business requirements gathering activities to architect software solutions • Lead cross-functional teams to identify and assess issues, evaluate potential solutions and align on actions and expectations • Provide informal coaching and mentoring to team members to ensure they understand the software architecture for solution delivery and aid in their technical development • Determine and enforce overall architectural principles, frameworks, and standards • Produce appropriate artifacts such as functional and operational requirements, and software prototypes • Evaluate and increase the program's effectiveness, performs technology and risk assessments and adapts the program to new requirements as necessary • Combining all elements of the program design and testing it to ensure the program works as intended • Collaborate with the QA team to ensure proper test plan, test coverage, test execution, and defect remediation • Ensure that we are continually raising our standard of engineering excellence • Drive research, case studies, and prototypes on leading-edge technologies and how they can be leveraged • Guide the rollout of new technologies to products Qualifications:\xa0 • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent years of experience • Minimum 5 years of development experience in C# .NET for MS-Windows • Minimum 5 years development experience in C# .NET for iOS (Xamarin) • Minimum 5 years development experience in JavaScript, React • Minimum 5 years development experience in PHP • Minimum 5 years development experience in SQL • Experience with networking protocols (TCP/UDP) • Experience building scalable REST services and consuming third-party API’s • Experience working with AWS\xa0 ", 'Responsibilities:\xa0', ' • Minimum 5 years development experience in C# .NET for iOS (Xamarin)', ' • Minimum 5 years development experience in JavaScript, React', ' • Minimum 5 years development experience in SQL', "• Experience working in an Agile environment using tools like Jira or similar • Additional assignments related to product development assigned by the company's Head of Technology"]

Document the solution design and the systems requirements for selected prototype, gather feedback and complete final design.  Develop, test and correct defects of the approved solution design. Support the solution deployment in the specified system environment. Support defect corrections and enhancements to the deployed solution. Actively research and further own knowledge in related areas and improve solutions as needed.', 'Actively research and further own knowledge in related areas and improve solutions as needed.', 'Analyze sample artifacts and data from previous projects and propose solutions to identified use cases.', 'Currently pursuing Bachelor in Computer Science. Advanced programming skills in Python and other scripting languages. Requirement analysis, software design, development and testing skills. Familiarity with Natural Language Processing tools using Python including reading, parsing and tokenization of word documents. Familiarity with SQL and Non-SQL databases, web development tools, and data stream processing frameworks (Apache spark or similar). Experience working in various software development methodologies like Waterfall and Agile models. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong Interpersonal Skills.', 'Your background', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills.', 'Familiarity with Natural Language Processing tools using Python including reading, parsing and tokenization of word documents.']

Spark), data pipeline tools (ie. Airflow) and/or databases (ie. Snowflake, PostgreSQL). Capable of quickly building expertise on an as-need basis on new tech stack.', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'Met client SLAs for delivery, quality, and currency of data in Sentinel environments']

['Apex Systems has partnered with our client in their search for a Senior SQL Server Developer / Data Engineer to fill a full-time need supporting existing development teams. Successful Senior SQL Server Developer / Data Engineer should have strong experience with SQL query optimization, query writing (SQL & T-SQL), Integration Services (SSIS), Stored Procedures and a knack for code related improvements.\xa0 This individual will also drive DB standards.\xa0 They are looking for a Senior Developer, NOT a Reporting Analyst.\xa0 The team is currently remote but will want the candidate to be local in case they have to come insite once a month eventually.\xa0 If you are interested please reach out.\xa0 Must be a Citizen, No Sponsorships!\xa0']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Analyst Experience, Full Stack)
job_text: ['', 'Then let’s talk!', 'Do you enjoy building user experiences and rock-solid APIs? Are you passionate about metrics and using them to understand how your user works? Do you love building new things, solving problems, and understanding how a system works, end-to-end? Do you relish putting your head down and focusing on delivering features, but are also adept at direct engagement with your users, UX designers, product management and peer engineers? Do you find satisfaction in collaborating with other hardworking people that you can both help develop and learn from yourself?', 'Understand our security analysts and users’ pain and address it', 'We’ll ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please let us know if you need accommodation of any kind.', '5+ years of full-stack development experience', 'This role will be based out of our offices in Herndon, Virginia. ', 'Extensive experience developing web applications and APIs', 'We’ve built an extensive web application and API that helps our customer deal with the complexity that is security operations. Our team’s main focus is improving the experience for our own security analysts, who use the product every single day to keep our customers safe. ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'You’ve studied - you have a BA, BS, or MS in computer science or a related field, or equivalent experience.You’ve coded - you are comfortable in object-oriented languages like C#, C++, or Java; you have a solid grasp of algorithms, data structures, and design patterns; and you’ve got a least 3 years of industry experience as a software engineer to prove it.You collaborate - you can explain your work, you can ask great questions, you can listen to your peers and your customers, and you like to give and receive feedback.You stay focused - you want to ship software that solves real problems for real people, now.You’re a professional - you understand that it’s not enough to write working code.
