['', 'Experience with deep learning or machine learning', 'About Unity Technologies', 'Extensive experience in building performant, robust, large scale data/distributed systems', 'Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'Develop Machine Learning infrastructure systems', 'Champion development best practices that ensure quality and velocity within the team', 'Requirements', ' Design, develop, own, and operate a world-class large-scale data platform Contribute to the architecture and development of large-scale distributed systems Collaborate cross-functionally to identify opportunities across Unity for data-driven solutions Champion development best practices that ensure quality and velocity within the team Develop Machine Learning infrastructure systems ', 'Significant experience with large scale data systems and related technologies we well as experience in architecting data solutions', ' Experience with deep learning or machine learning ', 'Superb communication skills', 'Responsibilities', ' #SEN', 'Contribute to the architecture and development of large-scale distributed systems', 'Collaborate cross-functionally to identify opportunities across Unity for data-driven solutions', 'Design, develop, own, and operate a world-class large-scale data platform', 'Unity is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', ' Expertise in Scala, Python, Go, C#, or Java Extensive experience in building performant, robust, large scale data/distributed systems Extensive experience with a major cloud service provider such as GCP AWS, and Azure Superb communication skills Significant experience with large scale data systems and related technologies we well as experience in architecting data solutions ', 'Expertise in Scala, Python, Go, C#, or Java', 'Headhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this Web site or directly to managers. ['Responsible for handling unstructured tasks and the issues addressed are less defined requiring new perspectives, creative approaches and with more interdependencies ', 'Job Summary ', 'Software Engineer (Cloud Engineering) ', 'As part of a team, you will participate in technical discussions within the immediate group and across functions, where evaluating and executing design and development plans for products are reviewed. ', 'Apply attained experiences and knowledge in solving problems that are complex in scope requiring in-depth evaluation and interaction with cross functional teams ', 'Understanding of cloud technologies and orchestration frameworks like Kubernetes. ', 'Strong oral and written communication skills are essential. ', ' Responsible for handling unstructured tasks and the issues addressed are less defined requiring new perspectives, creative approaches and with more interdependencies  To participate in any and/or all phases of the product development cycle from product definition and design, through implementation and test design.  As part of a team, you will participate in technical discussions within the immediate group and across functions, where evaluating and executing design and development plans for products are reviewed.  Operate under limited supervision and direction, as this individual can operate, drive results and set priorities independently  Apply attained experiences and knowledge in solving problems that are complex in scope requiring in-depth evaluation and interaction with cross functional teams  Participate as a proactive contributor and subject matter expert  Demonstrate favorable results through regular leadership and mentoring others  ', 'Strong aptitude for learning new technologies ', 'Strong programming skills in Go, Python or other programming languages ', 'Knowledge in virtualization technologies, cloud solutions, systems architecture and design, and driver development ', 'Responsibilities: ', ' ', 'Software Engineer (Cloud Engineering)', ' Knowledge in virtualization technologies, cloud solutions, systems architecture and design, and driver development  Strong programming skills in Go, Python or other programming languages  Understanding of cloud technologies and orchestration frameworks like Kubernetes.  Experience with working in any of the public cloud providers like AWS, Azure or GCP.  Experience in software design and development and a strong understanding of complex concepts related to computer architecture, data structures and programming practices.  Strong oral and written communication skills are essential.  Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment and demonstrate strong influencing and leadership skills.  Strong aptitude for learning new technologies  ', 'Education ', 'Demonstrate favorable results through regular leadership and mentoring others ', 'Experience in software design and development and a strong understanding of complex concepts related to computer architecture, data structures and programming practices. ', 'To participate in any and/or all phases of the product development cycle from product definition and design, through implementation and test design. ', 'Requires around 3-5 years of related experience with a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree', 'We’ve built a Data Fabric for a data-driven world – to simplify and integrate data management across the resources that are best for the business. With the Data Fabric, our customers can harness the power of cloud data services, build cloud infrastructures, and modernize storage through data management. ', 'Are you data-driven? We at NetApp believe in the transformative power of data – to expand customer touchpoints, to foster greater innovation, and to optimize operations. We are designed for simplicity, optimized to protect, created to embrace future opportunity, and open to enrich choice. We are the data authority for hybrid cloud, and we are helping our customers realize the full potential of their data. ', 'Experience with working in any of the public cloud providers like AWS, Azure or GCP. ', 'Operate under limited supervision and direction, as this individual can operate, drive results and set priorities independently ', 'Job Requirements: ', 'Participate as a proactive contributor and subject matter expert ', 'Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment and demonstrate strong influencing and leadership skills. ', 'Job Summary  As a Software Development Engineer for Cloud Engineering Team, you will work as part of a team responsible for building software defined storage solutions and cloud storage solutions. You will design, develop and test storage and data management services to be deployed as containers in Kubernetes and work with various public and private cloud providers. As part of the Research and Development function, the overall focus of the group is on competitive market and customer requirements, technology advances, product quality, product cost and time-to-market. Software engineers focus on enhancements to existing products as well as new product development. ']

job_title: Staff Software Engineer - Technology - UI Lead
job_text: ["Utilizes industry research to improve Wal-Mart's technology environment by analyzing industry best practices; benchmarking industry against internal processes and solutions; researching or influencing future industry solutions for fit with internal needs; and defining software development guidelines, standards and processes.", 'Experience with caching, threading, performance tuning and troubleshooting', 'Help the team leverage and contribute to open source technologies', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Experience with Realm, SQLite or Room databases.', 'Desired', 'Develop interactive, user-friendly applications using the latest frameworks which are open source and proprietary', 'Your Qualifications', 'Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, Mobile UI architectural patters, e.g. MVP, MVVM and Google UI design guidelines.', 'Leads and participates in medium- to large-scale, complex, cross-functional projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; enhancing design to prevent reoccurrences of defects; ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs; interacting with project manager to provide input on project plan; and providing leadership to the project team.', ' Position Summary... ', 'Minimum 5 years experience in Android development', 'Strong in front-end technologies (JavaScript / React Native / React / GraphQL / HTML5 / CSS3)', 'Leads the discovery phase of medium to large projects to come up with high level design by partnering with the product management, Web Operations, project management, business and user experience teams; obtaining cross-function approvals; driving proof-of-concept; and implementing prototypes to validate ideas. Drives the execution of multiple business plans and projects by identifying customer and operational needs; developing and communicating business plans and priorities; removing barriers and obstacles that impact performance; providing resources; identifying performance standards; measuring progress and adjusting performance accordingly; developing contingency plans; and demonstrating adaptability and supporting continuous learning. Provides supervision and development opportunities for associates by selecting and training; mentoring; assigning duties; building a team-based work environment; establishing performance expectations and conducting regular performance evaluations; providing recognition and rewards; coaching for success and improvement; and ensuring diversity awareness. Promotes and supports company policies, procedures, mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by training and providing direction to others in their use and application; ensuring compliance with them; and utilizing and supporting the Open Door Policy. Ensures business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current plans, programs, and initiatives; consulting with business partners, managers, co-workers, or other key stakeholders; soliciting, evaluating, and applying suggestions for improving efficiency and cost-effectiveness; and participating in and supporting community outreach events.', '  Minimum Qualifications...  ', 'Extensive experience building applications using React Native / Android frameworks', 'Solid fundamentals in Data structures and Algorithms', 'Develops Innovation strategies, processes, and best practices by leading internal technical teams; partnering with cross-functional teams across the business; developing assessments of key opportunities; documenting project scopes; developing long-range plans and project timelines; communicating with and influencing decision-makers and executives within the organization; and resolving technology differences across teams through informed discussions.', 'Experience building and delivering React/ Redux application', 'Contribute reusable components to the Walmart UI Development community', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent;Minimum 5 years experience in Android developmentExperience building and delivering React/ Redux applicationExperience with at least one major Redux side effect library such as Redux - Thunk, Redux-sagaContribution to open-source projectsContribute reusable components to the Walmart UI Development communityStrong knowledge of Android UI design principles, Mobile UI architectural patters, e.g. MVP, MVVM and Google UI design guidelines.Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end servicesExperience with Realm, SQLite or Room databases.Experience with caching, threading, performance tuning and troubleshootingExperience with source code repositories such as GIT', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline with 5+ years of experience', ' Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications.  ', 'Strong communication skills (both verbal & written) and ability to lead or contribute to multiple projects in an agile team environment.', 'Develop Frontend components invoking REST / GraphQL services', 'Leads the work of other small groups of six to ten engineers, including offshore associates, for assigned Engineering projects by providing pertinent documents, direction, and examples; identifying short- and long- term solutions and timeline; reviewing and approving proposed solutions; implementing new architectural patterns; and performing design and code reviews of changes.', ' Minimum Qualifications... ', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. ', 'Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services', 'Experience with Agile Scrum Methodology and Scrum tools such as Confluence and Jira.', 'Excellent debugging and problem-solving capability', 'Experience with at least one major Redux side effect library such as Redux - Thunk, Redux-saga', 'Supports business objectives by collaborating with business partners to identify opportunities; addressing high-priority initiatives (for example, business strategy, technical feasibility, implementation alternatives); identifying short- and long-term solutions; and leading cross-functional partnership.', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline with 5+ years of experienceExtensive experience building applications using React Native / Android frameworksSolid fundamentals in Data structures and AlgorithmsExcellent debugging and problem-solving capabilityStrong in front-end technologies (JavaScript / React Native / React / GraphQL / HTML5 / CSS3)Experience in developing Responsive UI and having UX skills is big plusMotivated team player who goes over and above what is askedAttitude to thrive in a fun, fast-paced start-up like environment', 'Attitude to thrive in a fun, fast-paced start-up like environment', ' Preferred Qualifications... ['', 'Our team is highly collaborative and has opportunities for mentorship and coaching.', 'Knowledge of studio production is not required.', 'We will learn how to build the best creative experience together.', 'You’ll have the freedom to build what is necessary based on customer needs.', 'You have technical curiosity and are ready to help across the team and learn new skills.', 'Collaborate closely with cloud providers like AWS and internal teams like Open Connect to identify hardware needs for the artist experience you’re building.', 'You will be trusted by your team and the organization to make impactful decisions.', 'You will contribute to a safe and inclusive environment by being curious and vulnerable.', 'Learn more about studio production through hands on experience and identify new areas of technical opportunity through your compassion for our customers.', 'Build novel solutions for high latency, low connectivity, and no connectivity artistic needs.', 'You are able to communicate well through written communication and capture your reasoning around decisions for teammates and partners.', 'You were responsible for the customer experience of a specific feature or system.', 'Collaborate on the design of APIs at the heart of content creation.', 'You have built “always-on” servers, services, agents, or APIs using languages like Java, Go, JavaScript (NodeJS), C++, Python, or Ruby. We only use some of these, but experience in any of them is enough.', 'You are an example of high quality software engineering among peers.']

['', 'Professional experience using C++ or Python', 'A bachelor’s or master’s degree from a tier 1 institution', 'Your Opportunity:', 'We are working alongside an award-winning global hedge fund to find top software engineers for their career acceleration program. ['Snapdocs is an early-stage, rapidly growing company backed by investors like Sequoia Capital, F-Prime Capital, SV Angel, and YCombinator looking for an empathetic Software Engineer to help us build the next generation of our products. Are you interested in having high impact and growth while bringing an industry into the future? Then we have a role for you.', '', "Here is where you come in. Upon completing your BS/BA Computer Science, you joined the industry ready to contribute to a growing business. Now it's time to dive into the startup world and apply your talents to solve real world problems. Over the past 3+ years you have mastered object-oriented programming with at least one of these Ruby, Go, Python, Scala, Java etc working in a production environment. More recently you have been focused on backend development, building APIs, services & working with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc). You have a bias for testing and quality is at the center of your work. Cross functional collaboration is important to you as you are eager to solve a range of problems across the org. Today our team is working in Ruby on Rails, React, Postgres, AWS, Docker, & Kubernetes to name a few but things change quickly so be comfortable learning new tools. We take a pragmatic approach to programming language experience and believe languages can be learned so don't get too hung up if you have not worked with our tools. Hopefully learning new tools & new languages is something you are eager to do.", 'The type of problems we focus on involve workflow, product design, and data. Monolith vs microservice is an ongoing debate. We are working to find a good authentication pattern that allows for people to work across companies in multiple roles (which is trickier than you might think!). Domain Driven Design is our guiding light.', '\xa0', "We're a small team tackling the absolutely massive mortgage market by bringing modern, elegant software to an archaic industry that still relies on fax machines and manila envelopes. We bring security, efficiency and joy to a paper-based pillar of the US economy.", 'As a Software Engineer you will play a central role in building a quality digital closing platform that our partners can trust and use. We build high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical business systems that enable our users to streamline workflows. You will design, build, and maintain APIs, services, and distributed systems. In addition to contributing to core services, you will contribute to debugging production issues across services, participate in code reviews and arch specs. Your day to day interactions span product and engineering teams to release at a high velocity in all phases of the SDLC. We have a small team so your contributions will have huge impact.', 'Snapdocs’ culture is one that strongly values diversity and drive. We want to work with people of different backgrounds and different paths in life, and we trust our team members to make smart decisions. We value independent work as well as collaboration. Snapdocs provides a range of excellent benefits ranging from the standard stuff: matching 401(k), free lunches, and 21 days PTO to the not so standard—like a 10 year exercise window on your options.', "We empower our team members to make smart decisions and to get creative when solving difficult and ambiguous problems. This means we value both independent work as well as collaboration. We're expanding rapidly and need another core engineer to help us achieve our short and long term goals as we become ubiquitous in one segment of the market."]

['Collaborate with researchers throughout TRI to help disseminate sound software engineering practices. ', 'Our work is guided by a dedication to safety – in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society. As a subsidiary of Toyota, TRI is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership, experience, and ideas from industry-leading companies. Over half of our technical team carries PhD degrees. We’re continually searching for the world’s best talent ‒ people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with us! ', '', 'General experience in Linux networking, ROS/ROS2. and GPU/CUDA fundamentals a plus.', 'Familiarity with automating testing practices. ', 'Experience in Robotics, AI, or Machine Learning a plus. ', 'Work with and between multiple technical teams to understand and ensure complete system functionality. ', 'Collaborate with other software engineers and research scientists to develop and maintain tools and algorithms for use within the automated driving vehicle effort. Collaborate with researchers throughout TRI to help disseminate sound software engineering practices. Work with and between multiple technical teams to understand and ensure complete system functionality. Participate in system design including characterization of module functionality and requirements as a component within a complex real-time software system. Live and breathe the software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review. ', 'We strive to build a company that helps our people thrive, achieve work-life balance, and bring their best selves to work. At TRI, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds ‒ a fun environment with forward-thinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals. Come work with TRI if you’re interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars, enabling the elderly to age in place, or designing alternative fuel sources. Start your impossible with us. ', '- Bring advanced mobility technology to market faster. ', 'Participate in system design including characterization of module functionality and requirements as a component within a complex real-time software system. ', '- Discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller, lighter, less expensive and more powerful. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications: ', '- Develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence, access, and mobility. ', 'At Toyota Research Institute (TRI), we’re working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move, engage, and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions, injuries, and fatalities. Join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence, automated driving, robotics, and materials science. We’re dedicated to building a world of “mobility for all” where everyone, regardless of age or ability, can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life. Through innovations in AI, we’ll help… ', ' ', '4+ years of professional experience working with C/C++ and Linux You have strong communication skills and are an extraordinary teammate Strong understanding of common software performance issues and tradeoffs. Deep understanding of real-time, distributed, and parallel computing. Familiarity with automating testing practices. Experience in Robotics, AI, or Machine Learning a plus. General experience in Linux networking, ROS/ROS2. and GPU/CUDA fundamentals a plus.', 'C/', '- Develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash, regardless of the actions of the driver. ', '4+ years of professional experience working with C/C++ and Linux ', "TRI's Vehicle Software Platform team is developing software tools to enable deployment of software functionality across large fleets of vehicles, testing and quality control of advanced vehicle automation systems, and online integrity and safety monitoring of those systems. We're looking for phenomenal software engineers who are passionate about improving the lives of millions through deploying robust robotic systems. No prior robotics experience is necessary, although it doesn't hurt. ", '- Develop human-centered AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making to increase the quality of decisions (e.g. mitigate cognitive biases) and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. ', 'Responsibilities ', 'You have strong communication skills and are an extraordinary teammate ', 'Strong understanding of common software performance issues and tradeoffs. ', 'Live and breathe the software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review. ', 'Deep understanding of real-time, distributed, and parallel computing. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Collaborate with other software engineers and research scientists to develop and maintain tools and algorithms for use within the automated driving vehicle effort. ']

['*There is no travel during COVID-19 and next to no travel in the future*\xa0', '\xa0 ', ' Senior Consultant- Data Analytics/Engineering ', 'My client is a boutique strategy consulting group that focuses exclusively on the telecommunications, media, and technology (TMT) related sectors. They also do a lot of work with Private Equity firms.  \xa0 They are looking for a Senior Consultant- Data Analytics/Engineering to join their internal analytics technology group that is focused on developing a suite of advanced analytics products and supporting business strategy consulting teams. job_title: Platform Engineering - Senior Software Engineer | Elite Hedge Fund | Boston
job_text: ['Join a lean and focused team, building high performance solutions for the world’s most competitive trading environmentsDefine strategy on storage and cloud optimizations to push performance and reduce costsUse cutting edge DevOps and Cloud technologies to ensure infrastructure is secure, reliable, and performance is scalable in a real-time Big Data environment', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', '\xa0', 'Define the future of investment infrastructure:\xa0\xa0', '3+ years of experience with AWS', '2+ years of experience with containerization technologies like Docker or Kubernetes', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', '4+ years of experience with Linux', 'Freedom and support to define best practice, architect, and impliment sophisticated infrastructure and automation solutions', 'Define strategy on storage and cloud optimizations to push performance and reduce costs', 'Define the future of investment infrastructure:\xa0', 'Preferred qualifications:\xa0', 'Join a lean and focused team, building high performance solutions for the world’s most competitive trading environments', 'Capitalize on:', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibilityFreedom and support to define best practice, architect, and impliment sophisticated infrastructure and automation solutions', '4+ years of experience with Python or other major scripting languages', '4+ years of experience with Python or other major scripting languages4+ years of experience with Linux3+ years of experience with AWS2+ years of experience with containerization technologies like Docker or Kubernetes', 'Platform Engineering - Senior Software Engineer | Elite Hedge Fund | Boston', "One of Boston's most Prestigious Hedge Funds has an opportunity for a Principal Platform Developer platform to maximize the scalability, performance, and reliability of their automated infrastructure and delivery systems. In this role, you will lead the design and development of this Elite Hedge Fund's infrastructure and core APIs which support their quantitative research, analytics systems, and trading models. You will be asked to apply your expertise with AWS and Linux to create platforms which increase the velocity and efficiency of development and position this firm to quickly scale up and down.", 'Preferred qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Use cutting edge DevOps and Cloud technologies to ensure infrastructure is secure, reliable, and performance is scalable in a real-time Big Data environment']

', '\xa0 ', 'Possess sound knowledge of operating systems, networking and security ', 'The Data Center Operations Engineer provides all necessary assistance in regard to IT infrastructure. They ensure that the data center environment is secure and operational for our customers. Primarily focused on day to day Data Center, Server & Network hardware break-fix & large scale infrastructure build and deployment within tight deadlines. Responsible for troubleshooting connectivity issues with copper or fiber cabling. Provide technical communication pertaining to configurations in a concise, professional manner. Possess good knowledge of internal ticketing systems to provide proper customer service. Must identify and resolve complex server hardware failures to include the replacement of failed hardware components. Receive, track and deploy server and network hardware. On site spares stock control, tracking and monitoring Perform installation, racking, and cabling services for servers and network infrastructure, both personally and through smart hands services Follow and implement processes and procedures that improve stability, performance and availability. Update and Maintain data center documentation including port maps, rack layouts, PDU management and asset management thorough our DCIM and Power management tooling. Possess sound knowledge of operating systems, networking and security Ensure established policies and procedures are followed and compliance requirements are met. Implement data center and infrastructure solutions that address growth, risks and scale in support of Workday’s business plans. Communicate and collaborate effectively across many organizations and various levels. Perform maintenance on servers & network infrastructure, including physical parts replacements. ['Bloomberg engineers develop impactful solutions to complex, real-world problems. The software we write is utilized every day by leading business and finance experts worldwide. We roll out new software daily, which encourages our teams to work together on how to best design, build and deploy these systems.', '', ' Take ownership of the full development cycle Partner with clients and other developers to design, build and roll out solutions that will optimize complex workflows Understand and efficiently manipulate large datasets Make quick, thoughtful decisions Be a collaborative member of your team Have a strong understanding of data structures and algorithms Be an excellent problem solver', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technology field Programming experience in C, C++, C#, Java or Python', 'We are extremely proud of our diverse and open culture, and value diversity of thought and perspective in every form. If you have a degree outside of the above, but still have strong software development skills, then we can teach you the rest.', ' Have a strong understanding of data structures and algorithms', ' Be an excellent problem solver', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technology field', ' Make quick, thoughtful decisions', ' Understand and efficiently manipulate large datasets', "We're looking for engineers who have a passion for writing reusable, performant solutions to complex problems, who can keep an open mind and adapt to an ever-changing market landscape, who can collaborate and work effectively on small teams, and who want to develop software that impacts thousands of power users around the world.", ' Take ownership of the full development cycle', ' Partner with clients and other developers to design, build and roll out solutions that will optimize complex workflows', ' Experience building software in internship or full-time industry work, school, or other technical projects', ' Be a collaborative member of your team', "Our training program will teach you the ins and outs of our technology stack and how to be a successful software engineer in our high-energy and fast-paced environment. Training consists of lectures, labs and group projects. You'll become a pro on the Bloomberg Terminal and learn how we do database systems, network communication, real-time data processing, and build UIs. After training, our engineers are prepared to hit the ground running with a strong network of new friends and colleagues.", ' Programming experience in C, C++, C#, Java or Python']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack- Remote
job_text: ['', '\xa0 ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent ', 'Experience with Node.js and associated frameworks such as Express.js ', 'Required:', 'Experience with Amazon AWS services such as S3, SQS, Redshift ', 'Demonstrated experience developing browser-based interactive web applications, focusing on server-side ', 'Ability to work independently in a fast-paced team environment ', 'Experience with HTML5 and CSS3, including frameworks such as Bootstrap or Material ', 'Proficiency with JavaScript and strong familiarity with best-practices, design patterns, debugging, code optimization, etc. ', 'Experience with statistical programming languages such as R ', 'Responsibilities', 'In depth knowledge of databases and SQL particularly PostgreSQL ', 'Experience with version control systems such as Git ', 'Experience with data visualization libraries such as D3.js\xa0 ', 'Preferred ', ' ', 'Develop interactive enterprise web applications, with an emphasis on data analytics and visualization ', 'Experience developing and deploying production REST APIs ', 'Actively participate in a fast-paced team-based Agile environment, working with product managers, user-experience designers, software testers and other engineers ', '5 to 8 years’ experience in full stack engineering or similar equivalent role ', 'Required: ', 'Curiosity to learn new technologies and go outside your comfort zone ', 'Experience with JavaScript MVC frameworks such as AngularJS, Angular or React ', 'Experience with Python ', 'Responsibilities ', 'Preferred', 'Excellent programming skills coupled with an understanding of object-oriented design patterns ']

['', 'This requirement is in the task order stage of the process and each candidate considered will be fully screened by our recruiter and technical team lead and if chosen to proceed in consideration, provisioned a Contingent Offer Letter. This Contingent Offer Letter will need to be reviewed, signed and returned to HighPoint giving us full approval to submit the aligned candidate’s resume to our customer for consideration on this task order.', 'Preferred Master’s (or higher) technical field relating to simulation, applied mathematics, operations research, data science, analytics, statistics, economics, actuarial science, engineering, or related quantitative field. ', 'Serve as an engineer/developer on highly technical modeling and simulation teams, including assisting in researching solutions to challenging technical problems individually or as a member of a team. ', 'This requirement is in the task order stage of the process and each candidate considered will be fully screened by our recruiter and technical team lead and if chosen to proceed in consideration, provisioned a Contingent Offer Letter. This Contingent Offer Letter will need to be reviewed, signed and returned to HighPoint giving us full approval to submit the aligned candidate’s resume to our customer for consideration on this task order. ', 'This position is currently a remote position with the potential to be moved to an office location post pandemic.', 'Excellent personal and communication skills, including the ability to effectively coordinate with team members via remote communication methods. ', "Apply innovative and scientific/quantitative analytical approaches to draw conclusions and make 'insight to action' recommendations to answer the business objective and drive the appropriate change. ", 'EDUCATION AND YEARS OF EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS ', 'Excellent programming skills in Java. ', 'JOB RESPONSIBILITIES', ' HighPoint is a growth-oriented firm that provides a unique, differentiated employee culture relative to our Federal market peers. We leverage this growth-oriented and employee-focused culture to attract and retain a higher grade of talent than our peers to be an employer of choice.   ', 'KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'This position is currently a remote position with the potential to be moved to an office location post pandemic. ', 'The qualified candidate will have at least 10 years’ experience in a requisite technical background (operations research, computer science, data science, industrial engineering, or similar) with demonstrated experience with development of custom simulation models using one or more modeling paradigms (agent-based, discrete event, system dynamics). The qualifying candidate must also be familiar with numerical optimization methods and be comfortable in a research environment where problems may not always be clearly defined. ', 'Understand and adopt emerging technology that can affect the application of scientific methodologies and/or quantitative analytical approaches to problem resolutions. ', 'Deliver analysis/findings in a manner that conveys understanding, influences mid-to-upper level management, garners support for recommendations, drives business decisions, and influences business strategy. ', 'Advanced knowledge of data analysis tools. Includes demonstrated competency in Java (or similar) and data science scripting languages (e.g. Python or R). ', "Serve as an engineer/developer on highly technical modeling and simulation teams, including assisting in researching solutions to challenging technical problems individually or as a member of a team. Leverage business/analytical knowledge to participate in discussions with cross-functional teams to understand and collaborate on business objectives and influence solution strategies. The business problems analyzed are typically medium-to-large scale with impact to current and/or future business strategy. Apply innovative and scientific/quantitative analytical approaches to draw conclusions and make 'insight to action' recommendations to answer the business objective and drive the appropriate change. Translate recommendations into communication materials to effectively present to colleagues for peer review and mid-to-upper level management. Thoroughly document assumptions, methodology, validation, and testing to facilitate peer reviews. Understand and adopt emerging technology that can affect the application of scientific methodologies and/or quantitative analytical approaches to problem resolutions. Deliver analysis/findings in a manner that conveys understanding, influences mid-to-upper level management, garners support for recommendations, drives business decisions, and influences business strategy. ", 'MODELING AND SIMULATION ENGINEER II', 'Experience with DevOps techniques, principals, and culture and the tools and techniques used to sup Knowledge of IT Testing processes and best practices. ', 'Prefer experience with simulation software, such as AnyLogic (preferred), Simio, or similar. ', 'Demonstrates competency in mathematical and statistical techniques and approaches used to drive fact-based decision-making. ', 'Minimum 10 years’ experience in one of the above fields with 1-2 years’ experience with hands-on modeling. ', 'HighPoint is currently seeking an enthusiastic, self-driven, and experienced Modeling and Simulation Engineer II to support a Government agency in developing and implementing large-scale simulation and optimization models to improve organizational and operational efficiency in the Service Delivery environment. Candidates are expected to have strong analytical skills, hands-on experience developing custom models, and interact well with clients and team members in remote and or partially remote work environments. ', 'JOB RESPONSIBILITIES ', ' ', 'Leverage business/analytical knowledge to participate in discussions with cross-functional teams to understand and collaborate on business objectives and influence solution strategies. The business problems analyzed are typically medium-to-large scale with impact to current and/or future business strategy. ', 'Thoroughly document assumptions, methodology, validation, and testing to facilitate peer reviews. ', 'KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS ', 'EDUCATION AND YEARS OF EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS', 'MODELING AND SIMULATION ENGINEER II ', 'Deep technical proficiency in modeling and simulation applications, including knowledge of agent-based and discrete-event methods and experimental design. Experience with DevOps techniques, principals, and culture and the tools and techniques used to sup Knowledge of IT Testing processes and best practices. Demonstrates competency in mathematical and statistical techniques and approaches used to drive fact-based decision-making. Advanced knowledge of data analysis tools. Includes demonstrated competency in Java (or similar) and data science scripting languages (e.g. Python or R). Excellent personal and communication skills, including the ability to effectively coordinate with team members via remote communication methods. Superb critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Excellent programming skills in Java. Prefer experience with simulation software, such as AnyLogic (preferred), Simio, or similar. Prefer excellent programming skills in Python (or similar data science language). Prefer advanced skills in mathematical programming and optimization, especially in conjunction with simulation modeling. ', 'Bachelor’s (or higher) in a technical field relating to simulation, applied mathematics, data science, operations research, analytics, statistics, economics, actuarial science, engineering, or related quantitative field. ', 'The Ideal Candidate will demonstrate expert skills in custom-coding models using Java or a similar object-oriented language and be capable of modeling complex systems represented by diverse and varied processes generating large quantities of data. The ideal candidate must be able to script in one or more data science languages (e.g. Python, R, SAS – preferably Python). The ideal candidate will also be skilled in applications blending simulation and optimization and be able to understand and implement optimization algorithms in the context of a simulation modeling effort. The ability to implement optimization methods using Java or Python is highly desirable, although not strictly required. ', 'Deep technical proficiency in modeling and simulation applications, including knowledge of agent-based and discrete-event methods and experimental design. ', 'Translate recommendations into communication materials to effectively present to colleagues for peer review and mid-to-upper level management. ', 'Bachelor’s (or higher) in a technical field relating to simulation, applied mathematics, data science, operations research, analytics, statistics, economics, actuarial science, engineering, or related quantitative field. Minimum 10 years’ experience in one of the above fields with 1-2 years’ experience with hands-on modeling. Preferred Master’s (or higher) technical field relating to simulation, applied mathematics, operations research, data science, analytics, statistics, economics, actuarial science, engineering, or related quantitative field. If Master’s Degree or above, candidate may possess 1-2 years’ experience in a relevant field.', 'Prefer excellent programming skills in Python (or similar data science language). ', 'Superb critical thinking and problem-solving skills. ', 'Prefer advanced skills in mathematical programming and optimization, especially in conjunction with simulation modeling. ', 'If Master’s Degree or above, candidate may possess 1-2 years’ experience in a relevant field.']

['', 'http://www.pritechnology.com/', 'You will also have the opportunity to learn the challenges in design and maintenance of large scale enterprise systems.', 'Collaboratively document tasks consistent with industry standards, project specific design principles and frameworks', 'As a software engineering consultant enabling this migration:', 'Be willing to tackle new challenges, learn new technologies quickly', 'Direct Line: 1-973-732-5454 x21', 'Ability to communicate and interact with internal engineers to learn systems is essential.', 'PRI Technology', "The firms Ticker Team is responsible for the integrity of the software that delivers the world's most reliable, timely and accurate financial data. More than 4,500 developers rely on them to provide the core foundation and data required for their applications. Their work environment is fast-paced, spirited, friendly and collaborative. On their team, you will learn about state-of-the-art large-scale development infrastructure, work with field experts, and get insight into the heart of the firms financial engine. They are currently in the process of upgrading a large number of software assets. The project will involve communication with multiple engineering teams, the migration of code to a modern infrastructure, creation of project summary documentation, and the development of scripts to support all the above.", 'This position will start off as a remote position however once the shelter in place laws are lifted the ideal candidate should be capable of working five days a week at Midtown, Manhattan.\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bill Stevens', 'Regards', 'Please let me know your interest for this position, availability to interview and start for this position along with a copy of your recent resume or please feel free to call me at any time with any questions.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Director of Technical Recruiting', 'Bill.Stevens@PRITechnology.com', 'Essentials:', 'You will be involved in coordinating, planning, rolling out and testing updates to the production system.', 'You will have the opportunity to extend the firms existing infrastructure. This will include modifying or developing code using CMake, Python, and frameworks of the Jenkins ecosystems.', 'Experience with Git and Jenkins pipelines', 'Senior\xa0C++\xa0Software Engineer\xa0Python\xa0\xa0', 'The interview process will include an initial telephone screening.', 'Basic familiarity with C++, its compilation process, and solving linker errors on UNIX/Linux platforms.', 'Denville, New Jersey\xa007834', 'Full-Time work experience with C or C++', 'System admin experience', 'Due to client confidentiality please call me for the w-2 and contract rates.', 'You will develop an expertise in CMake, Git, C++ build troubleshooting, and Python.', 'Aptitude for writing scripts to automate repetitive tasks.', 'Familiarity with CMake', 'Ability to write technical documentation on systems and processes is essential.', 'My name is Bill Stevens and I have a new twelve month plus Software Engineer opportunity available that could be of interest to you, please review my specification below and I am available at any time to speak with you so please feel free to call me.', 'Complete projects that required significant communication skills and the ability to work with a team', 'US citizens and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply, sponsorship for this role is not available at this time.', 'LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/pub/bill-stevens/3/26/687/', 'Work with engineering and product teams across the firm and understand their application requirements and data access patterns', 'Experience with Python scripting', '\xa0\xa0']

', 'We are looking for a talented engineer for our circuit simulation suite Spectre-XPS (Fastspice) Product line. You will work on several possible R&D projects (Fastspice event-driven algorithms, circuit partitioning, graph traversal, matrix solver, parallel computing, memory/cpu optimization) and be responsible for advancing and creating state-of-the-art circuit simulation technologies and solutions. ', 'Our ideal candidate must be proficient in C/C++ Unix development, possess a thorough knowledge of numerical methods for transistor-level circuit simulation, and understand the custom IC design and verification practices. Knowledge on general EDA algorithm or analog circuit design is a plus. Candidates must have a proven ability to learn from and work with an engineering and cross-functional team to deliver innovative technologies in a production environment. Experience in circuit simulation and EDA would be a plus. Required education for this role is a MS in CS/EE or related degree.', ' ', 'Our ideal candidate must be proficient in C/C++ Unix development, possess a thorough knowledge of numerical methods for transistor-level circuit simulation, and understand the custom IC design and verification practices. ', 'Knowledge on general EDA algorithm or analog circuit design is a plus. ', 'Experience in circuit simulation and EDA would be a plus. ', 'Required education for this role is a MS in CS/EE or related degree.']

['', '•\tExpertise in designing and developing large scale distributed J2EE / container SaaS / PaaS\xa0', 'If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for employment at our company, please contact Human Resources at 470-548-7173 and/or ADAAA@infor.com.', '•\tKnowledge of TCP/IP and Proxy architectures\xa0', 'Preferred ', '•\tExpertise in Java and Java J2EE containers and execution\xa0', 'Qualifications', 'Infor is seeking a Principal Software Engineer who provides product ownership, architectural leadership and development for the installation, packaging & deployment of large-scale java framework components into Wildfly, Websphere, servlet containers and JVMs in cloud based distributed systems. Also provides oversight on the configuration/tuning and run-time profiling aspects for cloud and on-premise deployments. This individual contributor would work with various product owners, architects and application experts to conceive and create software products containing required features and modifications.\xa0\xa0', '•\tExpertise in installing, configuring and supporting java applications in Wildfly 8+\xa0', '•\tKnowledge of Jetty 9, Spring Boot a plus\xa0', '•\tKnowledge of Docker and Kubernetes technologies a plus\xa0', 'Infor does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, marital status, age, veteran status, protected veterans, military service obligation, citizenship status, individuals with disabilities, or any other characteristic protected by law applicable to the state in which you work.', 'Applicants to and employees of most United States private employers, state and local governments, educational institutions, employment agencies and labor organizations are protected under Federal law from discrimination. For additional information please see EEO is the Law poster, the EEO Supplemental as well as the Statement of Policy. If you would like to view a copy of the company’s affirmative action plan or policy statement, please email us.hrprograms@infor.com.', 'Responsibilities ', '•\tExpertise in installing, configuring and supporting java applications in Websphere 8.5+\xa0', '•\tExpertise in packaging and deployment into Wildfly/Websphere\xa0', '•\tExpertise in HTTP request/response and web client/server architecture\xa0']

['', 'You are involved in building and optimizing our own Bear Operating Systems, an infrastructure to control and monitor our globally deployed robots. You are building the remote monitoring, record-replay as well as resource scheduling. When it comes to distributed computing, you lead the way in your team and are the go-to expert in regards of system design and architecture. No matter if it is backend or frontend - you own the system full stack like no other. Furthermore, you enjoy driving optimization strategies and realizing ambiguous work streams. Your organization skills, go-getter personality and people-focussed mentality are the right tools to grow into a tech lead role.', 'Required Skills:\xa0\xa0Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova', 'Bear Robotics was started in 2017 to address the increased pressure faced by the food service industry around wages, labor supply, and cost efficiencies. Our company has developed a robot named Penny enabled by artificial intelligence and able to autonomously shuttle food from a kitchen out to tables and bring dishes back for cleaning. If you want to dive into deep-tech with an A+ team, Bear Robotics is a perfect place for you.', 'BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering\xa0', 'Strong knowledge and solid hands-on experience of full stack system\xa0', 'Your role & responsibilities:', 'Experience in Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova and/or Linux', 'Company Description:', 'Proven skills in distributed system design and architecture\xa0', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering\xa0Strong knowledge and solid hands-on experience of full stack system\xa0Proven skills in distributed system design and architecture\xa0Experience in Git, NoSQL, Networking, Google Cloud, ReactJs, NodeJs, Gevent, Docker, Cordova and/or Linux']

upstream open source contributions and collaboration; and performance optimizations in JavaScript, Native platform, and graphics rendering.', 'Maintaining a tight feedback loop for developers and internal users by doing test-driven development at the unit- and acceptance-test level for fast feedback both in local development environments, in our cloud CI providers, and our internal continuous deployment.', 'Influence the platforms we rely on by communicating wants and needs to our partners at Microsoft, Google, Facebook, and others in the areas of WebRTC and web standards, managed runtimes (JavaScript, Typescript, etc), React, and open source efforts.', 'You write tests to prove that your code is correct, modular, well written, and to prevent regressions.', 'Working with other internal teams (i.e. PM, Design, and BI) to conceptualize and productize collaboration features efficiently in line with product vision', 'Interview, onboard and mentor interns and junior developers.', 'Keeping our product awesome by enhancing and contributing to upstream react, react-native, react-native-windows, redux, flow, eslint, codepush, and other open-source dependencies.', 'Familiarity with hardware endpoint APIs - Polycom, Lifesize, Cisco etc.', 'Participating actively in scrums, sprint planning, and retros and reinforcing the importance of sprint and Agile rituals to junior team members by example', 'Run with features and enhancements further and further through the technology stack, from JavaScript to C# to Native code, from WPF to Direct3D to GPU Shaders/Compute.', 'Strong experience working hands-on on Web or Windows Software Engineering teams, preferably on end user-facing products', 'Even better if you have:', 'Verizon recently acquired BlueJeans and plans to transition BlueJeans employees into Verizon compensation and benefits programs. ['', ' Experience working with command line-based software for genetic analysis and next-generation sequencing protocols (e.g. BWA, GATK, SamTools, BCFtools and shell scripting).', 'Working Conditions', ' High-level computer programming language', ' BIOINFORMATICS ANALYST/SOFTWARE ENGINEER', ' Thrive in a fast-paced work environment that requires independent self-direction with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.', ' Design, develop, and maintain research-related custom software used in a high-throughput, second-generation DNA sequencing laboratory.  Serve as a technical expert in the bioinformatics software developed, guiding other staff, researchers, and clients in its use.  Dissect and analyze complex research problems using a multitude of programming languages that interact with our existing software architecture.  Participate in developing, implementing and maintaining new workflows for NGS.  Thrive in a fast-paced work environment that requires independent self-direction with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.  Provide support in writing manuscripts, abstracts and presentations.  Present analysis findings at group meetings and national conferences, if necessary.  Other duties may be assigned.As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. For a complete description of our benefits for this position, please visit our website, click here.Minimum Requirements  BS in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences or related field, or equivalent experience.  A minimum 3 years of experience working with next-generation sequencing data and relevant tools for bioinformatics analysis, in either a professional or academic setting.  Good understanding of human genetics.  Strong knowledge of exploratory data analyses.  Ability to utilize computational tools in common scripting languages (e.g. Linux, Perl, Python, and R).  Experience working with high performance computing.  Ability to manage projects and solve problems independently.  Excellent collaborator with interdisciplinary teams.  Strong written and oral communication skills.Desired Requirements  Masters or Ph.D., or foreign equivalent, in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences, or related field  Experience working with command line-based software for genetic analysis and next-generation sequencing protocols (e.g. BWA, GATK, SamTools, BCFtools and shell scripting).  Genetics and DNA variation  High-level computer programming language  High performance cluster management  Linux experience  Analytical and troubleshooting skills for wet-bench laboratory protocols  Knowledge of next-generation (Illumina) DNA sequencing chemistry  Knowledge of laboratory information systems (LIMS) design and implementationWorking ConditionsThe Bioinformatics Analyst position is expected to respond immediately to questions from investigators, teammates, and provide expert technical support for developing or trouble-shooting workflows. On occasion, it will be neceessary to respond immediately to urgent questions from the P.I. and other managers if problems arise that impact the work flow or deadlines for the NWGC production center - these tend to happen on a weekly basis and occasionally require extra hours be worked on a given day.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed. ['', 'Experience and skills using cloud & container technologies', '2+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems', 'Design, develop and test end to end product features working across full-stack including APIs, micro-services and interactive user interfaces', 'Full-stack expertise and experience in Java technologies eco-system (spring, JPA, JMS…) and one of JavaScript technologies (React, Angular, Ember) ', 'Advocate for change in quality, durability, reliability, and technical debt reduction, working directly with Product Managers, Engineering Managers, and architects', 'Preferred Experience', 'Key Qualifications', 'At Synopsys, we’re at the heart of the innovations that change the way we work and play. job_text: ['', 'A degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field', 'Comfortable with distributed learning, big data and large-scale systems', 'A theoretical understanding of ML concepts and techniques. Knowledge of Statistics is a plus.', 'An ML generalist experienced in building ML pipelines. ', 'Requirements', 'Analyze and implement features, and train Machine Learning models on large-scale data.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Responsibilities', ' 1+ years as a Machine Learning Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or Data Scientist  An ML generalist experienced in building ML pipelines.  A theoretical understanding of ML concepts and techniques. Knowledge of Statistics is a plus. Software Engineering practices and the ability to write performant production-quality code. Comfortable with distributed learning, big data and large-scale systems A degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field', "How You'll Have Impact", ' Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to optimize ad platform efficiency.  Dig into Reddit’s unique product challenges, and go beyond generic out-of-the-box algorithms. Analyze and implement features, and train Machine Learning models on large-scale data. Collaborate across disciplines to find technical solutions to complex challenges. Write production code to ship your model to millions of users. Participate in the full software development cycle: design, develop, QA, deploy, experiment, and analyze. ', 'Write production code to ship your model to millions of users.', 'Collaborate across disciplines to find technical solutions to complex challenges.', 'Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to optimize ad platform efficiency. Though, we will also welcome proven engineering leaders who are eager to immerse themselves in mastering JavaScript', 'Use Node.js on the server', ' Responsible for upholding technical rigor on their team Serve as technical tie breaker for all technical decisions on the team Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineers on your team Work closely with our Principal Engineer to contribute to and develop our technology roadmap and architecture Work closely with the Engineering Manager, Product Manager, and Product Designer on breaking down problems into achievable chunks Write full-stack JavaScript Use Node.js on the server Restify for APIs, GraphQL for web apps LaunchDarkly for feature flagging React on the browser, and when we need more complex state management on the browser, use Redux Three.js/WebGL for our 3D visualizations Build browser assets with Webpack MySQL for database storage AWS for infrastructure, deploying services with ECS and Lambda Develop on local machines, not in the cloud ', 'Passion for writing code that is scalable, maintainable, reusable, and well-tested', 'Experience leading a team through mentoring and technical guidance', 'What You Will Need For This Position', 'Proven experience planning, building, and scaling high-quality SaaS products', 'Write full-stack JavaScript', 'Develop on local machines, not in the cloud', 'Ability to identify and proactively communicate infrastructure, product features, and technology issues that cut across multiple products', "This position is available for remote candidates, within a 500-mile radius of Washington, DC.*A best friend's wedding, a 10th anniversary party, BlizzCon, AWS re:Invent, The Grammys, a first concert, the opening of a new museum - we all have a favorite event.Events and meetings make an impact that lasts a lifetime. As more of our lives are spent online, the time offline is truly rare. So, our goal is to make it easy to bring great people together, face-to-face.With more than 4.5 million successful events brought to life using our award-winning event management platform, we'd say we're well on our way. As we look to the future, we're focused on continuing to innovate and create the best technology to bring joy through the power of in-person connection. And that's where you come in!If you want a job where there’s more enthusiasm than there is red tape, where ideas are sought after and celebrated, and where hard work changes the course of human history, then Cvent and our newest product, Social Tables, may be the place for you!At Social Tables, Lead Software Engineers have a deep understanding of JavaScript fundamentals and architecture. They are also explicitly charged with vetting the technical rigor of our solutions, within their team. They are able to focus on both the breadth of our software, as well as the depth.What You Will Be Doing Responsible for upholding technical rigor on their team Serve as technical tie breaker for all technical decisions on the team Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineers on your team Work closely with our Principal Engineer to contribute to and develop our technology roadmap and architecture Work closely with the Engineering Manager, Product Manager, and Product Designer on breaking down problems into achievable chunks Write full-stack JavaScript Use Node.js on the server Restify for APIs, GraphQL for web apps LaunchDarkly for feature flagging React on the browser, and when we need more complex state management on the browser, use Redux Three.js/WebGL for our 3D visualizations Build browser assets with Webpack MySQL for database storage AWS for infrastructure, deploying services with ECS and Lambda Develop on local machines, not in the cloud What You Will Need For This Position Proven experience planning, building, and scaling high-quality SaaS products Ideally 4+ years in JavaScript and Node.js. Though, we will also welcome proven engineering leaders who are eager to immerse themselves in mastering JavaScript Passion for writing code that is scalable, maintainable, reusable, and well-tested Experience leading a team through mentoring and technical guidance Comfort debugging large applications and refactoring them to well-tested components and services Ability to represent the business when speaking to customers or community members Ability to identify and proactively communicate infrastructure, product features, and technology issues that cut across multiple products Cvent offers a fun, collegial work environment tailored to sharpening your technical skills and growing as a software professional. While we have evolved from startup to mid-sized company, our Technology Team has preserved an entrepreneurial and merit-driven culture where meaningful initiative and contribution are recognized and rewarded.Need more reasons to consider us? We offer competitive salary packages and an extensive benefits package for all full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision, semi-annual bonuses, 401K Match, gym membership discounts and other great perks!At Cvent we celebrate, support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics.Cvent maintains a drug-free workplace.", 'React on the browser, and when we need more complex state management on the browser, use Redux', 'Comfort debugging large applications and refactoring them to well-tested components and services', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineers on your team']

Release to production early and often - you won’t be working on a product for a year before it sees the light of day; we believe in MVPs. Work with a talented, mission-driven, fun-loving team who values your input and your individuality. Using a modern tech stack, deliver a high value enterprise notification platform - think Sendgrid + Twilio + OneSignal.', ' Experience in JavaScript; building both backend Restful APIs, as well as front-end UIs.', ' Nice to haves: Experience with build tools, AWS cloud services, Git, Infrastructure as code, GraphQL and relational databases.', 'Our Benefits', ' Work with a talented, mission-driven, fun-loving team who values your input and your individuality.', ' Ability to analyze, design, develop, deploy and support web applications and services.', ' Ability to analyze, design, develop, deploy and support web applications and services. Nice to haves: Experience with build tools, AWS cloud services, Git, Infrastructure as code, GraphQL and relational databases.', 'At Northwestern Mutual, we are strong, innovative and growing. We invest in our people. We care and make a positive difference.', ' Tuition reimbursement, commuter plans, and paid time off', ' Highly competitive compensation that include base salary plus bonus', ' Life Balance', ' Hackathons/Commitment to Innovation', "What's the role?", ' Tuition reimbursement, commuter plans, and paid time off Highly competitive compensation that include base salary plus bonus Medical/Dental/Vision plans, matching 401(k), pension program Hackathons/Commitment to Innovation Life Balance Extensive Training Opportunities', ' Release to production early and often - you won’t be working on a product for a year before it sees the light of day; we believe in MVPs.', ' Extensive Training Opportunities', ' Knowledge of HTML5, and CSS frameworks.', "What's the role?We’re looking for a Full Stack engineer to help deliver an enterprise Notification platform to our Clients and Financial Representatives. In this role, you have the potential to bring immediate value to our clients by building systems that communicate via Push to Mobile, SMS, Email, Web and Chat. You will be immersed in the vast breadth of modern tools and technologies to get the job done, such as AWS Cloud infrastructure and platform services, data visualizations, NodeJS micro-services, Front-end web development, and a robust CI/CD pipeline. The role requires an agile engineering mindset, patience and persistence to solve complex problems, ability to get things done quickly but thoughtfully, and strong engineering skills. Join us at the forefront of FinTech innovation!What You’ll Get To Do Build day-to-day like a start-up - incrementally and iteratively - but with the security and resources of an enterprise budget. Release to production early and often - you won’t be working on a product for a year before it sees the light of day; we believe in MVPs. Work with a talented, mission-driven, fun-loving team who values your input and your individuality. Using a modern tech stack, deliver a high value enterprise notification platform - think Sendgrid + Twilio + OneSignal.What We’re Looking For Ability to analyze, design, develop, deploy and support web applications and services. knowledge; lessons; and updates across the organization Experience designing; building; testing and releasing software solutions in a complex; large organization  Demonstrated functional and technical leadership Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills (ability to identify; formulate; and solve engineering problems) Experience with Azure; AWS or other Cloud-based PaaS/SaaS environments.At least 8 plus years of experience; 4 plus in Devops or SRE or Build engineer. 2plus experience in Cloud ( 1 GCP exposure is a must)About UsUST Global is a technology partner dedicated to transforming businesses, communities, and the people who live within them. ['', 'General Requirement', 'AWS\xa0', 'Experience with Segment or another CDP - Familiarity with Node - Machine learning - Data visualization, web and/or mobile (eg, D3.js) - Spark, Hadoop, or Hive', 'Our Fintech Startup is democratizing access to institutional quality investing resources. We are bringing innovation to an industry that typically has had very little. The environment is super collaborative, with multiple working sessions each week across engineering, product, and design. While we are building in a serious industry, we are a fun group and always eager to make sure everyone has a real impact on what we are creating together. Our Fintech Startup is building a modern financial research platform and network. Our aim is to be the center for retail investors to interact about public markets. From working with and helping visualize large amounts of real-time data to creating a delightful user experience for investors, you will have the opportunity to be a generalist or specialist based on your interest and rapidly become a key part of a small, but powerful and very fast-moving New York based team.', 'You will manage and further build out our data infrastructure pipelines and data visualizations.\xa0', 'The work will support core business decisions and models that serve as the basis for core product and growth strategy.', 'Python\xa0', 'SQL (Postgres)Python\xa0Redis\xa0AWS\xa0Periscope or Looker', 'One of our client is looking to hire a "Data Engineer" in Ithaca, New York. Please find the job details below -', 'Periscope or Looker', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'Required Skills: SQL (Postgres) - Python - Redis - AWS - Periscope or Looker', 'Nice to haves:\xa0', 'Benefits:', 'Health, Dental and Vision plans, 401(k) Matching, a complimentary\xa0Equinox gym membership, Commuter Benefits, Flexible hours and PTO.', 'Health, Dental and Vision plans, 401(k) Matching, a complimentary\xa0', 'Equinox gym membership, Commuter Benefits, Flexible hours and PTO.', 'Redis\xa0', 'Job Description:\xa0', 'General Requirements:\xa0', 'We are looking for a data engineer to manage and further build out our data infrastructure pipelines and data visualizations. The work will support core business decisions and models that serve as the basis for core product and growth strategy. Candidates should be able to choose the right tool for the job and learn how to use it if they don’t know how to already. Candidates should prioritize robustness, scaling considerations, and simplicity in architecture decisions.', 'SQL (Postgres)']
